K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:135b-0: @135b / /rgya yi skad du de'i phung bya na lhur po'u ain kyeng s'u phim de'i ayir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:135b-2: thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab ba'i mdo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:136a-2: bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod spungs pa'i ri ldeg slong gi dge 'dun chen po dge slong nyi khri brgyad stong thams cad kyang bya pa byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:136a-3: tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:136a-4: srid pa kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:136a-5: klu chen po ltar sems kyi dbang thob pa sha stag la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:136a-8: rab 'byor dang; kun shes koondi n+ya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:136a-10: byams ma'i bu gang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:136a-13: ka tya'i bu chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:136a-15: sgra gcan 'dzin las sogs pa cang shes pa dag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:136a-16: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sum khri brgyad stong dag dag thabs gcig ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:136a-17: byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang yun ring por dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:136a-18: sangs rgyas bye ba brgyad stong tshad med pa rnams la rtag tu sangs par spyad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:136a-19: smon lam chen po yongs su rdzogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:136a-20: ting nge 'dzin brgya stong snyed khong du chud cing rtogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:136a-22: snying rje chen po mi gtang ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:136a-23: sems can chen po ji lta ba bzhin thams cad la phan par brtson pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:136a-24: dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par 'tsho ba pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:136a-25: chos kyi rgyal mtshan rnam par 'jugs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:136b-0: so so'i skye bo'i ma bskul ba'i dge ba'i @136b bshes gnyen du gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:136b-1: ye shes chen po'i 'gram du phyin pas kun tu grangs med pa sha stag la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:136b-3: byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:136b-4: byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:136b-5: byang chub sems dpa' rtag par brtson pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:136b-6: byang chub sems dpa' yon tan dam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:136b-7: byang chub sems dpa' yon tan dbyangs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:136b-8: byang chub sems dpa' glog gi 'od dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:136b-9: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mnyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:136b-10: byang chub sems dpa' yon tan gtso bo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:136b-11: byang chub sems dpa' ri rab rgyal po dang; byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi glang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:136b-12: byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi glang po chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:136b-13: byang chub sems dpa' stobs 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:136b-14: byang chub sems dpa' khams gsum 'phags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:136b-15: byang chub sems dpa' rtag par snying rje dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:136b-16: byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin chen dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:136b-17: byang chub sems dpa' 'od can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:136b-18: byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i dpal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:136b-19: byang chub sems dpa' rin po chen zla ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:136b-20: byang chub sems dpa' stobs po che dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:136b-21: byang chub sems dpa' blo gros tshod med dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:136b-22: byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:136b-23: byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:136b-24: byang chub sems dpa' seng ge byed dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:136b-25: byang chub sems dpa' seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:137a-1: chub sems dpa' smon lam rdzogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:137a-2: byang chub sems dpa' rin chen brtsegs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:137a-3: byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:137a-4: byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la sogs pa 'khor mang po dang yang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:137a-7: 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha'i bu tshad med pa brgya stong dag kyang lhags nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:137a-8: lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:137a-9: spos rnams thogs shing lha rdzas kyi rol mo dkrol nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:137a-10: steng gi nam mkha' la 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:137a-11: de ma yin pa lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:137a-20: de la sogs pa so so nas 'khor brgya stong snyed lhags nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:137a-21: sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:137a-23: de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das la 'khor mang pos yongs su bskor te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:137a-26: bkur sdi dang bcas pas yongs su bstod pa byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:137a-27: de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis kun dga' bo snga dro'i dus kyi tshe rgyal po'i khab tu zhugs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:137a-28: mthar gyis bsod snyams blangs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:137a-29: de'i dus na bram ze pha ma la sre zhu cher byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:137a-30: khyim so zhig nas ci yang mi bdog pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:137b-0: chig rkyang ma rgan khur @137b du khyer te mthar gyis slong mo byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:137b-1: de yang kha zas zhi ma po ro dang ldan pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:137b-2: shing rtog bzang po dag snyed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:137b-4: kha zas ngan po ro med pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:137b-5: shing tog skam po dag rnyed na bdag rang za'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:137b-6: kun dga' bos de lta bu dag ma thong nas rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:137b-8: legs so zhes snyan par bstod nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:137b-10: pha ma la sri zhu byed cing mchod pa byed pa ngo mtshar che ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:137b-12: de nas kun tu rgyu ston pa drug gi bstan pa la phyogs shing grogs su gyur pa gcig dbang po rno la gtsug lag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:137b-13: rig byed rnam pa bzhi la mkhas par gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:137b-16: dge sdig gi ltas rno ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:137b-18: gtsug lag gi rigs pas pha rol gyis sems shes pa; pha la mang po'i slob dpon du gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:137b-19: kun gyis bkur ba gcig lta ba ngan pa la zhen nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:137b-21: grags pa'i phyir dam pa'i chos 'jig par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:137b-24: dge 'dun la phrag dog byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:137b-25: smod pa'i phyir kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:137b-26: khyod kyi ston pa goo ta ma shaka rigs kyi bu nga ni dge pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:137b-27: yon tan chen po dang ldan no zhes smra ba yang ming tsam du zad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:137b-28: bden pa'i dngos po med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:137b-29: khyod kyi ston pa goo ta ma ni yang dag par na sdig pa can yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:138a-0: btsas nas zhag bdun lon pa na @138a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:138a-1: ma yang shi bas sdig can yin par mngon no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:138a-2: rgyal po'i pho brang na 'dug pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:138a-3: pho brang nang nas bros pas yab rgyal po yang mya ngan gyis non to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:138a-4: sems 'khrugs nas brgyal ba las chus gtor te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:138a-5: zhag bdun lon pa dang dran pa phyir rnyed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:138a-6: cho nges btab nas nga'i lha'i bu gcig deng du stor ro zhes snying rje rje skad du dus nas nga'i yul dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:138a-7: srid kyang khyod 'ba' zhig dbang bar zad la bu yang khyod gcig pur zad na ci'i phyir nged spangs te ri dgon par chas zhes smre sngags 'don du bcug pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:138a-8: khyod kyi ston pa go ta ma drin mi shes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:138a-9: ci la yang ma ltas par langs te song bas na sri zhu med par yang mngon no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:138a-10: yab rgyal bos pho brang brtsigs nas chung ma blangs pa las kyang chung ma'i las ma byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:138a-11: mya ngan gyis gdungs par byas pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:138a-12: khrel med pa yang yin par mngon no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:138a-13: kun dga' bos de skad ces smras pa'i tshig de dag thos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:138a-14: ngo tsha zhing skyengs te bsod snyoms blangs te phyir sangs rgyas gang na bar 'ongs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:138a-15: zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:138a-16: phyogs gcig tu thal mo sbyar ba btud de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:138a-17: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:138a-19: sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa'i chos la pha ma la sri zhu bgyi ba lta ma mchis sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:138a-20: sangs rgyas kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:138b-0: 'di skad du @138b zhu ba 'di khyod la su zhig gis bstan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:138b-3: mi ma yin pas bstan tam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:138b-4: 'on te khyod nyid kyi shes pa'i blos de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar gyur ces bka' stsal pa dang; kun dga' bos gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:138b-9: mi ma lags pa gang gis kyang bstan pa ma mchis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:138b-10: snga dro bsod snyoms slong du mchis pa'i shul du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:138b-11: ston pa drug gi 'khor kun tu rgyu gcer bu pa zhig dang mjal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:138b-12: bdag la tshig rtsub mo dag mchi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:138b-14: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad nas; zhal gyi sgo nas kha dog rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa'i 'od byung bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:138b-15: shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa bye ba brgya stong 'das pa'i pha rol na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:138b-16: 'jig rten gyi khams bla ma mchog ces bya ba snang bar byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:138b-17: 'jig rten gyi khams de nas sangs rgyas dga' ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:138b-20: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:138b-24: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:138b-28: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu bkod pa zhes bya ba na bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:138b-29: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang shin tu mnyam zhing gzhi bee d'u r+ya las byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:138b-30: gser btso mas thig re 'ur bris pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:139a-0: @139a *// rin po che sna bdun gyi shing bskyed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:139a-1: shing de dag kyang mda' rgyang gang tsam du mtho ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:139a-6: rlung mi drag pas bskyod na sgra snyan pa 'byung ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:139a-7: sgra de dag so so'i skye bos thos pas mi ngoms pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:139a-8: skabs skabs na chu mig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:139a-10: khrus kyi rdzing bu yod la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:139a-11: yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:139a-12: rdzing gi zhabs kyang gser gyi bye mas bdal ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:139a-13: rdzing gi ngos bzhin bsung dam pa dang ldan pa'i me tog padma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:139a-16: de ma yin pa'i me tog sngon po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:139a-19: dkar po shing rta'i phang lo tsam gyis chu'i steng yongs su khebs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:139a-20: chu de'i nang na bya rnam pa sna tshogs kyang shin tu yed du 'ong ba'i sgra snyan pa 'byin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:139a-21: rdzing de'i nang na rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i gru yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:139a-22: de na sems can mang po 'dod dgur rtse zhing longs spyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:139a-23: rin po che'i shing de dag gi bar bar na seng ge'i khri mtho khyad kyi tshad dpag tshad gcig pa bshams nas rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:139a-24: lha rdzas kyi na bza' khri'i steng du rim par bting ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:139a-25: lha rdzas kyi spos kyi dri thul ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:139b-0: lha rdzas kyi me tog gis chal bar bkram pa'i khri de la de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i rgyal po skyil mo krung du @139b bcas shing bzhugs pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:139b-1: byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa bye ba brgya stong snyed mdun du bdar te thal mo sbyar ba btud nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:139b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa de la so so nas tshig mthun par 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:139b-4: ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'od bzang po kha dog sngon po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:139b-8: rab tu gsal ba dper mi bzod pa 'di nub phyogs logs nas 'khor mang po 'di dag la snang bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:139b-9: gang la 'od kyi reg pa de dag thams cad lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:139b-10: sems bde bar gyur pa de thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:139b-11: de la bcom ldan 'das des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:139b-13: legs par nyon la yid la zungs shig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:139b-14: khyod la dgrol zhing bshad par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:139b-15: 'di nas nub phyogs yongs su 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med ba bye ba brgya stong 'das pa'i pha rol na sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed ces bya ba yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:139b-16: de na sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa zhes bya ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:139b-19: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:139b-22: bde bar gshegs pa; 'jig rten mkhyen pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:139b-23: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:139b-26: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba 'khor mang pos yongs su bskor nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:140a-0: @140a *// 'khor mang po thams cad la thabs mkhas pa chen po drin lan bsab pa'i mdo sde ston cing sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:140a-1: bde ba'i don gyi phyir sems can thams cad kyi log par lta ba'i zug rdu rtsa nas gdon pa'i phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:140a-2: sems thog ma pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag byang chub kyi lam las phyir mi ldog cing brtan par bya ba'i phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:140a-4: rang sangs rgyas thams cad mthar phyin pa'i theg pa gcig gi lam la dgod pa'i phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:140a-5: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams myur du mngon par byang chub cing sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa'i phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:140a-6: sems can thams cad kyi drin lci ba dran par bya ba'i phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:140a-7: sems can thams cad sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho las dgrol ba'i phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:140a-8: so so'i skye bo mtha' dag pha ma dag la sri zhu bya bar 'dod pa'i phyir 'od 'di snang bar gyur pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:140a-9: de'i tshe 'khor de'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor mang po'i ston pa dang gtso bor gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:140a-10: stong phrag bcu snyed stan las langs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:140a-11: bla gos phyogs gcig tu byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:140a-12: pus mo g-yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te; bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:140a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag cag rnams mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der mchi zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:140b-0: de bzhin @140b gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa la mchod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:140b-2: thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas kyi drin lan bsab pa'i mdo dam pa nyan cing mchi bar byin gyis brlab tu gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:140b-3: de nas sangs rgyas des byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:140b-5: khyed mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:140b-6: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la mchod cing bkur sti bya ba dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:150b-8: thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa'i mdo las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:150b-9: gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ba ste dang po'o ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:150b-10: de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor mang po 'dus pa der rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i padmo'i sdong po dngul las byas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:150b-12: gzhi ni rin po che shel las byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:150b-13: mu tig gi dra bas kun tu brgyan pa gcig sa de nyid nas byung bar gyur to; ;de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa bzhugs pa las bzhengs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:150b-14: pad po de la skyil mo krung bcas nas bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:150b-15: de la bzhugs ma thag tu yongs su dag pa'i sku mngon par bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:150b-16: sku de las lam rgyud lnga'i lus kyi tshogs bstan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:150b-17: lus kyi tshogs re re la yang gzugs tha dad pa rnam pa khri brgya stong snyed bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:151a-0: gzugs rnam pa de re re la @151a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:151a-1: yang sku'i tshogs sku'i tshogs brgya stong snyed bstan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:151a-2: sku'i tshogs de dag re re la yang gangg'a'i klung bzhi'i phye ma snyed kyi sku'i tshogs snyed bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:151a-3: gangg'a'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi sku'i tshogs de dag re re la yang gling bzhi'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi sku'i tshogs bstan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:151a-4: rdul phra rab nyid kyi sku'i tshogs de dag re re la yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab snyed kyi sku'i tshogs bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:151a-5: rdul phra rab nyid kyi sku'i tshogs de dag re re la yang phyogs bcur phyogs re rer yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi rdul phra rab kyi sku'i tshogs bstan nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:151a-6: nam mkha' dbyings kyis klas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:151a-7: chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:151a-8: bsam gyis mi khyab pa snyed kyi sems can gyi lus kyi tshogs mngon par bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:151a-9: de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pas de snyed kyi lus kyi tshogs mngon par bstan nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:151a-11: phyogs bcu nas 'dus shing tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:151a-12: 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:151a-14: deng de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis yang dag pa'i tshig gang yin pa de bka' stsal bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:151a-15: chos la tshig tu bzod pa med mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:151b-0: de bzhin gshegs pas thabs @151b mkhas pa'i dbang gis mtshan ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:151b-1: ming med pa'i chos la ming dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:151b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa ni thog mar skyes shing 'khor bar 'khor ba'i tshe; bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi lus kyi tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa de dag thams cad rdzogs par myong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:151b-5: de ltar lus kyi tshogs de dag kun myong bas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:151b-6: sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i pha mar ma gyur pa med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:151b-7: de bzhin gshegs pas kyang sems can gyi pha mar ma gyur pa med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:151b-8: pha mar gyur pa thams cad kyi phyir rgyun du shin tu spyad dka' ba yang spyad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:151b-9: shin tu gtang dka' ba'i yan lag gi dam pa mgo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:151b-19: rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:151b-26: dgos pa'i yo byad thams cad gang yang ma btang ba med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:151b-27: shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus kyis tshul khrims bsrungs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:151b-32: spyod pa dka' ba thams cad spyad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:151b-34: ngal ba med cing rgyun mi 'chad par brtson 'grus su 'bad pa yang pha ma la sri zhu bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:152a-1: dang; drin lan bsab pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:152a-2: sems can thams cad myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:152a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:152a-4: de ltar na sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi bka' drin chen po yod par shes par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:152a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen pos sems can yongs su mi gtong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:152a-6: rtag par shin tu thabs mkhas pas khams gsum pa'i srid pa nyi shu rtsa lngar gnas pa'i sems can thams cad la bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bar du mnyam snyoms pa'i byams pa bsgoms shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:152a-7: btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i thabs mkhas pas spyod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:152a-8: sems can thams cad stong pa nyid du rtogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:152a-10: phung po lnga stong pa nyid du rtogs shing phyir mi nur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:152a-12: mi rgod pa stong pa nyid du yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid la thabs mkhas pas bsgom par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:152a-13: theg pa gsum mi spong zhing chub par slob pa'i thabs la mkhas pas shin tu zab mo'i spyod yul dam pa spyad pa la thabs mkhas bar bya ba'i phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:152a-14: chos kyi mtshan nyid la shin tu gsal bar rtogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:152a-15: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thog ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:152b-0: @152b tha ma'i bar du gcig ma yin par rtogs shing chud kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:152b-1: so so'i skye bo dag ni myos shing bslad pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:152b-2: gdung ba gsum gyis yongs su gdungs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:152b-3: sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtshor nub par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:152b-4: phyin ci log bzhis bsgribs pas zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos la phyin ci log tu gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:152b-5: mi bden par kun tu rtog pas bdag med pa la bdag tu lta /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:152b-6: mi rtag pa la rtag par lta /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:152b-7: mi bde ba la bde bar lta /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:152b-8: mi gtsang ba la gtsang bar lta zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:152b-13: skad cig tu mi rtag pas sgrib pa lnga dang; kun nas glag pa bcus kun tu glags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:152b-14: srid pa gsum du 'khor zhing skye shi thog ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:152b-15: tha ma med pa myong bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:152b-16: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pas ci dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:152b-17: cir 'phrod pa bzhin sde snod gsum dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:152b-18: mdo sde dgu nas mdo sde bcu gnyis kyi bar du rnam par phye zhing bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:152b-19: so so'i 'dod pa bzhin mdo sde mang po gsungs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:152b-20: tshig la chags pa kha cig bdag ni 'di kho nas chog ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:152b-21: mya ngan las 'das pa thob ces 'dzin pa yang yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:152b-22: de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi thugs rje chen po'i smon lam gyi shugs kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na las mthun pa thams cad bsdus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:153a-0: de ltar las mthun pa kun 'dus pa 'khor mang po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir dam pa'i chos mdo sde gsungs @153a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:153a-2: gzugs brnyan gyi chos nam du yang rgyun mi 'chad cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:153a-3: so so'i skye bo thams cad bde ba chen po thob par mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:153a-4: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa 'dul zhing ston pa yang dus las mi yol bar gshegs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:153a-5: dus las mi yol bar mya ngan las 'da'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:153a-6: 'jig rten gyi khams kha cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:153a-8: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:153a-13: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:153a-16: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes grags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:153a-17: skabs kha cig tu ni dga' ldan gnas su gshegs nas lha rnams kyi ston pa mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:153a-18: skabs kha cig tu ni dga' ldan gnas nas babs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:153a-19: 'dzam bu'i gling du sku tshe lo brgyad cur bzhugs par yang ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:153a-20: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:153a-21: 'jig rten gyi khams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:153a-22: las kyi rnam par smin pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:153a-23: sems can gyi bsam pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:153a-24: bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:153a-25: klu'i mthu yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:153a-26: 'di ni sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:153b-0: sems can thams cad @153b kyis sangs rgyas kyi thugs la dgongs pa shes par 'dod na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:153b-1: sems can dbang po zhan pa tha ma'i bar du yang kun shes par mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:153b-2: sems can thams cad las gang yang sangs rgyas mthong bar 'dod na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:153b-3: de ma thag tu mthong bar mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:153b-4: gal te mthong bar mi mdzad na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:153b-5: mig sngar bab kyang mi mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:153b-6: de bas na nyan thos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:153b-7: rang sangs rgyas dag lha'i mig gi mngon par shes pa yod kyang mthong bar mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:153b-10: sangs rgyas kyis 'od zer chen po bskyed nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:153b-11: srid pa'i rtse mo man chad mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba yan chad snang bar mdzad kyang gang 'dul ba'i skal ba dang ldan pas ni mthong bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:153b-12: gang skal ba dang mi ldan pas ni mig sngar bab kyang mi mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:153b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa skabs kha cig tu ni ched du skul ba mdzad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:153b-14: skabs cig tu ni cang mi gsung bas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:153b-15: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:153b-16: shin tu dpag par dka' ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:153b-17: shin tu shes shing rtogs par dka' na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:153b-18: ji ltar khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la spyod pa dka' ba shin tu zab mo dri ba spobs par gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:153b-19: khyod kyis zhus pa 'di ni yang dag par sems can thams cad la byams shing snying brtse ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:153b-20: ngan 'gro gsum gyi lam bkag nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:153b-22: mi'i lam btod pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:154a-0: @154a *// ngas da khyod la pha ma la sri zhu bya ba'i spyad dka' ba mdo tsam zhig bstan par bya yi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:154a-1: legs par nyon la yid la zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:154a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:154a-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:154a-4: 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:154a-5: sngon byung ba bskal ba tshad med pa mtha' yas grangs med pa 'das pa'i pha rol na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:154a-6: yul w'a ra n'a sir sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:154a-8: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:154a-13: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:154a-18: mi'i ston pa 'jig rten du byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:154a-19: sangs rgyas de'i sku tshe'i tshad kyang bskal pa chung ngu nyi shur bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:154a-20: dam pa'i chos kyang bskal pa chung ngu nyi shur gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:154a-21: gzugs brnyan gyi chos kyang bskal pa chung ngu nyi shur gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:154a-22: gzugs brnyan gyi chos la spyod pa'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:154a-23: mi'i rgyal po r'a dza zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:154a-24: yul w'a ra n'a si la dbang sgyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:154a-25: rgyal po de la btsun mo ni nyi khri yod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:154a-26: blon po ni bzhi stong snyed yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:154a-27: bal gyi glang po che yang lnga brgya yod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:154b-0: rgyal @154b phran drug cu la dbang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:154b-1: grong khyer brgyad brgya zhig yod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:154b-2: rgyal po de la bu gsum yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:154b-3: gsum char yang rgyal phran re re byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:154b-4: de'i tshe de'i dus na yul w'a ra n'a si'i rgyal po de mkhas shing shes rab dang ldan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:154b-5: rtag tu yang drang ba'i chos kyis yul gyi srid 'dzin pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:154b-6: gang yang gtams las chad ces bya ba med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:154b-8: yon tan gyi mthus char chu dus las mi yol te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:154b-9: lo tog rgyun du legs pas de na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyang bde skyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:154b-10: de'i tshe na w'a ra n'a si'i rgyal po de la blon po nag po sgra gcan zhes bya ba zhig yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:154b-11: blon po sgra gcan rgyal po la 'khus nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:154b-12: dmag rnam bzhi bshams pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:154b-17: dpung bu chung gi tshogs bshams nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:154b-18: w'a ra n'a si'i rgyal po la brgal nas rgyal po'i srog bcad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:154b-19: de ltar rgyal po bsad nas kyang dmag gi tshogs rnam pa bzhi bkye nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:154b-20: mtha'i rgyal phran rgyal bu rab kyang bsad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:154b-21: de nas rgyal bu 'bring po yang phab nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:154b-22: mtha'i rgyal phran rgyal bu tha chung gi thog tu dmag drang bar bshams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:154b-23: rgyal bu tha chung de ngo mtshar du gzugs byad bzang la 'phags par mdzes shing rang bzhin gyis dge ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:155a-0: smra'o cog kyang phan pa'i don tu smra zhing @155a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:155a-2: rtag tu drang po'i chos kyis yul gyi srid 'dzin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:155a-3: log pas mi 'tsho bas yul mi rnams kyang bde skyid la dar ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:155a-4: longs spyod dang nor ni rin po cher ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:155a-6: rgyal po de'i yon tan la kun gyis bsngags shing bstod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:155a-8: 'jig rten gyi lha thams cad kyis kyang dga' zhing bkur ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:155a-9: de'i tshe na rgyal po de la rgyal bu su sha de ba zhes bya ba gcig pu zhig yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:155a-10: shin tu yid gzhungs shing gsal ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:155a-11: byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa; sbyin pa la dga' ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:155a-12: lus kyi mdog gser du 'dug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:155a-13: gnas bdun mnyam par gang ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:155a-14: skyes bu'i mtshan rdzogs par ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:155a-15: lo bdun lon pa zhig yod pa de la yab rgyal po yang shin tu byams shing sdug par sems so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:155a-16: de'i tshe na pho brang srung ba'i lha zhig rgyal po de la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:155a-19: blon po sgra gcan 'khus nas yul srid phrogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:155a-21: dmag gi tshogs bzhi yang bkye nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:155a-22: rgyal po gcen gnyis kyang srog gi dbang po dang phral te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:155a-23: dmag gi tshogs rnams ring po mi thogs par 'dir phyin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:155a-24: rgyal po ci'i phyir srog bskyabs shing gud du mi 'gro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:155a-25: de'i tshe na rgyal po des de skad ces smras pa thos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:155b-0: lus kyi @155b ba spu kun zing zhes byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:155b-1: lus kyang 'dar nas yi mug cing mya ngan gyis sems gdungs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:155b-2: sa la 'gre zhing brgyal bar gyur nas ring zhig lon pa dang cung zad sangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:155b-3: dal gyis nam mkha'i lha la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:155b-4: 'di ltar smra ba'i skad ni yod la gzugs ni mi snang ba khyod ci yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:155b-5: smras pa'i tshig 'di yang dag par bden nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:155b-7: bdag ni rgyal po'i pho brang srung ba'i lha yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:155b-8: rgyal po khyod shes pa dang ldan zhing bsod nams dang yon tan bcas pas drang po'i chos kyi yul srid 'dzin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:155b-9: de bas na bdag gis sngar smras pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:155b-10: sdug bsngal gyis nyon mongs par ma gyur par myur du byol zhing 'gro ba'i rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:155b-11: de nas rgyal po de pho brang du zhugs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:155b-12: da ni bdag yul gzhan zhig tu 'gro dgos so snyam du bsams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:155b-14: yul pha rol tu 'gro ba'i lam gnyis yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:155b-15: lam nye bar zhugs na ni zhag bdun gyis pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:155b-16: lam ring por zhugs na ni zhag bcu bzhis phyin par 'gyur bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:155b-17: ci nas lam nye bar 'gro'o snyam bsams nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:155b-18: zhag bdun gyi rgyags dang chas te pho brang gi phyi rol tu phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:155b-19: phyir pho brang gi nang du log nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:155b-20: rgyal bu su sha de ba pang du blangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:155b-21: mig mi 'dzum par lta zhing dngangs pa ltar langs nas phyir yang 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:156a-1: btsun mos de ltar mi bde zhing skrag pa ltar gyur pa mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:156a-2: rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:156a-4: ci'i slad du 'jigs shing skrag pa lta bu'i gzugs ston cing sku la yang rdul gyis gos pa lta bu skra yang 'dzings te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:156a-5: dbugs kyang mi bde ste yul stor la thug pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:156a-6: mdza' sdug pa dang bye ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:156a-7: dgra sdang ba dang phrad pa lta bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:156a-8: bkra mi shis pa'i mtshan ma dag gda' ba 'di ci lags bstan du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:156a-10: kho bo ci nyes pa khyod kyis shes pa ma yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:156a-14: rgyal por lus gzugs gnyis kyang sems gcig ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:156a-17: lus kyi rkang pa gnyis sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:156a-19: de dang 'dra na ci'i slad du bdag la gsang ste mi gsung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:156a-20: rgyal pos btsun mo la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:156a-22: blon po sgra gcan ngan sems skyes nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:156a-24: yab rgyal po yang dkrongs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:156a-25: gcen rgyal bu gnyis kyi srog gi bar chad byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:156a-26: da lta dmag dang chas te nga la rgol du 'ongs pas kho bo yul gzhan du 'byol du 'gro zhes smras nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:156a-27: rgyal bu dge don bang du blangs te lam du zhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:156a-28: de nas btsun mo yang rgyal po'i phyir 'brangs te song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:156b-0: de'i @156b tshe rgyal po mya ngan gyis non te yid 'khrugs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:156b-1: zhag bcu bzhi'i lam du zhugs pas lam yang nor te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:156b-2: lam de yang bgrod dka' zhing rtsva yang rtsub pa chu tsam yang med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:156b-3: zhag du ma zhig song song ba las rgyags kyang chad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:156b-4: thog ma gsang ste rgyal po gcig pu 'gro bar byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:156b-5: zhag bdun gyi rgyags las kyang ma brdzangs pa las lam yang nor /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:156b-6: mi gsum gyis kyang zos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:156b-7: zhag bcu bzhi'i lam du zhugs pas da dung lam ring zhig yod pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:156b-8: rgyags kyang chad nas de'i tshe rgyal po dang btsun mos skad phyung nas ngus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:156b-11: thog ma btsas nas da tsam gyi bar du 'di 'dra ba ma myong ba da 'dir myong bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:156b-12: da 'dir sdug cing phongs so zhes zer te lag pas mgo la brdabs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:156b-13: sa la 'gre zhing lus la rdul gyis gos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:156b-14: tshig 'di skad du smre sngags 'don to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:156b-15: bdag cag gis tshe snga ma la sdig pa mi dge ba'i las ci zhig byas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:156b-18: 'on te dam pa'i chos la skur pa btab bam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:156b-19: 'on te mthun pa'i dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:156b-21: nya pa byas sam; 'on te srang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:156b-22: pre bcos te pha rol la phrog rlom byas sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:156b-23: 'on te dge 'dun gyi nor la spyod spyod dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:156b-24: ci byas na 'di 'dra ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur cig gu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:157a-0: @157a *// de skad smra zhing cung zad bstir ni dgras slebs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:157a-1: srog gi bar chad nges par 'byung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:157a-2: lam du zhugs nas 'gror ni bkres pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:157a-3: skom pas nyen nas srog la bab tu cha'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:157a-5: btsun mo de lta bu'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen te skad phyung ste dus pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:157a-6: sa la 'gyel nas brgyal bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:157a-7: de nas ring zhig lon pa dang sangs nas 'di snyam du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:157a-8: gsum char lhan cig tu 'di kho nar 'chi bar 'gyur gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:157a-9: btsun mo bsad la bdag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:157a-10: bu'i srog thar bar bya'o snyam bsams nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:157a-11: ral gri phyung ste btsun mo gsad par bshams pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:157a-12: rgyal bu dge don gyis rgyal po'i lag pa nas bzung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:157a-13: da ltar ci zhig mdzad dgongs zhes gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:157a-14: yab rgyal pos mig nas mchi mas gang bzhin du rgyal bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:157a-15: khyod kyi ma btsun mo dam pa bsad la khyod kyis srog gso snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:157a-16: gal te ma bsad kyang rang 'chi bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:157a-19: bu khyod kyi srog gso ba'i phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:157a-20: khyod kyi ma btsun mo dam pa bsad snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:157a-21: de nas rgyal bu dge don gyis yab rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:157a-22: gal te btsun mo bsad par gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:157a-23: de'i sha la bdag mi 'tshal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:157a-24: gang na yang ma'i sha la bu za ba mi srid pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:157b-0: bdag kyang 'chi bar 'gyur @157b na; yab rgyal po ci'i slad du bdag bkum ste pha ma'i srog thar par mi mdzad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:157b-1: yab rgyal pos de skad smras pa thos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:157b-2: mod la khams te 'gyel nas sa la 'gre zhing rgyal bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:157b-3: khyod kho po'i mig dang 'dra na su zhig rang gi mig phyung ste za bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:157b-4: kho bo ni shi yang sla bas bu mi gsod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:157b-5: bu bsad de sha za mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:157b-6: de nas rgyal bu dge don gyis yang yab rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:157b-7: gal te yab yum gyis bdag bkum na sha khrag kyang ring po mi thogs par rul sums nas dgongs pa ma mchis par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:157b-8: bdag gi gsol pa gcig cig ma gnang na byams pa'i yab yum ma lags pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:157b-9: bdag gi yid dang mi 'gal bar mdzad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:157b-10: de nas yab rgyal pos sras rgyal bu la khyod kyi yid dang mi 'gal bar bya bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:157b-11: ci gsol ba rnams myur du smros shig ces bsgo ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:157b-12: rgyal bu dge don gyis yab rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:157b-13: yab yum gyis bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du nyin re zhing bdag gi lus las sha rgya ma gsum gsum bcad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:157b-14: cha gnyis ni yab yum la dbul /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:157b-15: vcha gcig ni bdag rang 'tshal na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:157b-16: lus srog gi zungs su 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:157b-17: de nas rgyal pos kyang rgyal bus gsol ba bzhin du gnang nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:157b-18: nyin gcig bzhin sha rgya ma gsum gsum bcad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:158a-0: @158a *// cha gnyis ni rgyal po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:158a-2: cha gcig ni rgyal bu rang za ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:158a-3: lus dang srog gi zungs byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:158a-4: lam du zhugs te song song ba las zhag gnyis kyis yul pha rol ma slebs par rgyal bu'i lus kyi sha zad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:158a-7: srog gi lhag ma tsam zhig lus nas sa la 'gyel to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:158a-9: btsun mos rgyal bu pang du blangs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:158a-10: skad chen po phyung nas cho nges chen po btab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:158a-12: nged gnyis kyis ma rig pas khyod kyi sha zos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:158a-13: khyod 'di lta bu'i na tsha'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:158a-14: lam yang da dung ring bas khyod kyis lus kyi sha ni zad de; da ni lhan cig tu gnas 'dir ro bzhag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:158a-15: de nas rgyal bu dge don gyis skad chung dus yab rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:158a-16: da ni 'di nas pha rol du zhag gcig tsam gyis lam las ma lus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:158a-17: bdag ni g-yo zhing bskyod mi nus pas srog 'dir 'dor ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:158a-19: btsun mo ni mi ma rabs ngan pa ltar lhan cig tu gnas 'dir ro gzhag go ma gsungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:158a-20: bdag la byams shing thugs brtse bar dgongs na bdag gis bsams pa dang mi 'gal bar mdzad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:158b-0: da dung yang bdag gis rus pa'i gseb na sha ci yod pa ma lus par gtogs la yul pha rol tu @158b gshegs su gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:158b-1: de nas rgyal pos yang rgyal bus gsol pa bzhin du tshigs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:158b-2: rus pa'i gseb na sha ci yod pa zad par btogs nas cha gsum du bgos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:158b-3: cha gnyis ni rgyal po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:158b-5: cha gcig ni rgyal bu rang gis zos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:158b-7: btsun mo yang lam du zhugs nas dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:158b-8: rgyal bu dge don langs nas 'greng bzhin rgyal po dang btsun mo song ba la lta'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:158b-10: btsun mo gnyis skad chung nas ngu bzhin song nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:158b-11: rgyal bu dge don gyi mig gis mi song kyi bar du rgyal po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:158b-12: btsun mo la chags pa'i sems kyis mig mi 'dzum par lta lta nas ring zhig lon pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:158b-15: khrag gi dri bro pas phyogs bcu nas sbrang ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:158b-17: rgyal bu yo ga pa tsam du lus la za zhing 'jus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:158b-19: de'i tshe na rgyal bu de srog gi lhag ma tsam zhig ma chad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:158b-20: skad phyung nas 'di skad ces smon lam du btab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:158b-21: bdag gi sngon gyi mi dge ba'i las rnams ni 'dis byang zhing zad par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:158b-22: deng slan chad mi bgyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:158b-23: bdag gi lus pha ma la phul te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:158b-24: sbyin pa byas pas bdag gi pha ma snga ma bas lhag pa'i bsod nams bcu gcig dang ldan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:158b-27: rmi lam ngan pa mi rmi ba dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:159a-9: skye shir 'khor ba'i nad lci ba sel bar shog cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:159a-10: rgyal bus de skad smon lam btab pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:159a-11: gnam sa yang rnam pa drug tu g-yos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:159a-12: nyi ma yang 'od mi gsal bar gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:159a-14: ri dvags rnams kyang skrag nas kun tu rgyug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:159a-17: sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi bar du yang rab tu g-yas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:159a-18: de'i tshe brgya byin lha'i dbang pos 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:159a-19: 'dzam bu'i gling dag tu babs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:159a-20: rgyal bu dge don bsdigs pa'i phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:159a-23: 'phar sbyang las sogs pa'i lus su sprul nas mig bsgrad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:159a-25: spu bsgreng nas skad chen po'i nga ro phyung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:159a-26: rgyal bu la mtshong ba bzhin bsdigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:159b-0: de'i tshe rgyal bu dge don gyis gcan gzan khro bo de dag mthong @159b nas kyang skad mi che bas 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:159b-1: khyed rnams kho bo za 'dod na ci bder zo zhig /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:159b-3: de nas brgya byin lha'i dbang pos smras pa /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:159b-16: bdag ni bdud kyi rgyal po'am /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:159b-22: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:159b-24: khyod ni shin tu yang gti mug can zhig yin pa 'dra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:159b-25: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni yun ring po nas shin tu dga' pas bsgrubs pas gzod 'grub ce'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:160a-3: gal te lcags kyi 'khor lo 'bar ba bdag gi spyi bo'i steng na rgyun du 'khor yang sdug bsngal de tsam gyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:160a-5: khyod kyis smras pa stong pa 'di la su zhig yid ches par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:160a-6: de nas rgyal bus dam bcas nas smon lam 'di skad ces btab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:160a-7: gal te bdag gi smra ba'i chig rdzun te lha'i dbang po bslus par gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:160a-8: bdag gi lus kyi rma 'di nam du yang 'tsho bar ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:160a-9: gal te smra ba'i tshig bden na bdag gi lus kyang sor chud cing khrag kyang 'o mar gyur cig ces smras ma thag tu /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:160a-12: langs nas lha'i dbang po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:160a-13: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rgyal bu khyod legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:160a-15: shin tu dpa' ba'i brtson 'grus kyis gdon mi za bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:160a-16: ring por mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:160b-0: thog mar bdag gis don mdzad par gyur @160b cig ces smras nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:160b-1: brgya byin lha'i dbang po yang nam mkha'i phyogs de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:160b-3: btsun mo yang rgyal po pha rol po de'i drung du phyin nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:160b-4: rgyal po des kyang rgyang ma nas bsu nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:160b-5: dgos pa'i yo byad yid bzhin du sbyar ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:160b-7: btsun mo des rgyal bus lus kyi sha khrag gis pha ma la ji ltar bstabs pa rgyal po de la zhib tu brjod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:160b-8: rgyal po des ji ltar brjod pa de dag thos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:160b-9: rgyal bu des lus gyi sha khrag gis pha ma la bstabs pas sri zhu cher byas pa'i drin lan bsabs nas dmag rnam bzhi bshams nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:160b-10: rgyal po de dang yul w'a ra n'a sir dmag drangs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:160b-11: de'i tshe rgyal po de dmag rnam bzhi dang chas nas lam du zhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:160b-12: rgyal bu dang bral ba'i gnas su phyin pa dang; 'di snyam du bdag gi bu ni gdon mi za bar 'di nyid du shi na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:160b-13: bu'i rus ba tsam bsdus te phyir bdag gi yul du bkur ro snyam du bsams nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:160b-14: skad phyung nas ngu zhing bu'i rus bu sdud du song song ba la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:160b-15: rgyang ma nas bdag gi bu lus kyi rma yang sos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:160b-16: sngar bas kyang bzang zhing mdzes te drung du 'ongs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:160b-17: de nas rgyal pos pang du blangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:160b-18: khyod da dung gson nam zhes smras pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:160b-19: rgyal bus ji ltar gyur pa yab rgyal po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:160b-22: btsun mo rab tu dga' ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:161a-0: thams cad ban glang la zhon @161a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:161a-1: nas; phyir bdag gi yul du phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:161a-2: rgyal bu de'i bsod nams kyi mthus bdag gi yul yang phyir thob nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:161a-3: rgyal bu don grub rgyal por dbang bskur te rgyal por bcug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:161a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyi kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:161a-5: de'i tshe de'i dus na yab rgyal por gyur pa de gzhan yin snyam du khyod sems na; de de ltar mi blta'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:161a-7: de'i tshe de'i dus na yab rgyal po de ni da ltar nga'i yab zas gtsang ma zhes bya bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:161a-8: de'i tshe de'i dus na yum du gyur pa de ni gzhan yin pa snyam du khyod sems na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:161a-10: de ni da ltar nga'i yum lha mdzes zhes bya ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:161a-11: de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu don grub ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod sems na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:161a-13: de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu de ni da ltar sh'akya thub pa zhes bya ba nga yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:161a-14: de'i tshe de'i dus na brgya byin lha'i dbang por gyur pa de ni da ltar kun shes koondi n+ya zhes bya ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:161a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyi pha ma la sri zhu byed pa'i le'u 'di bstan pa'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:161a-16: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de na byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag nyi shu snyed kyi 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:161a-17: bde ba'i don la mkhas pa'i tshig gi spobs pa thob par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:161b-0: byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag bcu @161b gnyis kyis mi skye ba'i chos la chos kyi bzod pa thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:161b-2: phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i nyan thos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:161b-4: rdul phra rab snyed kyis theg pa gnyis kyi sems spangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:161b-5: theg pa gcig gis mthar phyin par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:161b-7: dge bsnyen ma rdul phra rab snyed kyis 'bras bu dang po nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:161b-8: theg pa gnyis kyi 'bras bu'i bar du thob par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:161b-10: mi brgya stong snyed ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:161b-11: de ma yin pa lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:161b-15: dri za dang; nam mkha' lding dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:161b-19: mi ma lags pa la sogs pa'i tshogs mang po rnams la la ni bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:161b-21: rang sangs rgyas kyi bar du sems bskyed par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:161b-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:161b-23: byang chub sems dpa' dag gis sems can thams cad kyi don du pha ma la sri zhu bya ba'i phyir lus kyi sha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:161b-24: khrag gis kyang pha ma la bstabs shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:161b-25: shin tu spyad dka' ba spyod pa ni 'di lta bu yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:161b-26: 'khor mang po thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa thos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:161b-27: so so nas phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:161b-29: dga' mgu rangs nas mgo bos phyag btsal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:162a-1: nas bskor ba byas nas phyir dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:162a-2: thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa'i mdo las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:162a-3: sri zhu'i le'u zhes bya ste gnyis pa'o ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:162a-4: thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa'i mdo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:162a-6: de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang po'i nang na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:162a-7: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis skar ma mang po zil gyis mnan pa lta bu 'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:162a-8: klu 'khyil ba'i 'ja' tshon ltar 'tsher zhing gsal ba la lta na mig mi chags pa bzhin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:162a-9: bsam na yid 'phrul ba tsam du 'od zer lham me lhang nger bzhugs te dper mi bzod pa ni srin bu me khyer gyis 'od nyi ma shar ma thag tu mi snang pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:162a-10: nyi zla la 'od zer brgya stong snyed yod kyang brgya byin gyis drung na sol phung lta bu 'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:162a-11: brgya byin la 'od gsal ba yod kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:162a-12: tshangs pa chen po'i 'od zer gyi drung na gyo mo 'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:162a-15: nor bu rin po che'i 'od du bskrun pa tsam mam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:162a-16: tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen po la 'od zer dam pa brgya stong snyed yod pa'i 'od thams cad kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:162a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyi drung na sol ba'i phung po ltar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:162a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyi mdog gang gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu snang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:162b-0: @162b de dag na gnas pa'i sems can dag la 'od zer des reg na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:162b-1: dmus long ni mig gis gzugs mthong bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:162b-2: lus sgur bo ni lus rangs par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:162b-3: dbang po nyams pa rnams ni dbang po tshang zhing yan lag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:162b-4: nying lag dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:162b-5: myos pa rnams ni dran pa phyir rnyed par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:162b-6: mdor na ji tsam du yid du mi 'ong ba thams cad dang bral te 'dod pa bzhin thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:162b-7: de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nyid du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdun cu snyed stan las langs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:162b-8: sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:162b-9: lan brgya stong bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod de /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:164a-11: bdag cag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu sangs rgyas kyi chos bsrung zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:164a-12: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu rgyas par bgyi zhing rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi'o //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:164b-2: bde ba'i yon tan 'di lta bu dag dran phas de bzhin gshegs pa la ston pa chen por 'du shes skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:164b-3: byams pa'i pha ma lta bu'i 'du shes skyes nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:164b-4: rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi bka' drin dran te /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:164b-7: dam pa'i chos thos pas ring po mi thogs par byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:164b-8: dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:164b-12: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdun cu po 'di dag yun ring po nas bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi rdul phra rab snyed kyi sngon rol na /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:164b-14: sangs rgyas de dag las rtag tu tshangs par spyad pa spyod cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:164b-15: rgyal ba de dag la mi skyo ba'i sems kyis mnyes par byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:164b-16: byams pas bdag gis lus bsrungs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:165a-0: snying rje chen pos rgyun du phyogs bcur @165a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:165a-1: thams cad la phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:165a-3: sems can gang zhig tha ma shi kar byang chub sems dpa' de dag la gcig gi ming ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:165a-6: bdun cu'i bar du rdzogs par thos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:165a-7: de la srog phyogs skyabs su song na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:165a-8: tshe 'phos ma thag tu gang na sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su pad mo las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:165a-9: 'dod chags dang yongs su bral ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:165a-10: mngal gyi gnas nas mi skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:165a-11: mnam zhing btsog pa dang bral bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:165a-14: thams cad yid du 'ong zhing bkur sti byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:165a-15: kun gyi yid du 'ong zhing bkur sti byas pas sems rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:165a-16: sems rab tu dga' bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:165a-17: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:165a-18: sems can thams cad la byams pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:165a-19: snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:165a-21: snying rje'i sems bskyed pas 'gro ba ma lus pa la btang snyoms su mi gtong pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:165a-23: sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:165b-1: gzhan gyi don byed pa'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:165b-3: bar chad du 'gyur ba bsal ba'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:165b-4: nyon mongs pa zhi bar byed pa'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:165b-5: dge ba'i ba shes gnyen la bsnyen cing rtag tu bkur sti byed pa'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:165b-6: 'dun pa'i yid kyi chos nyan pa'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:165b-7: mi brjed par yid la byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:165b-8: don bzang po gzungs su 'dzin pa'i sems dang; nyung du thos la don mang du shes pa'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:165b-9: mang du thos la don mi shes pa mi 'dod pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:165b-10: de nas yang dag nyid la dad pa'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:165b-11: de bzhin nyid kyi don bden pa la dad pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:165b-12: yang dag pa'i don bden pa la dad pa'i sems skyes pas ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:165b-13: ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sems skyes pas phyir mi ldog pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:165b-14: de ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i sems skyes pas sems can thams cad la mnyam snyoms pa'i gnyen po'i sems skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:165b-15: ji ltar bdag khams gsum pa'i srid pa nyi shu rtsa lngar skye bar mi dga' ba bzhin du gzugs yod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:165b-19: grog sbur nas srog chags thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:165b-20: de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:166a-1: gi bar du stor yang pha rol po'i srog 'phrog pa'i las mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:166a-2: ji ltar bdag la nor rdzas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:166a-13: lus kyi yan lag gi bar du longs spyod rnams la srung zhing rim gro byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:166a-14: gzhan gyis khyer zhing 'phrog pa la mi dga' ba bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:166a-15: de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag gi lus dang srog stor kyang sems can rnams kyi nor dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:166a-19: longs spyod la 'phrog pa'i sems mi skyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:166a-20: ji ltar bdag gi gzugs dam pa sring mo'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:166a-22: slas la gzhan gyis mi rigs par byed mi 'dod pa de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:166a-23: de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag gi lus dang srog stor kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:166a-24: pha rol po'i gzugs dam pa la 'du shes ngan pa log pa'i sems mi skyed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:166a-25: mi rigs pa'i chos ngan pa lta ci smos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:166a-26: ji ltar bdag phra ma dang tshig rtsub po 'khrug par 'gyur ba la mi dga' ba bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:166a-27: sems can rnams kyang de dang 'dra ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:166a-28: de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag gi lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:166b-0: srog @166b yal yang brdzun du smra ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:166b-1: phan tshun 'khrug pa'i tshig mi smra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:166b-2: ji ltar bdag rdo dbyug gis rdeg pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:166b-4: nan la 'bor ba la mi dga' ba bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:166b-5: de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag gi lus dang srog yal yang rdo dbyug dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:166b-7: chad pas gcad pa'i las kyis sems can rnams la mi 'tshe'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:166b-8: ji ltar bdag lcags sgrog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:166b-13: bcing bas bcings pa'i gnod pa rnams la mi dga' ba bzhin du sems can kun kyang de dang 'dra ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:166b-14: de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:166b-15: srog yal yang lcags sgrog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:166b-18: bcing ba la sogs pa'i gnod pas 'tshe bar mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:166b-19: ji ltar bdag gzhan gyis brnyas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:166b-22: dbang rlom btsan byed pa snyems shing ngan du byed pa la mi dga' ba bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:166b-23: de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag gcig pu'i lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:166b-25: tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i mi rigs pas sems can la gnod pa mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:166b-26: ji ltar bdag la pha rol po gzhan gyis bkur sti byed cing mchod dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:167a-1: ba la dga' ba bzhin du bdag kyang sems can rnams la gos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:167a-6: bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis sbyin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:167a-7: gal te bdag gis las chen po zhig bsgrub bam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:167a-11: don bsgrub pa las blos mi lcogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:167a-12: don bsgrub par ma gyur nas mi dga' zhing mya ngan gyis gdungs pa las mkhas pa blo dang ldan pa zhig gis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:167a-13: bdag gis bsgrub pa'i don ma grub pas mi dga' zhing mya ngan byed par mthong na bdag la 'di skad zer ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:167a-15: khyod mi dga' ba ma byed cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:167a-16: khyod kyi don grub pa'i grogs bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:167a-17: don yid bzhin du grub par bya'o zhes zer na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:167a-18: de la rab tu dga' ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:167a-19: de bas na bdag gis sems can la phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:167a-20: bde ba'i don du bsgrub pa'i las kyis grogs bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:167a-21: ji ltar bdag la rgyal po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:167a-25: blon po la sogs pas bzung ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:167a-27: bcings na mi dga' ba'i mya ngan gyis gdungs par gyur pa las mkhas pa blo dang ldan pa zhig gis bdag de ltar mya ngan gyis gdungs pa mthong na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:167b-0: snyan pa sgra'i tshig gis bdag @167b la khyed mya ngan ma byed cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:167b-1: khyod kyi phyir kho bos rgyal po'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:167b-2: blon po chen po la gsol ba btab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:167b-3: gal te na nor gsug sbyin pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:167b-4: thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis ci nas kyang khyod mi bde ba'i sdug bsngal las thar bar bya'o zhes zer na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:167b-5: bdag gis tshig de thos pa tsam gyis sems dga' bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:167b-6: de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni shes par bya ba'i sgyu rtsal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:167b-7: bzo'i bar du yang mthar phyin par brtson 'grus su slob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:167b-9: shes par bya ba rig pa'i gnas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:167b-11: rol mo dang; rtsed mo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:167b-21: dpyad la sogs pa la mkhas par slob ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:167b-22: de ltar sgyu rtsal ci la yang mkhas par bslabs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:167b-25: blon po chen po la sogs pa yang bsams pa'i yid dang 'gal bar mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:167b-28: longs spyod kyi rkyen gos sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:168a-11: rin po che'i yang tog bzang po'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:168a-12: longs spyod kyi yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs yod kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:168a-13: byang chub sems dpa' de la rlo ma pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:168a-15: de ltar rgyu rtsal kun la yang mkhas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:168a-16: rin po che'i bang mdzod brgya stong dang yang ldan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:168a-20: na chung bzang mo yang grangs med par yod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:168a-21: yang tog bzang po yang yod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:168a-23: khrus kyi rdzing bu la sogs pa 'dod pa'i longs spyod gang yang yod mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:168a-24: de la ma chags te rtag tu 'dod pa nyung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:168a-25: chog shes pa la dga' zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:168a-29: shing drung du bsam gtan la zhi bar gnas pa la mos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:168a-30: skye bo mang po dang smra zhing gtam zer yang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:168a-31: sems ni rtag tu gnyen po'i sgor 'jug par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:168a-32: so so'i skye bo dang spyod tshul mthun pa ltar byed kyang sems can la phan pa'i don du nor bu rin po che gtong bar byed kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:168a-33: sems can la gnod pa mi phan pa'i don mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:168b-0: gang dbul ba phongs pa nyam thag par gyur pa dag byang chub sems dpa' la slong @168b du 'ongs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:168b-1: de la ci 'dod pa bzhin byang chub sems dpa' sbyin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:168b-2: sems can gang zhig sangs rgyas kyi chos la mos shing dad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:168b-3: byang chub sems dpa' la bsnyen bkur dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:168b-4: mchod pa bya ba'i phyir rim gro dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:168b-6: rkang pa 'khru ba'i las byed dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:168b-14: mal gos spug pa'i las byed dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:168b-16: tho rang sa la mar me 'bud dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:168b-18: dro la kha zas tha na pa na dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:168b-21: 'thung ba'i skom yu li shi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:168b-22: bu lar sha ka'i 'bras bu'i skom dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:168b-24: kha ra nag po'i chu la sogs pa sbyar sbyar nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:168b-25: yo byad de lta bus zhag bdun nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:168b-26: zhag dug bcu'i bar du byang chub sems dpa' la chos 'dod pa'i phyir 'bul bar byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:168b-27: byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe mchod pa'i yo byad 'bul ba de la dga' ba'i sems med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:168b-29: byang chub sems dpa' ni bskal pa grangs med pa yun ring po nas sangs rgyas kyi chos tshol ba'i phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:168b-30: sems can thams cad la skyed 'bri'i sems med pa'i phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:168b-32: snying rje'i sems dang ldan pa'i phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:169a-2: de bas na dus kha cig tu 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:169a-3: rtag tu dge ba bcu'i chos kyis sems can gyi don byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:169a-4: sems can de dag kyang rgyal po'i yid bzhin du dga' zhing spyod pa'i tshe'i dus byas na yang lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:169a-5: mi'i 'jig rten du 'dod pa lnga'i longs spyod mchog dam pa dang ldan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:169a-6: rigs che zhing mtho bar skye bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:169a-7: bsams pa'i yid bzhin du nyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:169a-9: 'gro ba la gnod pa med par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:169a-10: gnas gang du 'gro yang bzhon pa'i rta dang theg par ldan pa ste skyed mos tshal tu rtsed mo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:169a-11: rol mo la rtse zhing longs spyod par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:169a-15: tha ma mi rtag pa brten te rga ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:169a-18: khyim gyi bu smad mya ngan gyis gdungs te skad phyung nas ngu zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:169a-19: la la ni mgo la thal mo rdebs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:169a-20: la la ni rang rang gi skra 'bal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:169a-23: shing rta'i steng du bzhag nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:169a-25: de ltar bskyal nas kyang bu smad dag phyir khyim du 'ongs nas mya ngan gyis gdungs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:169a-26: la la ni brgyal nas sa la 'gre /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:169a-27: la la ni de'i rkyen gyis nad du gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:169a-28: la la ni mi dran pas myos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:169b-0: la la tshe'i @169b bar chad du shi bar byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:169b-1: de ltar byas kyang gson pa rnams la ni phan pa med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:169b-2: shi ba la ni rab tu gnod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:169b-3: de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas te yul rgyu zhing song ba las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:169b-4: sems can mya ngan gyis gzir ba mthong nas snying brtse ba'i sems skyes te 'di skad zer ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:169b-5: rgyal po zhes bya ba ni yul sa dbang gis 'gro ba mang po'i dbang bsgyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:169b-6: de ltar dge ba bcu'i lam gyis 'gro ba rnams 'dul te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:169b-7: 'bras bu 'dod pa lnga mchog dam pa thob tu zin kyang skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:169b-11: mi rtag pa 'jigs pa las thar par ma gyur na bdag gis drang po'i chos kyis yul gyi srid btsas kyang phan pa'i don med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:169b-12: de ltar 'gro ba rnams la phan pa'i don med na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:169b-13: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po zhes kyang ji skad ces kyang bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:169b-14: byams pa chen po pha zhe'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:169b-15: sman pa'i rgyal po chen po zhe'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:169b-16: 'dren pa'i ston pa chen po zhes ji skad du gdags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:169b-17: 'dren pa'i ston pa chen po zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:169b-18: yang dag pa'i lam du 'dren cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:169b-19: mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam ston te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:169b-20: 'dus ma byas pa'i rab tu bde ba thob par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:169b-24: mi zhig skom pas gdungs nas srog la bab pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:170a-0: chu 'dod pa'i phyir phan tshun rgyugs te @170a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:170a-1: khron pa skam po zhig dang phrad nas rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyes te 'di snyam du sems so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:170a-2: da ni bdag gi lus 'di 'chi ba las phyir sos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:170a-4: gal te chu dang ma phrad na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:170a-5: srog 'di 'chi ba las yun mi ring ba las da khron pa bzang po dang phrad nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:170a-6: gdon mi za bar chu dong grang mo gtsang ma dang phrad de ngoms shing tshim par 'gyur bas srog 'tsho bar 'gyur ro snyam bsams nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:170a-7: myur ba myur bar khron pa'i drung du bsnyen to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:170a-8: khron pa'i drung du phyin nas lus la gyon pa'i gos phud de phyogs gcig tu sbas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:170a-9: chu 'dod pa'i phyir khron pa'i nang du zhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:170a-10: khron pa'i gting du phyin nas chu ni med kyi sbrul gdug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:170a-16: de la sogs pa gseg ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:170a-18: rtsa nyal nyil 'ba' zhig mthong bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:170a-19: de'i tshe skom pas nyam thag par gyur pa de thog ma re ba bzhin du chu yang ma rnyed la gdug pa mang po gzas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:170a-20: khron pa de las phyir byung bar gzas kyang khron pa rnyings shing zhig la zab kyang mda' rgyang gang tsam yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:170a-23: 'bru ba'i shing tsam yang med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:170b-0: mas @170b mchong du stsal yang nyam thag la stobs zhan pas 'phar mi nus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:170b-1: phyir yang zhabs su lhung nas sbrul gdug pa la sogs pas za zhing 'jib bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:170b-2: de cung zad cig srog ma chad kyi bar du 'di skad ces zer ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:170b-3: bdag khron pa 'di'i nang na chu med par sngar shes na lha khron pa la mig gis lta yang mi phod na 'di'i nang du zhugs pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:170b-4: de ni khron pa 'di'i rkyen gyis sdug bsngal ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:170b-6: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po yang de ltar so so'i skye bo dag gcig shi ba'i 'og tu khyim gang gis smad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:170b-7: gnyen rnams kyi sdug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:170b-8: bye bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa mthong nas 'di skad zer ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:170b-9: bdag gi lus 'di ni khron pa skam po de dang 'dra ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:170b-10: khron pa'i ming tsam yod kyi chu ni med pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:170b-11: 'jug pa yod kyang thob pa med pas de lta bu'i lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:170b-12: srog stor ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:170b-13: da ltar bdag 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i dbang bsgyur zhing rin po che sna bdun dang ldan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:170b-14: dge ba bcu'i las kyi 'gro ba 'dul zhing drang po'i chos kyi yul gyi srid btsas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:170b-15: skye bo mang po dag lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:170b-16: mi'i mtho ris kyi gnas su bkod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:171a-0: 'dod pa lnga'i yon tan mchog dam pa la longs spyod du bcug kyang de @171a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:171a-7: dgra sdang ba dang phrad pa'i sdug bsngal las thar bar mi nus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:171a-8: gcig la gcig du zhing cho nge byed pa 'di ni bdag gis nyes kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:171a-9: sems can rnams kyis ma nyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:171a-11: bdag la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos 'gro ba mang po la phan pa'i don du 'gyur ba med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:171a-12: bdag las dge ba'i chos 'dod cing rab tu bde ba 'dod kyang sdug bsngal gyi mtsho las brgal mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:171a-13: de'i tshe 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:171a-15: de ltar bdag gi lus 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:171a-18: gti mug can gyi sbyin bdag dang 'dra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:171a-19: de'i tshe dus gzhan zhig na lo bdun gyi bar du char pa ma bab pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:171a-20: than pa chen po byung ste rtsi shing yang bskams /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:171a-21: 'bru yang rab tu dkon par gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:171a-22: mu ge chen po byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:171a-23: gcig la gcig 'cha' zhing za bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:171a-24: gcig gi sha khrag la gcig za ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:171a-25: la la ni bu'i sha khrag la pha ma za /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:171a-26: la la ni pha ma'i sha la bu za zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:171a-31: bu mo yang gcig gi sha la gcig za bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:171a-32: de'i tshe na sbyin bdag chen po de 'chag cing 'phyan du song song ba las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:171b-0: @171b sems can mang po dag ltogs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:171b-2: rid cing bskams la nyam chung la mdog ngan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:171b-3: skra yang 'dzings bras lus gnag la rke ba dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:171b-4: phrag pa la mi ro khur du khyer te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:171b-5: kha cig ni mi'i mgo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:171b-17: nying lag gi bar du khyer /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:171b-23: gzhang rnams khyer pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:171b-24: de lta bu dag mthong nas sbyin bdag des de dag mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:171b-25: khyed khur du khyer ba 'di dag ci yin zhes dris so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:171b-27: bdag cag gi khur du khyer ba 'di dag ni mi ro ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:171b-36: nying lag gi bar du khyer ba 'di ci dgos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:171b-37: ci zhig bya zhes dris pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:171b-40: mu ge chen po byung nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:171b-41: 'bru rab tu dkon par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:171b-42: mi kun ltogs nas da ltar gcig la gcig za bas bdag cag gi khur du khyer ba 'dri ni bdag cag gi zas yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:172a-0: de'i tshe sbyin bdag chen po des de skad ces smras pa de thos nas @172a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:172a-2: spu zing zhes byed nas khams te sa la 'gyel ba las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:172a-3: chu grang mos gdong du gtor nas ring zhig lon pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:172a-4: sems sor chud nas 'o na khyed kyi zas yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:172a-5: 'di dag su'i sha yin zhes dris pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:172a-6: de dag skad chen po phyung nas dus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:172a-7: sbyin bdag la brjod du mi rung ngo zhes smras so; ;kye ma'o bdag cag ni sdug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:172a-8: kye ma'o bdag cag ni sdug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:172a-11: khyod la drang por mi smrar mi rung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:172a-12: bdag cag khur du khyer ba 'di /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:172a-16: la la ni phu nu'i sha /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:172a-17: la la ni gnyen bshes kyi sha yin no zhes ltogs pa de dag gis so so nas khyim bdag la drang po'i gtam byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:172a-18: bdag cag ni shin tu ltogs pas gcig la gcig nying sha za bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:172a-19: de'i tshe sbyin bdag des dbugs kyis brnangs pa tsam du mi ltogs pa rnams la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:172a-20: khyed rnams deng phyin chad gcig la gcig nying sha za bar ma byed cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:172a-21: khyed rnams la dgos pa'i yo byad gang yang rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:172a-26: yo byad ci dgos pa thams cad sbyin par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:172b-0: zhag bdun na khyed rnams @172b kho bo'i sgor shog cig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:172b-4: ci 'dod pa tshim par bya'o zhes bsgo ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:172b-5: de dag rab tu dga' rangs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:172b-8: ngo mtshar che'o zhes bstod pa byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:172b-9: de nas sbyin bdag de phyir khyim du 'ongs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:172b-13: las byed pa'i mi rnams kyang bsdus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:172b-15: 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba'i tshig snyan pas bu smad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:172b-17: las byed pa'i mi rnams la 'di skad ces bsgo'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:172b-18: khyed rnams shes par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:172b-19: kho bos smras pa'i tshig legs par nyon cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:172b-21: than pa chen pos mu ge byung nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:172b-22: mi thams cad ltogs te grangs med pa zhig shi bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:172b-23: bdag gi khyim na bang mdzod kun gang zhing lud de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:172b-24: 'bru yang grangs med pa zhig yod pas dus las ma yol bar bdag cag bsod nams bya'o zhes /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:172b-25: bu smad kun gyis de skad ces bsgo ba thos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:172b-28: bdag cag gi srog lus sbyin pa byas kyang mi 'phangs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:172b-31: kha zas lta smos kyang ci dgos /
