K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:172b-32: de nas sbyin bdag kyang rab tu dga' rangs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:173a-0: khyed rnams ni yang dag par kho bo'i bla na med pa'i byang chub thob @173a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:173a-1: par byed pa'i grogs yin pa lta dge'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:173a-3: khyed rnams kyang so so nas ci dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:173a-4: ci bya ba rnams ci dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:173a-5: ci bsgrub pa skol bya ba'i rigs pa yang mod la bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:173a-6: bsgrub pa'i rigs pa yang myur du bsgrub ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:173a-7: da ste zhag bdun na nges par 'byor bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:173a-8: de'i tshe sbyin bdag des so sor bsgo nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:173a-9: khyim gyi phyi rol tu byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:173a-10: gang nas mnyam zhing yang la bde ba'i gnas shig bltas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:173a-11: mod las gzhi dag par nyal nyil sa rdo med par byas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:173a-12: phyags te khri stan bshams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:173a-13: de ltar mang po'i 'du ba'i gnas sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sa gzhi bshams nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:173a-14: ban glang lnga brgya la kha zas bkal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:173a-16: kha zas ni ri bzhin du spungs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:173a-17: zho chu ni mtsho bzhin du bskyil /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:173a-20: khur ba la sogs pa kha zas ro brgya dang ldan pa cho mcho dgu sbyar te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:173a-21: de ma yin pa; gzhan yang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:173a-25: lus kyi rgyan sna tshogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:173a-28: rin po che sna bdun la sogs te thams cad phun sum tshogs par sbyar nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:173a-29: zhag bdun lon pa'i skya rengs shar nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:173a-30: zhag bdun gyi nyi ma dril rnga brdungs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:173b-0: skad chen pos thams cad sbyin pa'i @173b gnas 'dir 'dus shig ces bos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:173b-1: de'i tshe na thams cad kyis bos pa'i skad thos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:173b-2: 'phags pas byin gyis brlabs pa tsam du rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:173b-3: thams cad sbyin pa gtong ba'i gnas su lhags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:173b-7: lus kyi rgyan sna tshogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:173b-8: nad kyi rtsi sman mang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:173b-11: rin po che sna bdun la sogs pa ci dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:173b-12: ci 'dod pa yid bzhin du drangs nas sbyin pa'i rdzas ci yod pa thams cad kyis ma lus par khyer ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:173b-13: de nas sbyin bdag de dga' nas phyir khyim du 'ongs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:173b-15: bu rnams dga' ba bzhin du 'dod pa lnga la longs spyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:173b-16: de nas kyang zhag bdun tsam lon pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:173b-18: sbyin bdag des sngar gos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:173b-20: skom la sogs pa'i sbyin pa byas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:173b-21: kha zas zos pa rnams dug langs nas thams cad shi'o zhes zer ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:173b-22: de ltar shi bar gyur bas thams cad kyis tshig tu brjod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:173b-25: de ltar sbyin bdag chen po des kun la snying brtse ba'i phyir ci 'dod pa bzhin du kha zas la sogs pas tshim par byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:173b-28: phyis zhag mang po ma lon par dug langs nas thams cad shi'o par sgra sgrogs par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:174a-1: bdag chen po des de ltar gyur pa de thos nas yi mug cing mi dga' bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:174a-3: bu la sogs pa la khyed kyis kha zas ji ltar sbyar na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:174a-4: kha zas kyi nang du dug ma rungs pa ji ltar 'ongs zhes dris pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:174a-8: las byed pa'i mi rnams kyi mchid nas dug mi srid /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:174a-9: dug 'di ga las 'ongs zhib tu rtogs shig ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:174a-10: de nas sbyin bdag de khyim gyi zhal te byed cing mthar gyis song song ba las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:174a-11: khron pa zhig steng bkab cing g-yogs pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:174a-12: khron pa 'di ci'i phyir g-yogs zhes dris pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:174a-13: khron pa 'di ni khyim bdag khyod bus pa chung ngu'i tshe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:174a-14: sbrul gdug pa gsum zhig gso gso ba las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:174a-15: khron pa 'di brkos nas sbrul gdug pa gsum bcug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:174a-16: khron pa 'di ni sbrul gdug pa 'dug pa'i khron pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:174a-17: chu yang gdug pas chu 'di yang 'thungs pas na ste 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:174a-18: sbyin bdag des tshig de dag thos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:174a-19: las byed pa dag la khyed da bar kha zas g-yo ba'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:174a-21: kha zas ma g-yos sam; las byed pas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:174a-22: kha zas mang du g-yos pas rings nas chu 'di yang bcus nas kha zas kyi g-yos byas so zhes bsgo'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:174b-1: bdag ni gti mug can shes pa'i blo med pa yin pa 'dra ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:174b-2: ci'i phyir sbrul gdug pa gso zhing khron pa gdug pa rko zhes 'gyod nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:174b-5: sbrul gdug pa gsum gyi khron pa myur du thongs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:174b-6: sbrul gdug pa gsum yang kho bo bdag gis bsreg go zhes bsgo ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:174b-7: las byed pa'i mi rnams kyis de ma thag tu khron pa de yang bsub nas med par byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:174b-8: de nas sbyin bdag des sbrul gdug pa'i khron pa de med par byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:174b-9: phyi rol tu 'chag tu song song ba las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:174b-10: sbyin bdag gi kha zas dug can gyis shi bar gyur ba las thams cad tshig mthun par sbyin bdag 'dis bdag cag la kha zas dug can byin nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:174b-11: bdag cag sngar shi bar gyur pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:174b-12: bdag cag gis de ltar shes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:174b-13: der ma song yang rung zhes 'gyod pa skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:174b-14: de bzhin du 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po de yang dge ba bcus sems can btul te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:174b-16: mi'i mtho ris skye zhing 'dod pa lnga la 'dod dgur longs spyod mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:174b-20: 'chi ba las mi thar ba yang de dang 'dra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:174b-21: de nas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po de de'i mod la bdag bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:174b-22: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos bsgrubs te sems can rnams kyang de la klog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:175a-3: skye shi'i 'khor ba yongs su spangs shing mya ngan las 'das pa thob par bya'o zhes dam bcas so; ;de'i tshe na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi chos tshol ba'i phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:175a-4: 'dzam bu'i gling na sangs rgyas kyi chos sus shes zhes gnas kun tu bkar btags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:175a-5: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chos 'dod pa'i phyir gnas kun tu bkar btags kyang shes pa ma byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:175a-6: mtha' 'khob kyi yul chung ngu gcig tu phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:175a-7: de na bram ze gcig cig sangs rgyas kyi chos shes so zhes zer ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:175a-8: de nas bram ze de'i steng du pho nya btang nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:175a-9: pho nya de bram ze ga la bder phyin nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:175a-11: sangs rgyas kyi chos shes sam zhes dris na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:175a-13: de nas pho nyas bram ze'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:175a-15: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos spyan 'dren du btang gis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:175a-16: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de ga la ba der gshegs su gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:175a-17: de nas bram ze yang der 'ongs nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos rgyang ma nas bsu ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:175a-18: rkang pa la mgo bos phyag btsal nas bde bar byon tam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:175a-19: lam du nyon mongs par ma gyur tam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:175a-20: ngal bar ma gyur tam zhes gtam dris te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:175b-0: pho brang gi nang @175b du khrid nas pho brang gi dbus su rgyal po'i gdan la bzhag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:175b-1: bram zes kyang gdan la skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:175b-2: de'i tshe rgyal pos bram ze de bde bar 'dug nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:175b-3: dgos pa'i yo byad rnams kun phul te sbyin pa byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:175b-4: thal mo sbyar te bram ze de la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:175b-6: sangs rgyas kyi chos shes sam zhes dris pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:175b-8: bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos shes so zhes zer ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:175b-9: de nas rgyal pos bram ze la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:175b-11: bdag la bstan cing bshad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:175b-14: rgyal po khyod ni shin tu glen no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:175b-15: kho bos sangs rgyas kyi chos bslabs pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:175b-16: yun ring du dka' ba'i sdug bsngal myong nas gdod lobs pa yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:175b-17: nga rgyal pos thal phyung du thos par 'dod dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:175b-22: bdag la mchod pa phul cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:175b-34: bdag de 'dra ba'i mchod pa mi 'dod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:175b-36: mchod pa de dag mi 'dod na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:176a-8: bdag ni de dag gang yang mi 'dod do; ;gal te lus la rma stong phyung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:176a-9: rma'i nang du mar blugs la me mar snying po btsugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:176a-10: mar me stong 'bar bas mchod na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:176a-11: sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan cing bshad par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:176a-12: gal te de ltar mi nus na bdag langs te 'gro zhes smras nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:176a-13: rgyal pos skad cig tsam lan ma smras kyi bar du khri las babs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:176a-14: de nas rgyal pos pang du blangs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:176a-16: cung zad nyag bsring du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:176a-17: bdag shes pa zhan zhing bsod nams chung bas cung zad bsams te mchod par bgyid do zhes smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:176a-18: de'i tshe 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du sems par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:176a-19: bdag gis lus 'di thog ma med pa'i dus nas shi ba grangs med par myong na yang chos kyi phyir ma shi yi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:176a-20: da yang bdag gi lus 'di yang mthar 'jig cing rul bar gyur pas phan pa med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:176a-21: da ni dus la bab bo snyam bsams nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:176a-22: ston pa bram ze la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:176a-24: bdag mchod pa 'dod pa bzhin bgyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:176a-25: de nas rgyal po pho brang du song nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:176b-0: btsun mo rnams la da ni bdag cag bye 'bral lo zhes @176b smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:176b-1: btsun mo rnams de skad ces smras pa thos nas dngangs shing 'khyams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:176b-3: rgyal po de ltar ci zhig mdzed snyam dgongs zhes gsol lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:176b-5: bdag gi lus 'di la mar me stong zhig btsugs te ston pa bram ze la mchod pa bya snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:176b-6: btsun mo rnams kyis de skad ces smras pa thos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:176b-7: sa la 'gre zhing cho nges btab ste brgyal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:176b-8: ring zhig lon pa dang phyir dran pa rnyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:176b-10: 'jig rten na bdag gi lus las phangs pa med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:176b-11: nyes te dogs nas gso ba'i rim gro cher byed na; ci'i phyir bdag gi lus la mtho 'tsham zhing gnod par bgyid /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:176b-12: rgyal po ni mkhas pa'i blo dang ldan pa lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:176b-14: 'on te yi dvags kyis brlams sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:176b-17: de lta bu gang yang ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:176b-18: 'o na ci'i phyir de lta bu'i gnod pa mdzad cing bram ze la mchod par dgongs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:176b-20: bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:176b-21: sems can thams cad kyi don byed par sems so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:176b-22: de ltar sems can thams cad la dgongs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:176b-23: de ci'i phyir bdag cag rnams bkol bar gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:176b-25: 'jig rten na mdza' sdug thams cad mthar bye 'bral du 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:176b-26: de bas na bdag gis lus kyi mchod pa byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:177a-1: nag gi khang bar ye shes chen po'i sgron ma gzugs shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:177a-2: skye shir 'khor ba'i ma rig pa'i mun pa snang bar byas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:177a-3: kun nas dkris pa'i nyon mongs pa'i mdud pa bcad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:177a-4: 'khor ba'i skyon las bsgral nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i gnas su dgod pa'i ched du bsam gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:177a-7: de'i tshe btsun mo rnams de skad ces bsgo ba thos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:177a-8: brnangs pa ltar cang mi smra zhing skad chen po byung ste ngu zhing rang rang gi skra 'bal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:177a-9: bdag cag la bsod nams med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:177a-10: bkra mi shis pas gson por bdag cag la lha med par gyur ces smra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:177a-11: rgyal po de la rgyal bu lnga brgya yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:177a-12: thams cad kyang mnga' byad bzang zhing sdug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:177a-13: yid gzhungs shing mkhas pa'i blo dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:177a-14: mi'i mtshan dang rdzogs par ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:177a-15: rgyal po yang mig bzhin du phangs shing byams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:177a-16: de'i tshe rgyal pos rgyal bu rnams la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:177a-17: kho bo da mchod pa'i las shig byed snyam na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:177a-19: srog nyam chung du dogs te khyed dang bral ba snyam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:177a-21: 'bangs rnams kyi tshis ni che rims kyis byos shig ces bsgo'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:177a-22: rgyal bu rnams de skad bsgo ba de thos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:177b-0: rtsa rnams bcad pa tsam @177b du sdug bsngal gyis gdungs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:177b-2: mi brnangs pa la skyug tu'ang med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:177b-3: mid du yang med pa bzhin du rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:177b-4: ci'i slad du bdag cag rnams spangs te skyabs su ma mchis par mdzad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:177b-5: la la ni rgyal po'i gnya' ba nas 'khyud /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:177b-6: la la ni lag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:177b-7: rkang pa nas bzung nas skad phyung zhing du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:177b-11: skyabs med par 'gyur zhes smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:177b-12: de nas rgyal pos rgyal bu rnams la spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:177b-13: 'jig rten na mdza' zhing sdug pa thams cad mthar bye 'bral bar 'gyur ro zhes bsgo'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:177b-14: de skad ces bsgo ba thos kyang yid la gcags te 'bral mi phod na bdag gis gsol ba gcig gnang bar mdzad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:177b-17: ston pa bram ze la mchod pa mdzad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:177b-20: khyed rnams ni da dung shed ma bye la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:177b-21: chung bas de 'dra ba'i mchod pa byed mi bzod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:177b-22: kho bo ni ston pa lam ring po nas gnyer te mchod pa bya bar khas blangs pa'i yid dang 'gal bar byar mi rung bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:177b-23: bu sri zhu can ni pha'i yid dang 'gal bar mi byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:177b-24: khyed rnams kho bo'i yid dang 'gal bar byed dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:177b-25: rgyal bu rnams de skad smras pa thos nas skad phyung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:178a-2: ri 'gyel ba bzhin du thams cad lus brdabs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:178a-3: de'i tshe rgyal po la yul mtha'i rgyal phran thams cad kyis kyang mchi phyag byas nas pho brang gi nang ston pa chen po ga la ba der song ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:178a-4: de'i drung du phyin nas lus kyi rgyan thams cad kyang bkrol nas gos kyang phud de phyogs gcig tu bzhag nas lus drang por bsrang ste 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:178a-5: 'dug ma thag tu rgyal phran rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:178a-8: btsun mo nyi khri la bsgo'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:178a-9: khyed rnams las gang gi kho bo'i lus la rma stong zhig gcod sus nus zhes smras na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:178a-13: rgyal phran gyi mi rnams tshig mthun par bdag cag gi rang gi lus la gri thogs te mig phyung yang bla yi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:178a-14: rgyal po'i lus la rma 'byin mi phod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:178a-15: de nas rgyal po mi dga' bar gyur nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:178a-16: de ni bdag ye 'ur gyur pa lta /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:178a-17: 'khor mang po 'di snyed kyi nang na mi 'ga' yang kho bo'i grogs su 'gyur ba med dam zhes smra bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:178a-18: de'i tshe na rgyal po de la rigs ngan bshan pa rang bzhin gyis khro la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:178a-19: kun kyang 'jigs su rung ba zhig yod pa zhig pos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:178a-20: bshan pa de der 'ongs nas rgyal bu rnams la khyed mya ngan ma byed cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:178b-0: rgyal po chen po'i don mi 'grub pa'i thabs @178b bdag la mchis kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:178b-1: don ma grub na snga mkho bzhin du rgyal po'i srid bzung du zad [?] do zhes smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:178b-2: rgyal bu rnams kyis tshig de skad ces smras pa thos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:178b-3: rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyes par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:178b-4: de nas bshan pa de rgyal po'i drung du 'ongs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:178b-6: da ltar ci zhig mdzad par dgongs zhes gsol ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:178b-8: kho bo'i lus la mar me stong btsugs la ston pa chen po bram ze la mchod par sems so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:178b-10: de ltar na sku la gcod nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:178b-11: rgyal pos de skad smra ba thos nas rab tu dga' ba'i sems su gyur nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:178b-12: bshan pa la khyod ni yang dag par kho bo'i bla na med pa'i byang chub sgrub pa'i grogs yin no zhes smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:178b-13: de nas bshan pas rgyal po'i drung du 'greng bzhin du ngam ngur ba'i skad chen pos rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:178b-15: mi bsad pa'i chos kyis ni sngar mgo bcad dgos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:178b-16: gnya' ba [?] btubs la rkang lag dang phral te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:178b-18: rgyus pa yang dbyung dgos na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:178b-20: de 'dra ba'i na tsha'i sdug bsngal bzod dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:178b-21: rgyal pos de skad smras pa thos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:178b-22: rab tu dga' ba'i sems su gyur nas de nas bshan pas gnag lce lta bu'i gri thogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:178b-23: ring po ma thogs par rgyal po'i lus la rma stong tshang bar bcad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:179a-1: rgyal po'i sems phyir nur ba tsam du sems pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:179a-2: sems ma nur bas gri yang sa la bor nas bros so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:179a-3: de nas rgyal po chen po'i lus la rma stong bcad pa'i nang du mar khu blugs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:179a-4: ras bzang po'i snying po btsugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:179a-6: de'i tshe bram ze ston pa chen pos de ltar byas pa mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:179a-7: 'di snyam du da ni myur du chos ma bshad na lus srog 'tsho'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:179a-9: gal te srog ma sos na sus chos mnyan par 'gyur bsams nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:179a-10: rgyal po la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:179a-11: sangs rgyas kyi chos thos par 'dod pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:179a-12: shin tu dpa' ba'i brtson 'grus kyis bya dka' ba'i spyod pa spyad pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:179a-13: legs par nyon la shin tu yid la zungs shig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:179a-14: da rgyal po la sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:179a-15: de skad ces smras pa thos nas rgyal po rab tu dga' ba'i sems su gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:179a-17: bu sri zhu can zhig pha ma shi na rab tu mi dga' ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:179a-18: sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa las pha ma phyir sos pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:179a-19: bu de ji ltar rab tu dga' ba ltar /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:179a-20: rgyal po de yang rab tu dga' bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:179a-21: de nas bram ze des rgyal po la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:179a-24: zhes tshigs su bcad pa phyed pa 'di bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:179b-0: @179b rgyal pos dam pa'i chos bstan pa thos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:179b-1: rab tu dga' ba'i sems su gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:179b-3: blon po rnams la 'di skad ces bsgo'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:179b-4: khyed rnams la kho bo la sdug cing brtse ba'i sems yod na chos 'di ma brjed par yid la gzung la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:179b-5: yul phyogs su gang na mang po 'dus pa'i gnas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:179b-8: tshong 'dus su 'gro ba mang po la 'di skad ces bkar thogs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:179b-9: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po chen pos sems can mang po sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtshor bying ba dag 'don pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:179b-10: sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:179b-11: lus la mar me stong btsugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:179b-12: tshigs su bcad pa'i tshigs bcad phyed pa thos pa 'di rgyal po chen po 'di'i byams pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:179b-13: snying rje'i sems grub par bya ba'i phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:179b-14: thams cad kyis yi ger bris te 'don pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:179b-15: kha don tu bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:179b-18: don yang yid la bya zhing ji ltar gtams pa bzhin du nan tan du spyad par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:179b-19: de'i tshe na mi mang pos de skad ces bsgo ba thos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:179b-20: rab tu dga' zhing mgu bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:179b-21: thams cad kyis tshig mthun par rgyal po la bstod nas shin tu dga'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:179b-23: bdag cag gi snying rje chen po'i pha yang dag pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:180a-0: sems can thams cad kyi phyir shin tu spyad dka' ba spyod do @180a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:180a-6: rdo la yi ger bris te kha ton du slob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:180a-7: gang na mi mang po 'du ba'i gnas su yang yi ger bris te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:180a-8: thams cad kyis mthong zhing thos par byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:180a-9: bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:180a-10: de'i tshe rgyal po chen pos lus la mar me stong btsugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:180a-11: ston pa chen po bram ze la mchod pa byas pa'i 'od zer gyis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:180a-12: phyogs bcu'i zhing 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:180a-13: mar me de'i 'od de las tshigs su bcad pa'i tshigs bcad phyed kyi chos kyi sgra yang grags par gyur nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:180a-14: thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:180a-15: mar me de'i 'od des sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi lha'i khang pa yang snang bar byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:180a-16: mar me'i 'od des lha'i 'od kun zil gyis mnan pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:180a-17: sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi lha rnams mar me'i 'od des kun tu snang bar byas pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:180a-18: de dag 'di snyam du gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:180a-19: ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'od zer 'di lta bu snang bar 'gyur snyam lha'i mig gis bltas pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:180a-20: 'jig rten gyi khams na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po chen pos snying rje'i sems bskyed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:180b-0: 'gro ba @180b thams cad kyi phyir lus la mar me stong btsugs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:180b-1: ston pa chen po bram ze la mchod pa byas pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:180b-2: lha de dag rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyes nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:180b-3: 'jig rten gyi khams su babs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:180b-4: mi tha mal pa'i lus su sprul nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:180b-5: rgyal po ga la bar lhags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:180b-6: rgyal po chen po la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:180b-7: rgyal po chen po; lus la mar me stong btsugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:180b-8: shin tu yang spyod dka' ba spyad cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:180b-9: tshigs su bcad pa phyed cig thos pas ci zhig bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:180b-11: rigs kyi bu; bdag ni sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du gzhug pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:180b-12: de nas sprul pa'i mi de phyir brgya byin gyi lus su bsgyur nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:180b-13: lus kyi 'od kyis kun tu snang bar byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:180b-14: rgyal po chen po la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:180b-20: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal pos brgya byin la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:180b-23: mi'i longs spyod gang yang mi 'dod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:180b-24: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:180b-25: so so'i skye bo thams cad mi bde ba rnams bde ba'i gnas su dgod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:181a-0: @181a *// ma grol ba rnams grol bar bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:181a-1: pha rol tu ma phyin pa rnams phyin par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:181a-2: byang chub ma thob pa rnams thob par bya bar 'dod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:181a-5: khyed ni rab tu blun po'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:181a-6: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:181a-7: yun ring po shin tu spyod dka' ba spyad pas thob par 'gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:181a-8: ci'i phyir bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:181a-9: rgyal pos brgya byin la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:181a-10: ci ste bdag gi spyi bo'i steng na lcags kyi 'khor lo shin tu 'bar ba rgyun du 'khor yang sdug bsngal de tsam gyis bla na med pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:181a-12: tshig de skad ces smras pa la su zhig yid ches par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:181a-13: de nas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal pos brgya byin la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:181a-14: gal te bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa ma yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:181a-15: lha'i rgyal po khyod slus par gyur na bdag gi lus kyi rma 'di dag nam du yang 'tsho bar ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:181a-16: gal te de lta ma yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:181a-17: khrag kyang 'o mar gyur cing rma rnams kyang sos par gyur cig ces dam bcas ma thag tu rma rnams kyang sos par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:181a-18: brgya byin lha'i dbang pos rgyal po la shin tu dge'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:181b-0: shin @181b tu dge'o zhes bstod nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:181b-1: rgyal po chen po khyod ni yang dag par snying rje chen po dang ldan pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:181b-2: snying rje chen po'i spyod pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:181b-3: de ltar spyod dka' ba spyod pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:181b-4: ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'gyur bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:181b-5: nam bla na med pa'i byang chub thob pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:181b-6: thog ma bdag gi don sngar byas par shog cig ces smras nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:181b-7: brgya byin lha'i dbang pos lus kyi 'od zer gyis rgyal po'i lus kun tu snang bar byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:181b-8: lha'i 'khor brgya stong dang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:181b-9: rgyal bu lnga brgya rnams de ltar yab rgyal po'i lus kyi rma sos te snga ma bzhin du gyur pa mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:181b-10: rab tu dga' rangs te rgyal po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag btsal nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:181b-12: thal mo sbyar ba btud nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:181b-13: tshig mthun par 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:181b-14: 'di lta bu mdzad pa ngo mtshar che ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:181b-15: yab rgyal po ni yang dag par 'gro ba thams cad la snying rje che ba'o zhes bstod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:181b-18: khyed nga la sri zhu byed pa bden na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:181b-19: thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed cig ces bsgo bas rgyal bu rnams yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:181b-20: de bzhin du btsun mo nyi khri dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:182a-1: stong snyed kyang byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:182a-2: de'i tshe 'khor de'i nang na gnas pa'i sems can gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma bcu bdun snyed kyis nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas su sems bskyed par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:182a-11: mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pa grangs med pa rnams de lta bur gyur pa mthong thos nas thams cad kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:182a-12: rab tu dga' nas phyir dong ngo; ;thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa'i mdo las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:182a-13: gnyen po'i le'u zhes bya ste gsum pa'o ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:182a-14: de'i tshe na 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de na; byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' ba'i rgyal po stan las langs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:182a-15: bla gos phyogs gcig tu byas nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas; bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:182a-16: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:182a-17: byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar na drin shes par bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:182a-18: ji ltar na drin bsab par bgyi zhes gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:182b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' @182b stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:182b-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po drin shes pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:182b-4: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:182b-5: drin lan bsab pa ni sems can pha rol po thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du gzhug pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:182b-6: gsol pa; byang chub tu sems bskyed ces bgyi ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:182b-7: ji ltar sems bskyed par bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:182b-8: byang chub sems dpa' dngos po gang gi rkyen gyis byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:182b-10: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thog ma bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:182b-11: 'di skad du; yi dam chen po bca'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:182b-12: bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa'i tshe sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:182b-14: sems can thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa chen po la nges par dgod par dam bca'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:182b-16: sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya bar dam bca' bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:182b-17: de ni bdag gi don dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:182b-18: gzhan gyi don byed pa zhes bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:182b-19: de bas na thog ma byang chub tu sems bskyed nas byang chub kyi rgyu dang ldan pa zhes bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:183a-1: rgyu dang ldan pa zhes bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:183a-2: yang dag par don gyi rgyu dang ldan pa zhes bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:183a-3: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi chos dang ldan pa zhes bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:183a-4: dge ba'i chos thams cad sdud pa'i gzhi zhes bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:183a-5: de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni dge ba zhes bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:183a-6: dge ba chen po zhes bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:183a-7: sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba zhes kyang bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:183a-8: sems can thams cad kyi lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:183a-10: yid kyi las sbyong ba zhes bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:183a-11: las ngan pa gsum sbyangs pas 'jig rten na smon lam gang yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa las 'da' ba med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:183a-12: smon lam mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:183a-13: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thog ma byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:183a-14: dngos po lnga dang ldan par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:183a-20: bskyed pa'o; ;byang chub sems dpa' sde ltar byang chub tu sems bskyed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:183a-21: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:183a-22: gdon mi za bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob cing theg pa chen po spyod par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:183a-23: de bas na thog ma byang chub tu sems bskyed pas dge ba'i chos thams cad sdud par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:183b-0: @183b byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub tu sems bskyed nas ji ltar spyod pa bzhin du bla na med pa yang dag pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:183b-1: gal te byang chub tu sems ma bskyed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:183b-2: nam du yang byang chub thob par mi 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:183b-3: de bas na byang chub tu sems bskyed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:183b-4: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi gzhi thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:183b-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:183b-6: sems can sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba mthong na byams shing snying rje ba'i sems skye ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:183b-7: de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni byams pa dang snying rje'i sems kyis rgyu byas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:183b-8: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i rgyus /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:183b-9: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bsgrub par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:183b-10: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bsgrubs pa'i rgyus /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:183b-11: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:183b-12: de bas na byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ni gzhi'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:183b-14: byang chub tu sems bskyed pas; byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims spyod par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:183b-15: de bas na byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ni rtsa ba zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:184a-1: bya; go rims zhes kyang bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:184a-3: byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu sems bskyed pa yang mthar phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:184a-4: mthar mi phyin pa yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:184a-5: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du thob par byed pa ni nam du yang phyir ldog pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:184a-6: nur ba med pas mthar phyin pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:184a-7: mthar mi phyin pa ni ldog pa dang nyams par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:184a-8: phyir ldog pa la rnam pa gnyis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:184a-10: mthar ldog pa ma yin pa yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:184a-11: mthar phyir ldog pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:184a-12: phyir mi ldog pa'i chos gang yin pa de bsgrub pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:184a-13: nan tan du spyod mi nus pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:184a-14: mthar phyir ldog pa ma yin pa ni byang chub tu sems bskyed nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:184a-15: chos gang yin pa bsgrub cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:184a-17: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la rnam pa bzhi ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:184a-21: byang chub sems dpa'i don gyi dngos po bsam gyis mi khyab pa thos sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:184a-23: de'i tshe dang cing 'dun pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:184a-25: byang chub sems dpa'i don gyi dngos po ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:184b-0: byang chub sems @184b dpa'i don gyi dngos po bsam gyis mi khyab pa de ni thob par bya ba yin pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:184b-1: bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya'o snyam sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:184b-2: de bas na sems rtse gcig tu byang chub dran par byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:184b-3: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:184b-4: kha cig ni sangs rgyas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:184b-5: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don gyi dngos po bsam gyis mi khyab pa ma mthong yang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:184b-7: byang chub sems dpas dgongs te gsungs pa'i snying po thos pa tsam gyis dad cing 'dun pa'i sems skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:184b-9: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:184b-10: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:184b-11: kha cig ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i don gyi dngos po bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang ma mthong /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:184b-12: dgongs te gsungs pa'i chos ma thos kyang dam pa'i chos 'jig par 'gyur bar mthong na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:184b-13: de 'di snyam du bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa grangs med pa zhi bar byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:184b-15: phan pa'i don du 'gyur ba 'di [?] sangs rgyas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:184b-16: byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig gis yun ring du gnas shing mi nub par mdzad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:184b-17: da bdag kyang byang chub tu sems bskyed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:185a-1: thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa yongs su spangs pa'i phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:185a-2: bdag gi lus 'di sdug bsngal chen po myong yang sangs rgyas kyi chos 'jig rten na yun ring du gnas par bya'o snyam sems nas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:185a-3: kha cig ni sangs rgyas kyi chos 'jig pa ma mthong yang dus ngan pa'i sems can rnams nyon mongs pa shin tu lci ba 'dod chags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:185a-14: le lo la sogs pa nyon mongs pa'i dngos po 'di dag mthong na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:185a-15: de 'di snyam du shin tu dus ngan pas sems can 'di dag ni dge ba mi spyod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:185a-16: de ltar dus ngan pas theg pa gnyis kyi sems kyang skyed mi nus na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:185a-17: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa lta ci smos snyam sems nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:185a-18: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:185a-19: de ltar byang chub tu sems bskyed nas sems can thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la brtson par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:185a-20: de nas byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba'i rgyal pos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:185a-21: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:185b-1: byang chub sems dpa' drin lan shes pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:185b-2: bdag byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:185b-3: byang chub sems dpa' drin lan bsab pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:185b-4: sems can pha rol po byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug pa'o zhes bgyi na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:185b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa sngon 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i che thog ma dngos po ci'i rgyus byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:185b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:185b-8: sngon gyi bskal ba grangs med pa'i bar du skye shir 'khor ba na 'khor zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:185b-11: yid kyi nyon mongs pa'i las chen pos sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad myong bar 'gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:185b-13: aa ha ha'i sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:185b-14: aa la la'i sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:185b-15: aa tsa tsa'i sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:185b-16: zangs khol ma'i sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:185b-17: zangs khol ba chen po'i sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:185b-18: rdo nag po'i sems can dmyal ba ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:185b-19: rdo nag po chen po'i sems can dmyal ba nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:185b-20: me'i shing rta'i dmyal ba'i bar du'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:185b-21: nga de'i tshe na me'i shing rta'i dmyal bar lhung nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:185b-23: gnyis kyis me'i shing rta 'dren te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:185b-24: dmyal ba'i srung ma aa bang ni shing rti'i steng na 'dug cing mig bgrad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:185b-25: so gcigs te me 'bud pa kha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:186a-2: srung ma de yang lus shin tu che zhing gnag la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:186a-3: shing rta'i steng na skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:186a-4: lag pa na lcags kyi dbyug pa thogs te nga la rdeg go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:186a-5: de'i tshe ngan pa'i sdug bsngal ma bzod nas stobs ci nus kyis shing rta drangs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:186a-6: nga'i grogs shig nyam chung ste 'dren ma nus pas dmyal ba'i srung ma aa pang gis lcags kyi mdung rtse gsum pa thogs nas brang du btsugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:186a-9: de'i tshe mi de na ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzod pas na tsha ba'i skad chen po byung nas par 'ga' ni pha ma zhas 'bod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:186a-10: bar 'ga' ni chung ma bu zhe bos kyang phan pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:186a-11: nga de'i tshe na de lta bu'i sdug bsngal chen po myong ba mthong nas snying rje'i sems skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:186a-12: de ltar snying rje'i sems chen po skyes pa'i rkyen gyis byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:186a-13: de nas sdug bsngal myong ba de'i phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:186a-14: dmyal ba'i srung ma aa bang la sdug bsngal myong ba'i mi 'di la snying rje'i sems cung zad skyed cig ces gsol ba btab pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:186a-15: dmyal ba'i srung ma khros nas zhe sdang gi sems skyes pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:186a-16: lcags kyi mdung rtse gsum pa thogs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:186a-18: de'i tshe'i dus byas pas me'i shing rta'i sems can dmyal ba las thar te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:186b-0: bskal ba brgya snyed kyi mi @186b dge ba'i sdig pa byang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:186b-1: de ltar ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:186b-2: me'i shing rta'i sems can dmyal ba las thar bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:186b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' ba'i rgyal po la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:186b-4: de'i tshe me'i shing rta 'drin pa de ni da ltar nga yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:186b-5: byang chub tu sems bskyed pas myur du sangs rgyas su grub par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:186b-6: de bas na sems can thams cad kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:186b-7: don gyi dngos po ni gcig tu ma zad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:186b-8: la la ni snying rje'i rkyen gyis skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:186b-9: la la ni zhe sdang gi rkyen gyis skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:186b-10: la la ni sbyin pa'i rkyen gyis skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:186b-11: la la ni ser sna'i rkyen gyis skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:186b-12: la la ni dga' ba'i rkyen gyis skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:186b-13: la la ni mya ngan gyi rkyen gyis skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:186b-14: la la ni 'dod pa dang bye bral gyi rkyen gyis skye'o; ;la la ni dgra sdang ba dang phrad pa'i rkyen gyis skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:186b-15: la la ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen la sten pa'i rkyen gyis skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:186b-16: la la ni mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rkyen gyis skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:186b-17: la la ni sangs rgyas mthong ba'i rkyen gyis skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:186b-18: la la ni chos thos pa'i rkyen gyis skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:186b-19: de bas na sems can rnams la byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ni de ltar so sor mi mthun te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:186b-21: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:186b-23: drin lan bsab pa'i don gyi dngos po 'di ltar rig par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:187a-1: pa na skye bo khri brgya stong snyed kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:187a-2: 'khor mang po de dag las la la ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:187a-3: dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu'i bar du thob par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:187a-8: mi ma yin pa la sogs pa thams cad nyan thos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:187a-9: rang sangs rgyas su sems bskyed par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:187a-10: chos thos pa la rab tu dga' rangs nas mgo bos phyag btsal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:187a-11: g-yas phyogs nas bskor ba byas nas phyir dong ngo; ;thabs la mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa'i mdo las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:187a-12: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:187a-14: de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i yum lha mdzes dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:187a-15: lha rnams kyi don du zhag dgu bcu'i bar du lha rnams la chos ston tu gshegs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:187a-16: 'jam bu'i gling gi mi rnams zhag dgu bcu'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa ga la bzhugs pa ma rtogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:187a-17: mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po rdzu 'phrul gyi mchog tu gyur pas kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:187a-19: phyogs bcur brtags kyang ma rtogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:187b-0: 'phags pa nye bar skyong lta bu lha'i mig mchog gis phyogs bcur stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu bltas kyang ma mthong @187b to; ;de bzhin du 'phags pa'i 'khor lnga brgya'i bar du kun gyis brtags kyang ma mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:187b-1: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa ma mthong bas de dag mi dga' ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:187b-2: mya ngan gyis sems gdungs par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:187b-3: de'i tshe rgyal po au tra ya nas de bzhin gshegs pa ma mthong bas mi dga' ba'i sems skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:187b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa dran pa'i phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:187b-5: glang mgo'i shing tsandan las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byas nas phyag 'tshal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:187b-6: mchod pa byed pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum dang 'dra bar bzhugs par dmigs nas mchod pa byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:187b-7: de'i tshe rgyal po chen pos mu stegs can gyi ston pa drug pos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:187b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa da ltar ga la bzhugs zhes dris na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:187b-9: ston pa drug gis rgyal po la 'di skad smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:187b-12: dge sbyong goo ta ma ni sgyu 'phrul can yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:187b-14: sgyu 'phrul gyi sgyu ma ni bden pa'i dngos po med pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:187b-15: bdag cag gi gtsug lag las lo stong ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:187b-16: nyis stong na sgyu 'phrul can sgyu ma zhig 'byung ngo zhes 'chad pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:187b-17: dge sbyong goo ta ma ni sgyu ma de kho na yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:187b-18: de'i tshe 'phags pa nye bar skyod rgyal po chen po ga la bar song nas rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:187b-19: rgyal po chen po mkhyen tam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:188a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa ni da ste zhag bdun na sum cu rtsa gsum gnam nas @188a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:188a-2: rgyal pos de skad ces smras pa thos nas rab tu dga' ba'i sems su gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:188a-3: yul mi bsdus nas chag chag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:188a-11: rol mo la sogs pa mchod pa'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs bshams shing sbyar ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:188a-12: mu stegs can gyi ston pa drug der 'ongs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:188a-13: khyed rnams 'di ltar mchod pa'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs bshams shing sbyar ba 'di /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:188a-16: de dag gis de ma yin no zhes smras pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:188a-17: 'o na blon po chen po 'bod dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:188a-19: de ma yin na gnyen bshes kyi dus ston byed dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:188a-22: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gshegs su gsol lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:188a-23: ston pa drug gis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:188a-24: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba su zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:188a-26: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:188a-27: yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba de su zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:188a-29: byams pa dang; snying rje chen po'i yab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:188a-31: rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i rigs mtho zhing btsun la mchog tu gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:188b-0: thog ma bskal pa dang po nas btsun mo chen @188b mo'i sras gcig cig gis gdung bsams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:188b-1: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:188b-2: bar du rabs gnyis kyis 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po ma byas mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:188b-3: 'dzam bu'i gling gi rgyal po byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:188b-4: rgyal po de la sras mched gsum thog mnga'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:188b-5: rab ni rgyal po zas gtsang ma zhes bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:188b-6: de'i bar ma de bre bo zas zhes bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:188b-7: de'i tha chung ni zas zil mngar gyi zas zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:188b-8: rgyal po zas gtsang ma la sras gnyis shig mnga'/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:188b-9: chen po ni don grub ces bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:188b-10: sras chung du ni dga' bo zhes bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:188b-11: rgyal po zas bre bo zas la sras gnyis shig mnga'/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:188b-12: chen po ni lhas byin zhes bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:188b-13: sras chung ngu ni kun dga' bo'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:188b-14: rgyal po zil mngar gyi zas la sras mo gcig yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:188b-15: bu mo zil mngar gyi ro zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:188b-16: de'i tshe na spun gyi rab rgyal bu don grub pho brang gi phyi rol du 'chag tu ltad mo ltar song song ba las rgas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:188b-18: shi ba dag mthong nas mi dga' bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:188b-19: kha zas kyang mi za zhing snying rje'i sems kyi sems pa la zhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:188b-20: mir skyes pa la mtho dman med par gzugs su red pa thams cad la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:188b-23: gcig kyang mi thar ro snyam bsams nas; mtshan mo pho brang nas gros nas byang chub kyi shing drung du lo drug gi bar du spyod pa dka' ba spyad nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:188b-24: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:189a-1: mkhyen pa'i ye shes can zhes mngon par sangs rgyas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:189a-4: ma 'dres pa'i chos bco brgyad dang ldan zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:189a-5: bltams nas zhag bdun lon nas yum lha mdzes dus byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:189a-6: sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi lha'i nang du skyes nas yum la zhag dgu bcu'i bar du chos bshad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:189a-7: da ste zhag bdun na 'dzam bu'i gling du gshegs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:189a-8: de'i tshe mu stegs can gyi ston pa drug gis de skad ces smras pa thos nas; phrag dog gi sems skyes te rab tu mi dga' ba'i mya ngan gyi gdungs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:189a-9: ston pa drug 'khor dang bcas te lhan cig tu 'dug ste 'di skad ces bgros so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:189a-10: dge sbyong goo ta ma gal te 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir phyir 'ongs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:189a-11: mi thams cad kyis bdag cag spong zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:189a-12: dge sbyong goo ta ma la mchod pa byed par 'gyur bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:189a-13: bdag cag ni brel zhing phongs la srog la bab par 'gyur ro zhes bgros nas mu stegs can gyi ston pa drug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:189a-15: bdag cag mi mang po 'dus pa'i gnas su myur du song la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:189a-16: mi mang po'i nang du 'di skad ces bsgrag par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:189a-17: de skad kun shes par gyis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:189b-0: dge sbyong goo ta ma ni yang dag par na ci yang shes pa med de @189b byis pa chung ngu na kha nyag cig sh'akya rigs kyi pho brang nas byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:189b-1: byang chub kyi shing drung na 'dug 'dug nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:189b-2: nga ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob bo zhes zer te; tshig de ni rdzun te bden pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:189b-4: rgyal po aa khyi tas bsod snyoms sbyin par bos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:189b-5: rta chas 'ba' zhig byin te ngan du byas kyang ma shes te; der song bas na thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:189b-7: kun dga' bo la da ste zhag du na tshul du 'jug ces dris na kun dga' bos zhag bdun zhig lus zhes smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:189b-8: yang kun dga' bo la kun dga' ra ba na bya mang po ci'i phyir ca co'i skad 'byin ces dris na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:189b-9: byang mang po zas gtod pa'i phyir ro zhes smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:189b-10: btsas nas zhag bdun lon nas ma yang shi bar gyur pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:189b-11: de dang sbyar na thams cad shes pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:189b-12: bkra mi shis te shin tu sdig pa can yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:189b-14: btsas ma thag tu ma yang shi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:189b-15: yang gcig tu na sri zhus pha la rim gro byed pa'i rigs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:189b-16: rim gro mi byed par ri la langs te song ba las drin mi shes pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:189b-17: yab rgyal pos btsun mo skye dgu'i bdag mo blangs pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:189b-18: chung ma'i tshul du ma byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:189b-19: btsun mo skye dgu'i bdag mo sdug bsngal chen po myong bar byas pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:190a-1: drin mi dran pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:190a-2: dge sbyong goo ta ma'i 'khor ni bzang ngan med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:190a-3: slob ma lnga brgya po yang so so nas nga ni mchog yin no zhes zer te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:190a-4: mkhan po la yang chos lugs med pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:190a-5: slob ma la yang chos lugs sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:190a-7: chung ngu na stan 'dings pa'i mi dge slong than bye'u lta bu yang nga ni kun gyi mchog go zhes zer /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:190a-8: yid gzhungs shing shes rab che ba blo rno ba'i mchog sh'a ri'i bu lta bu yang de na yod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:190a-9: shes rab brtul ba shes pa med pa dge slong phan thig de yang de la 'jug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:190a-10: chung ngu na 'dod chags chung ba dge slong ma grags 'dzin yang de la 'jug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:190a-11: mnyan du yod pa na sprul 'tshong ma ma rung ma autpa la'i mdog kyang de la 'jug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:190a-12: chung ngu na shed ma bye ba shes pa med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:190a-13: bus pa tsun da yang de la 'jug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:190a-14: nang gi rgas 'khogs pa de su bar ta la zhes bya ba lo brgya nyi shu lon pa de yang de la 'jug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:190a-15: rigs btsun pa che ba sh'aka ris kyang de la 'jug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:190a-16: mnyan du yod pa na nang gi rigs ngan phyag dar lung skyed pa yang de la 'jug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:190a-17: de bas na dge sbyong goo ta ma'i chos ni go 'dun bsdus pa bzang ngan med pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:190a-19: bkur sti bya ba'i gnas ma yin no //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:195b-2: bdag gi bu 'di ltar sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:195b-3: bdag gi lus 'di rdul du btags kyang sla na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:195b-4: ci'i phyir bu 'di shi bar gyur ces smre sngags 'don to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:195b-5: de nas yab rgyal po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:195b-6: rgyal phran rnams kyis spos glang mgo'i tsandan spungs te; rgyal bu'i ro bsregs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:195b-7: rgyal bu'i rus pa bsdus te rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:195b-9: byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:195b-11: khyed rnams shes par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:195b-12: de'i tshe de'i dus na w'a ra n'a si'i rgyal po chen po de gzhan yin par sems na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:195b-14: de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po de ni da ltar nga'i yab rgyal po zas gtsang ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:195b-15: de'i tshe de'i dus na btsun mo de ni gzhan yin par sems na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:195b-17: de'i tshe de'i dus na btsun mo de ni de ltar yum lha mdzes yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:195b-18: de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu bzod pa de ni da ltar nga yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:195b-19: byang chub sems dpa' ni bskal pa tshad med grangs med pa'i bar du pha ma la sri zhu bya ba'i phyir gos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:196a-1: gi bar du sbyin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:196a-2: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i bar du'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:196a-3: da ltar rin po che'i mchod rten sa las byung ba 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:196a-4: ngas sngon pha ma'i phyir lus kyi rkang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:196a-5: srog gi bar du phul te 'di nyid du mchod rten brtsigs te mchod pa byas pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:196a-6: da mngon par sangs rgyas na yang mngon par byung nas snang bar gyur pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:196a-7: de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor mang po lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:196a-10: mi la sogs pa grangs med pa rnams de skad ces gsungs pa thos nas; dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:196a-11: mi dga' ba 'dres par byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:196a-12: thams cad mchi ma blags nas skad mthun par de bzhin gshegs pas yon tan brgya stong bsngags shing bstod de dus gcig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:196a-14: sems can tshad med pa brgya stong gis nyan thos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:196a-15: rang sangs rgyas su sems bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:196a-18: skye bo tshad med pa skyed rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:196a-19: dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu'i bar du thob par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:196b-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong snyed ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang @196b chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:196b-1: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa ni yang dag par pha ma la sri zhu byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:196b-3: byang chub sems dpa' ni pha ma'i yon tan shes shing sngon gyi smon lam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku btsas par shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:196b-4: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i smon lam rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:196b-5: yum gyis phyag bya bar mi 'dod pa'i phyir tshe'i dus byas pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:196b-6: de'i tshe na 'khor mang po thams cad kyis tshig mthun par yum lha mdzes la legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:196b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:196b-10: 'jig rten na dpe zla med pa btsas pa shin tu legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:196b-11: de nas dri za'i bu chos kyi phreng ba 'dug pa las langs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:196b-12: bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar te; bus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas sangs rgyas gang na bar thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:196b-13: yum lha mdzes 'di bsod nams ci bgyis na ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis de bzhin gshegs pa bltams par gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:196b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:196b-15: legs par nyon la shin tu yid la zungs shig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:196b-17: sngon 'das pa grangs med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i pha ro lna /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:196b-18: sangs rgyas rnams par gzigs zhes bya ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:197a-2: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:197a-5: bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:197a-6: skyes bu 'dul ba kha lo sgyur ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:197a-8: blon po rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:197a-9: sangs rgyas de dam pa'i chos nub nas gzugs brnyan la chos spyod pa'i bar du nub par gyur nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:197a-10: de'i tshe yul w'a ra n'a si zhes bya ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:197a-11: 'phags pa gnas zhes bya ba'i ri zhig yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:197a-12: ri de la rang sangs rgyas zhes bya ba brgya stong snyed gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:197a-13: drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa grangs med pa zhig kyang ri de la gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:197a-15: drang srong mang po gnas pa'i phyir ri de yang 'phags pa gnas zhes btags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:197a-16: ri de la drang srong gcig ni ri de'i lho phyogs na gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:197a-17: drang srong gcig ni ri de'i byang phyogs na gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:197a-18: drang srong de gnyis gnas pa'i bar na [?] chu mig gcig yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:197a-19: chu mig de'i drung na pha bong phya le ba bzang po gcig yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:197a-20: de'i tshe de'i dus gcig na ri lho phyogs logs na gnas pa'i drang srong de pha bong de'i steng du gos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:197a-21: rkang pa bkrus te phyir gnas su song ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:197a-22: ring po ma lon par sha ba yu mo gcig chu mig la chu 'thung ngu 'ongs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:197b-0: chu mig la chu @197b 'thungs pa'i 'og tu pha bong de'i steng na drang srong gis gos bkrus pa'i khu ba 'thungs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:197b-1: gos bkrus pa'i khu ba 'thungs pa'i 'og tu phyir phongs rol tu bltas te mo mtshan la bldangs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:197b-2: de nas sha ba yu mo de'i ltor bu chags te zla ba tshang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:197b-3: ri dvags kyi chos kyis bu 'byung ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:197b-4: thog ma gnas gang du mngal du chags pa der bu 'byin pas; chu mig gi dngor 'ongs te pha bong de'i steng du ngu zhing 'gre nas bu mo gcig byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:197b-5: de'i tshe na lho phyogs logs kyi drang srong de sha ba ngu ba'i skad thos nas snying rje ba'i sems skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:197b-6: sha ba'i drung du ltar song ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:197b-7: sha ba yu mo de la bu mo gcig byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:197b-8: sha ba de la ldag cing 'dug pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:197b-10: sha ba yang bu bor nas song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:197b-11: de nas drang srong des sha ba la btsas pa'i bu mo de mdzes shing sdug la mtshan dang ldan par mthong bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:197b-12: snying rje'i sems kyis rtsva'i gos kyis dkris te pang du blangs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:197b-13: phyir gnas su 'ongs nas shing tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:197b-14: 'bras bu brdas nas gsos gsos pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:197b-15: mthar gyis cher skyes nas lo bcu bzhi lon pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:197b-16: drang srong yang bu mo de la shin tu byams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:197b-17: rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par me gsor bcug pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:197b-18: nyi ma gcig le lo byas nas me shi bar gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:198a-2: pu mo thog ma bskyed nas nga tsam gyi bar du me shi ma myong na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:198a-3: ci'i phyir me bsad ces gshes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:198a-4: ri byang phyogs logs na gnas pa'i drang srong gi thad du me len du btang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:198a-5: de nas bu mo de phas bsgo ba bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:198a-6: ri byang phyogs kyi ngos su song ba las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:198a-7: gom pa re re zhing rkang pa'i 'og nas padmo re re skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:198a-8: 'gro ba'i rjes bzhin khod mnyam par dngar ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:198a-9: padmo skyes nas ri byang phyogs logs nas me len du song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:198a-10: de'i tshe na drang srong des bu mo de shin tu bsod nams dang ldan zhing rkang pa'i 'og nas padma skyes pa mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:198a-11: bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:198a-12: khyod me 'dod na kho bo'i spyil po 'di lan bdun bskor la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:198a-13: gom pa'i bar mnyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:198a-14: nye ring thag ran par gom pa'i 'og nas padmo skyes par byes shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:198a-15: de ltar lan bdun bskor ba byas nas kyang bu mo la khyod me 'dod na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:198a-16: phyir yang g-yas phyogs nas bskor te song zhig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:198a-18: de'i tshe bu mo de me 'dod pa'i phyir drang srong gis bsgo ba bzhin du byas te me blangs nas phyir song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:198b-0: bu mo de phyir song nas ring po ma lon par w'a ra n'a si'i rgyal po blon po chen po dang 'khor brgya stong snyed dang bcas nas su ri de la 'chag cing ri de la ri dvags la lings @198b 'debs su 'ongs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:198b-1: de nas w'a ra n'a si'i rgyal po bal gyi glang po che la zhon nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:198b-2: ri byang phyogs logs su drang srong ga la pa der 'ongs nas der phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:198b-3: drang srong de'i spyil po la padmos 'khor bar bskor ba de mthong nas rab tu dga' rangs pa'i sems skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:198b-4: drang srong chen po la shin tu legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:198b-6: yon tan chen po dang ldan pa'i drang srong ston cing 'dren pa yon tan dang ldan pa dge'o zhes bstod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:198b-7: de nas drang srong des rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:198b-10: padma 'di dag ni bdag gi nus pa ma lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:198b-15: ri lho phyogs na gnas pa'i drang srong la ri dvags kyis btsas pa'i bu mo byad bzhin bzang zhing sdug pa mi'i mtshan dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:198b-17: 'gro ba'i rjes bzhin rkang pa'i 'og nas padmo skyes pa gcig yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:198b-18: rgyal pos de skad smras pa thos nas sems rab tu dga' rangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:198b-19: ri lho phyogs logs kyi drang srong ga la ba logs su song ste phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:198b-20: drang srong de'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag btsal nas drang srong des sgor byung nas bsus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:198b-21: rgyal po chen po shul ring po nas gshegs na rab tu ngal bar ma gyur tam zhes bro dris so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:198b-22: de nas rgyal po chen pos drang srong de la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:199a-0: khyod la bu mo zhig yod pa de gnyen bya @199a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:199a-4: bdag phongs pa la bu mo gcig pu zhig yod pa de chung la ci yang mi shes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:199a-5: chung nas ni la bskyed bskyed pas; mi'i chos tshul ci yang ma rtogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:199a-7: 'bras bu las gzhan mi za na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:199a-8: ji ltar rgyal po chen po la dbul du rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:199a-9: bu mo 'di yang ri dvags kyis btsas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:199a-10: dbul du mi rung ngo zhes ji ltar gyur pa rgyus kyis zhib tu gsol ba'i bar du'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:199a-12: de lta bu yin yang bla /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:199a-15: da ltar spyil po'i nang na 'dug go zhes smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:199a-16: de'i tshe rgyal po chen po spyil po'i nang du zhugs nas bu mo la bltas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:199a-17: rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:199a-18: ri dvags kyi bu mo spos chus bkrus nas rin thang med pa'i gos bskon te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:199a-19: rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan nas bal gyi glang po che'i steng du bzhag nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:199a-20: 'khor brgya stong snyed kyis bskor te rol mo byed cing phyir yul du 'ongs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:199a-21: de'i tshe ri dvags kyi bu mo de thog ma btsas nas de lta bu'i mi mang po ma mthong bas dngang shing skrag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:199a-22: de'i tshe drang srong de ri mthon po'i khar song nas bu mo de la mig mi 'dzum par lta zhing 'di snyam du da ni bdag gi bu mo yang je ring je ring song bas ma mthong bar gyur nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:199b-0: phyir gnas su 'gro snyam bsams @199b nas; mig mchi ma zag cing mchis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:199b-1: bdag gis bu mo gsos pa 'di ci'ang shes pa med par bral bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:199b-3: bdag da dung gnas 'di las mi g-yo bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:199b-5: gal te bdag gi bu mo phyir bdag la lta bar gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:199b-6: ci ste ma mthong bar gyur na mi dga' zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:199b-7: sdug bsngal gyis gdungs par 'gyur gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:199b-8: re zhig 'di kho nar bsdad do snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:199b-9: de nas kyang ring zhig bsdad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:199b-10: ma mthong gi bar du bltas kyang bu mos phyir ma bltas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:199b-11: de ltar bu mos phyir ma bltas pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:199b-12: drang srong de khro ba'i sems skyes nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:199b-13: yong yang byol song las skyes pas nga la phyir ma bltas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:199b-14: ngas chung ngu nas gsos gsos nas da mir gyur te rgyal pos phrogs pas bdag ye 'ur gyur to zhes spyil bor zhugs nas rig sngags byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:199b-15: gal te rgyal pos bor bar gyur na ni der yang zad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:199b-16: ci ste gces su byas la bor bar ma gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:199b-17: bsams pa ltar ma grub cig ces sngags kyis btab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:199b-18: de'i tshe w'a ra n'a si'i rgyal po chen po de pho brang du phyin nas gces su byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:199b-19: mtshan yang btsun mo ri dvags ma zhes btags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:199b-21: blon po rnams kyang 'dus nas rgyal po la tshig snyan pas bstod nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:199b-22: rgyal po yang rab tu dga' rangs par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:200a-0: de nas kyang ring po ma lon par mngal du @200a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:200a-2: rgyal po nyid btsun mo'i rim gro byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:200a-5: btung ba la sogs pa bzang zhing 'jam por spyar to; ;de nas zla ba bcu tshang nas bu khye'u zhig btsas na rgyal po'i gdung 'tshob par re ba las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:200a-6: zla ba tshang nas pad mo gcig btsas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:200a-7: drang srong gi rig sngags kyi mthus rgyal po khros par gyur nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:200a-9: byol song las skyes pa bden zhes btsun mo las phyung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:200a-10: pad mo yang bor du bcug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:200a-11: de nas zhag ring zhig lon pa dang w'a ra n'a si'i blon po rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:200a-12: skyed mos tshal du ltad mo lta zhing rtser phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:200a-13: rtse zhing rol mo byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:200a-15: glang po che yang 'thab tu bcug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:200a-16: gyad rnams kyang stobs 'gyed du bcug pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:200a-17: gyad kyi nang na gyad rab tu mchog tu stobs che ba gcig rdog pa sa la brdabs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:200a-19: drung na padmo'i rdzing zhig yod pa yang 'gul bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:200a-20: padma'i rdzing gi drung du pha bong zhig yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:200a-21: de'i 'og na padmo zhig yod pa rdzing gi nang du lhung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:200a-22: rdzing du lhung ba'i pad mo de mdog rab tu bzang ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:200a-23: kha dog le brgan du 'dug la 'tshe ra ba'i 'od chags pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:200a-24: rgyal pos mthong nas sems rab tu dga' ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:200a-25: blon po rnams la padmo 'di lta bu ni sngon chad yang mthong ma myong ngo zhes smras so //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:200b-3: de nas padmo len pa'i mi des padmo de ngo mtshar che ba de lta bu dag mthong nas /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:200b-16: phyir pho brang du phyin nas btsun mo ri dvags ma la bdag ni gti mug can shes pa med pa /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:200b-19: phyir btsun mo dam par dbang bskur ro //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:201a-0: @201a *// rgyal bu lnga brgya pang du blangs nas /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:201a-12: rgyal bu lnga brgya gso ba'i ma ma lnga brgya btus pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:201a-20: gzhu ba dang; brdeg pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:201b-6: de'i tshe 'khor brgya stong snyed kyang tshig de dag thos nas rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyes te /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:202a-4: sus kyang bzhen ma btab bo //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:203a-9: tshal yang dben pa yod kyi der 'dug cig dang /
