K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:257a-4: yum gyis kun dga' bo la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la 'jug tu gnang ba thos nas rab tu dga' nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:257a-5: bdag gi lus mi rtag pa 'dis deng 'dir rtag pa'i rin po che'i lus su gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:257a-6: bdag gi srog 'di yang skad cig skad cig cing 'gyur zhing 'pho ba las deng 'dir rin po che'i srog tu gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:257a-7: da ltar bdag gi lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:257a-9: nor yang rkyen 'dus pa las yod par zad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:257a-10: da ni rin po che'i nor rnyed par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:257a-11: de ltar bdag gis phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:257a-12: bde bar yon tan chen po mthong bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:257a-13: kun dga' bo la lhag par bkur sti dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:257a-14: rim gro bya ba'i sems skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:257a-15: kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:257a-17: de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs te gsungs pa'i rjes su spyod cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:257a-19: srog yal yang nyams par mi bgyid do /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:257a-20: de nas de bzhin gshegs pas btsun par bya ba'i chos rnam pa brgyad nyams par mi bya ba yang zhib tu bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:257a-21: de'i tshe yum goo ta m'i snying rje chen po'i shugs kyis ma 'ongs pa'i bud med thams cad kyi phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:257b-0: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas kyi @257b chos la dad cing mos pa zhig mchis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:257b-1: de yang bstan pa la 'jug par gnang bar mdzad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:257b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:257b-4: bud med gang sangs rgyas kyi chos srung zhing 'dzin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:257b-8: dge ba'i chos rnams nyams su len na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:257b-10: khyim par 'dug kyang skyabs su 'gro ba gsum dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:257b-12: khrims rdzogs pa'i bar du nod cing rnam par thar pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:257b-13: byang chub kyi yan lag gi chos kyi bar du 'jug tu gnang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:257b-14: de la nan tan byas na 'bras bu rnam pa gsum yang 'thob cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:257b-16: mi'i mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:257b-17: goo ta m'i sa de skad gsungs pa thos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:257b-18: rab tu mgu rangs dga' ba'i sems su gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:257b-19: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:257b-20: bdag gis 'bras bu thob bar gyur pa yang sangs rgyas kyi bka' drin lags so; ;bcom ldan 'das kyis stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:257b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can rnams la drin yod pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:257b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can rnams la drin yod ce'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:257b-24: drin med ces mi dgongs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:257b-25: gal te de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams la drin bgrang na mnyam snyoms pa'i thugs nyams par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:258a-1: de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can la drin yod ce'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:258a-2: med ces dgongs na mnyam snyoms pa yang med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:258a-4: sems can gang gis sangs rgyas la gnod pa zhig byas na yang de la zhe sdang ba yang med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:258a-5: sems can gang spos tsandan 'di gus de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la bskus na yang de la de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes par mi dgongs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:258a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can la mnyam snyoms par gzigs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:258a-7: 'di ni kun dga' bo'i drin yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:258a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i drin ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:258a-9: kun dga' bo'i rkyen gyis bud med rnams sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la 'jug par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:258a-14: bud med rnams rtag par sems rtse gcig tu kun dga' bo la soms shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:258a-17: ming nas kyang brjod pa rgyun du drin dran par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:258a-18: de ma yin na nyin mtshan dus drug tu yang mi brjod par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:258a-20: de nas goo ta ma'i sa dge slong ma rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:258a-21: bud med rnams la 'di skad ces bsgo'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:258a-22: bdag cag rnams kyis ston pa kun dga' bo la skyabs su gsol te srog phyogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:258a-23: bud med gang zhig rtag tu bde skyid pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:258b-2: rtag tu dpyid zla 'bring po'i tshes brgyad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:258b-3: ston zla 'bring po'i tshes brgyad la gos sar pa gtsang ma bgos te; sems rtse gcig tu nyin zhag gcig khrims brgyad ma nos la dus drug tu brtson 'grus bskyed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:258b-4: mchod pa byas na kun dga' bos rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus skyob cing bsams pa bzhin du 'grub par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:258b-5: 'khor mang po rnams chos thos pas rab tu dga' nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:258b-6: bskor ba byas nas phyir dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:258b-7: thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa'i mdo las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:258b-8: snying rje'i le'u zhes bya ste bdun no ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:258b-10: de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khor mang pos yongs su bskor nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:258b-17: 'khor mang po'i the tshom sems kyis rtogs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:258b-18: stan las langs nas sangs rgyas la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:258b-20: ci'i slad du ma 'gags pa lta bu ma rabs rigs ngan pa yang rab tu 'byung du gnang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:258b-21: ma 'gags pa rab tu byung bas; rgyal rigs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:258b-22: rje'u rigs thams cad kyi dad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:258b-23: gus pa'i sems nyams par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:258b-24: de ltar dad pa'i sems nyams pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:259a-0: bsod nams kyi dngos po yongs su nyams @259a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:259a-2: rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i sras dge slong dga' bos kyang brnyas pa'i sems skyes par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:259a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:259a-4: 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:259a-5: khyed rnams legs par nyon cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:259a-6: khyed rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mnyam snyoms pa'i thugs rje chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:259a-7: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:259a-9: ting nge 'dzin med do zhes smras kyang bla yi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:259a-10: dge slong ma 'gags pa 'di yang dag par ma rabs rigs ngan yin zhe'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:259a-13: brtson 'grus tha ma yin no zhes byar rung ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:259a-14: khyed rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:259a-15: nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:259a-17: 'gyur zhing 'pho ba'o zhes byas kyang bla /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:259a-18: dge slong ma 'gags pa mar bas rigs ngan las rab tu byung ba yin no zhes bya bar mi rung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:259a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis yang dag pa'i bden pa'i tshig gsungs pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:259a-20: khyed rnams de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa la yid ches par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:259a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'khor ba'i skyon dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:259a-22: nyes pa gzigs shing mkhyen pas rang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:259b-0: dge slong ma 'gags pa lta bu rab tu byung bas rig pa gsum @259b dang; mngon par shes pa drug dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:259b-1: rnam par thar pa brgyad du ldan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:259b-3: mi rnams kyi mchod pa'i gnas su gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:259b-4: dam pa'i chos srung zhing 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i mchog dam par gyur te thams cad kyis mchod pa'i gnas su gyur pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:259b-5: so so'i skye bo dag kyang 'bras bu dam pa gsum thob par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:259b-7: da ltar gyi 'bras bu thob pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:259b-9: ma 'ongs pa'i 'bras bu thob par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:259b-10: de bas na 'gags pa ni spyod pa mchog dam pa dang ldan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:259b-11: phyogs gcig tu snying rje che ba'i byang chub sems dpa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:259b-13: sangs rgyas grangs med pa bye ba brgya stong snyed la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed la bsnyen bkur byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:259b-14: sangs rgyas de dag gi chos la yang 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i mchog byas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:259b-15: da ltar sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa'i chos la yang 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i mchog tu gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:259b-16: de'i tshe dge slong dga' bos sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa thos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:259b-17: 'dug pa las langs te mgo bos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:259b-18: 'phags pa koondi n+ya'i rkang pa la phyag btsal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:259b-19: mthar gyis ma 'gags pa'i drung du phyin nas thal mo sbyar nas btud pa tsam byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:259b-21: dga' bo la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:259b-22: dga' bo khyod ni shes par byos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:259b-23: dbul zhing sdug par de 'gyur ram //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:259b-24: che ba tsan nyams par mi 'gyur gyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:260a-0: @260a *// rab tu byung ba'i chos nyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:260a-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar dga' bo la bstan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:260a-3: dga' ba'i chos rnam pa du ma gsungs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:260a-4: dga' bo rab tu dga' mgu rangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:260a-5: gos tshags bcos nas 'phags pa ma 'gags pa'i rkang ba la mgo bos phyag btsal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:260a-6: de ma thag tu gnams yang rnam pa drug tu g-yos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:260a-8: sems mnyen zhing las su rung bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:260a-9: bdag gi don rab tu rnyed cing bya ba byas par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:260a-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa ma 'gags pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:260a-11: khyod kyis myur du seng ge'i sgra sgrogs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:260a-16: rab tu byung ba'i 'khor bdun gyi khyad par dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:260a-17: de dag gi skyabs su 'gro ba gsum dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:260a-18: gtan khrims lnga nas tshul khrims thams cad kyi bar du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:260a-19: sems can la phan pa'i tshul khrims dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:260a-20: nyon mongs pa sbyong ba'i tshul khrims dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:260a-21: spyod lam gyis gdul ba'i tshul khrims dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:260a-22: bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:260a-23: zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:260a-24: dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyas par byos shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:260a-26: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:260b-0: de bzhin gshegs pas rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus @260b bdag la byin gyis brlabs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:260b-1: bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la cung zad cig zhu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:260b-3: dkon mchog gsum zhes bgyi ba gang lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:260b-5: chos dang; dge 'dun zhes bgyi ba dkon mchog gsum la mtshan nyid ma mchis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:260b-9: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi ba ji ltar gzungs su gzung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:260b-12: gsum zhes gsung pa yang mi rigs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:260b-13: gal te skyabs su mchi ba gsum du gsungs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:260b-14: ci'i slad du 'khor rnam pa bdun mchis par gsungs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:260b-16: ci la skyabs su mchi na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:260b-17: skyabs su mchi ba zhes bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:260b-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de dag so so nas rnam par bkrol te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:260b-20: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni tshor ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:260b-21: chos kyi mtshan nyid thams cad mngon sum du tshor ba'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:260b-22: gzhan yang; sems can thams cad ni khams gsum na rgyun du gnyid kyis myos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:260b-23: sangs rgyas ni byang chub kyi spyan bye bas na bdag kyang tshor ba la pha rol po yang tshor bar byed pas tshor ba zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:260b-24: sangs rgyas ni chos thams cad la thabs thob pa thams cad gsungs pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:260b-26: ji ltar na sangs rgyas kyis thams cad gsungs pa zhes bgyi ba lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:261a-0: @261a *// 'on te dus tshod las ma yol bar dbang po ci dang 'phrod pa bzhin du gsungs pa la bgyi'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:261a-1: 'on te so so'i sde tha dad pa bzhin du rjes su gsungs pa la bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:261a-3: sangs rgyas ni dbang po ji bzhin du dus las mi yol bar chos thams cad gsungs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:261a-4: phyis nye gnas rnams kyis chos kyi sde snod bsdus pa'i tshe mdo sde'i pag la bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:261a-5: sangs rgyas kyis ni skabs kha cig tu nye gnas rnams la tshul khrims lci ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:261a-8: ltung ba med pa bcas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:261a-10: skabs kha cig tu ni rgyu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:261a-11: 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid las nyon mongs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:261a-12: nye ba'i nyon mongs pa skye bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:261a-13: las kyi mtshan nyid gsungs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:261a-14: chos mngon pa'i sde snod phye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:261a-16: mi'i 'jig rten du bcas pa la ci dang 'phrod pa bzhin du bstan cing gsungs pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:261a-17: gzhung gcig nas 'phros pa zhes bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:261a-18: 'dul ba'i skal ba dang ldan pa'i gang zag rnams kyis spyod pa'i las su gsungs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:261a-19: sems can dbang po rnon po rnams la don zab mo rnam pa mang po gsungs pa ni; gzhung bar ma zhes bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:261a-20: slob ma rnams kyi spyod pa'i las su gsungs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:261a-21: bsam gtan gyi chos rnam pa sna tshogs gsungs pa ni gzhung sil bu zhes bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:261b-0: gang @261b zag bsam gtan byed pa rnams kyi spyod pa'i las su gsungs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:261b-1: mu stegs can mang po gzhig pa'i don du gzhung ring po gsungs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:261b-3: gal te sangs rgyas thams cad gsungs pa la gnas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:261b-4: mdo sde las sangs rgyas shing ljon pa zhig gi drung du bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:261b-5: shing de'i yal ga gcig gi 'dab ma las bzung nas nye gnas rnams la yal ga gzung ba 'di'i 'dab ma mang ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:261b-6: shing ljon pa chen po'i 'dab ma mang zhes bka' stsal nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:261b-7: shing ljon pa'i 'dab ma mang ngo zhes gsol pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:261b-8: sangs rgyas kyis kyang ngas mkhyen pa'i chos ni shing ljon pa'i 'dab ma dang 'dra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:261b-9: ngas bshad pa'i chos ni lag pas gzung ba'i 'dab ma dang 'dra'o zhes gsungs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:261b-10: sangs rgyas thams cad gsungs pa'o zhes bgyir rung ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:261b-12: mtshan nyid tha dad pa thams cad kyi thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:261b-13: mtshan nyid gcig pa thams cad kyi thams cad yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:261b-14: 'dir ni mtshan nyid tha dad pa thams cad la dgongs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:261b-15: sangs rgyas ni thams cad gsungs pa'o zhes bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:261b-16: de yang sems can gyis zad par gzung mi nus pa la bya yi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:261b-17: sangs rgyas kyis gsungs mi nus pa ni ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:261b-19: thams cad mkhyen pa la yang thams cad gsungs pa zhes bya yi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:262a-0: drang thabs su thams cad gsungs pa zhes byar mi @262a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:262a-3: gal te sangs rgyas kyis mkhyen pas gsungs pa lags na nyan thos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:262a-4: rang sangs rgyas kyang shes pa la brten te smra na; ci'i slad du de la yang sangs rgyas zhes mi gdags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:262a-6: de lta bu ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:262a-7: sangs rgyas ni mkhyen pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:262a-8: gsungs pa gnyi ga'i mthar phyin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:262a-9: theg pa gnyis kyi shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:262a-10: smra ba ni chos kyi mthar ma phyin pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:262a-12: sangs rgyas ni chos thams cad chub par mkhyen pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:262a-13: ming btags pa yang mkhyen gyi; theg pa gnyis kyis de ltar mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:262a-15: sangs rgyas ni chos brnyes pa yang mtha' yas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:262a-16: chos gsungs pa yang mtha' yas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:262a-17: theg pa gnyis ni de ltar mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:262a-19: sangs rgyas kyis brnyes pa'i thun mong ni theg pa gnyis kyis thob pa dang thun mong ba yang yod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:262a-20: nyan thos kyis thob pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:262a-21: thun mong ma yin pa yang yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:262a-22: theg pa gsum gyis shes pa thun mong ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:262a-24: theg pa gnyis kyis shes pa thun mong ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:262a-25: sangs rgyas 'ba' zhig gis brnyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:262a-26: theg pa gnyis kyis mi shes pa yang sangs rgyas nyag gcig gis mkhyen to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:262a-28: ji tsam du sgrom chen kha gab kyang che ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:262b-0: chos chen mtshan nyid kyang mtha' @262b yas pas sangs rgyas ni mtha' yas pa'i ye shes kyis mtha' yas pa'i chos gsungs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:262b-1: theg pa gnyis kyi ye shes ni mtha' yod pas chos kyi mtshan nyid ces mi gdags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:262b-3: dbang po dang don du ldan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:262b-4: dbang po zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi dbang po'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:262b-5: don zhes bya ba ni shes rab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:262b-6: dbang po'i don zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyis dmigs pa'i chos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:262b-7: sangs rgyas ni dbang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:262b-9: shes rab kyis dmigs pa'i chos kyang mthar ma phyin pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:262b-10: theg pa gnyis kyis ni dbang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:262b-11: don gnyis ka ma rdzogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:262b-13: sangs rgyas ni chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mkhyen pa'i yang dag pa'i ye shes brnyes pa yin no; ;theg pa gnyis kyis ni chos kyi gting chub par mi shes pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:262b-14: yang dag pa'i ye shes zhes bya bar mi rung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:262b-15: de ltar don rnam pa mang po'i sgo nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:262b-16: theg pa gnyis la sangs rgyas zhes byar mi rung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:262b-17: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni tshig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:262b-18: sgra'i sgo nas gdags su mi rung gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:262b-19: don gyi sgo nas btags pas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:262b-20: de yang gnyen po'i chos thams cad mkhyen pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:262b-22: 'jig rten pa'i sgra skad mi mthun pas 'jig rten pa rang gi mi shes par zad kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:263a-0: sangs rgyas kyis ni kun mkhyen pas @263a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:263a-3: dge slong rtsib logs ces bya ba'i gzhung las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:263a-5: so so'i skye bo dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:263a-6: kha cig dben zhing zhi ba la dad pa yang yod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:263a-7: kha cig ni bsam gtan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:263a-8: ting nge 'dzin la dad pa yang yod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:263a-9: kha cig ni rkyen gzhan gyis gsang mkhyud de mi ston pa yang yod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:263a-10: sangs rgyas kyis brnyes pa'i chos ni byams pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:263a-12: gzhan la ston cing gsung bar spro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:263a-13: gzhan du na gdug pa gsum bcom pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:263a-16: theg pa gnyis kyang gdug pa gsum bcom na ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das zhes mi gdags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:263a-18: de lta bu ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:263a-19: theg pa gnyis ni phyir ldog pa yod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:263a-20: sangs rgyas la ni phyir ldog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:263a-21: phyir ldog pa la yang rnam pa gsum ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:263a-23: 'bras bu ma yin pa'i phyir ldog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:263a-24: spyod pa'i las phyir ldog pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:263a-25: 'bras bu phyir ldog ces bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:263a-26: nyan thos kyi 'bras bu gsum phyir ldog pa zad kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:263a-27: 'bras bu tha ma phyir mi ldog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:263a-28: theg pa bar ma la rnam pa gnyis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:263a-29: gal te bskal pa brgya'i bar du rnal 'byor spyod pa'i rang sangs rgyas ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:263b-0: gal te thog ma @263b nas theg pa chung du'i 'bras bu gsum las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:263b-1: rang sangs rgyas su gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:263b-2: de'i 'bras bu ni phyir ldog par 'gyur gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:263b-3: sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu ni phyir mi ldog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:263b-4: 'bras bu ma yin pa'i phyir ldog pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:263b-5: gal te theg pa gsum la phyogs pa'i gang zag 'bras bu ma thob par phyir ldog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:263b-6: dge slong rnal 'byor can le lo byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:263b-8: rnal 'byor spyod pa la nyams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:263b-9: mi brtson pa 'di gsum ni 'bras bu ma yin pa'i phyir ldog pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:263b-10: spyod pa'i las phyir ldog ces bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:263b-11: ji tsam du thob par bya ba'i chos mngon sum du las su mi rung ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:263b-13: sangs rgyas kyi stobs bcu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:263b-14: theg pa chung du'i ye shes bcu lta bu gcig la las su byas kyi lhag ma gzhan mi dgos pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:263b-15: mdo sde'i tshigs su bcad pa 'bum kha ton du shes pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:263b-16: gal te kha ton du ma byas pa'i dus na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:263b-17: de kun la spyod pa'i las phyir ldog pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:263b-18: theg pa chung du la yang 'bras bu phyir mi ldog pa yod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:263b-19: theg pa bar ma la yang 'bras bu ma yin pa'i phyir ldog pa yod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:263b-20: sangs rgyas la ni 'bras bu ma yin pa'i phyir ldog pa med do; ;de yang chos thams cad la brtson 'grus ma byas pa mad pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:263b-21: theg pa gnyis la ni spyod pa las phyir ldog pa yod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:263b-22: sangs rgyas la ni gcig tu ma nges te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:264a-1: bcu las gcig las su byas pas chog gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:264a-2: dgu las su bya mi dgos pa ldog pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:264a-3: yang gzhan du na las su bya ba la mi dgos pa'i phyir ldog pa med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:264a-5: mdo sde'i tshigs su bcad pa khri phrag nyi shu kha ton du 'don shes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:264a-6: gang zag ni mthu zhan pas nyin zhag gcig gam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:264a-7: nyin zhag gnyis kyi bar du rdzogs par 'don nus kyis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:264a-8: sangs rgyas ni skad cig tsam gyis rdzogs pas stobs bcu yang de dang 'dra ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:264a-9: las su bya dgos na skad cig tsam gyis mdzad pa tshad med pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:264a-10: las su bya ba la mi dgos pa'i phyir ldog pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:264a-12: sangs rgyas la las su bya ba la mi dgos pa'i phyir ldog pa med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:264a-14: na bza' smad g-yogs gsol ba'i tshe so so'i skye bo'i chos lta bur gzhung med par gsol ba ni ma yin te de yang sems can mang po la phan pa'i don du phrin las ci mdzad kyad phan pa yod na las de mdzad kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:264a-15: phan pa med na mi mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:264a-16: de ltar las su bya ba la mi dgos pa'i phyir ldog pa med kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:264a-17: so so nas dgos pa yod de gcig tu nges pas sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:264a-19: nyan thos la ci'i slad du 'bras bu gsum ni phyir ldog la 'bras bu tha ma phyir mi ldog pa lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:264b-1: 'bras bu gsum ni sngon yang thob pas na phyir ldog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:264b-2: 'bras bu tha ma ni da dung ma thob pas ni phyir mi ldog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:264b-4: gang zag bkren pa zhig kha zas zhim po dang phrad na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:264b-5: yun ring por mi brjed pa ltar don 'di yang de dang 'dra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:264b-8: bzod pa thogs pa med pa'i lam du 'gyur la ye shes rnam par grol ba'i lam du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:264b-9: 'bras bu gsum ni ye shes thogs pa med pa'i lam du ma gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:264b-10: ye shes rnam par grol ba'i lam du ma gyur pa'i phyir phyir ldog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:264b-12: bden pa mthong ba'i lam ni phyir mi ldog gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:264b-13: bsam pa'i lam ni phyir ldog ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:264b-15: ma dag pa'i 'du shes kyis nyon mongs pa'i mdud pa gcad pa'i phyir ro; ;sems pa la ni kun nas nyon mongs pa yod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:264b-16: bden pa mthong ba la kun nas nyon mongs pa med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:264b-17: bden pa mthong bas kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:264b-18: bden pa mthong bas kun nas nyon mongs pa yang mthong la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:264b-19: don mthong bas don zab mo sems pa yang skye ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:264b-20: kun nas nyon mongs pa phyir mi ldog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:264b-22: bden pa mthong ba'i ye shes kyi stobs che ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:264b-24: sdong po chen pos rdzas mnan pa dang 'dra ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:264b-25: sems shing yid la byed pa'i shes rab zhan pas phyir ldog pa yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:265a-0: @265a *// bden pa mthong ba 'dod pa'i khams kyi bzod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:265a-1: shes rab kyi sems gnyis kyis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:265a-2: dgu pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mdud pa gcod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:265a-3: khams gong ma'i bzod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:265a-4: shes rab kyi sems gnyis kyis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:265a-5: kun nas nyon mongs pa bdun cu rtsa gnyis gcod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:265a-6: gzugs med pa'i khams kyi mthar phyin pas phyir ldog pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:265a-8: de 'ba' zhig la bcom ldan 'das zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:265a-10: sangs rgyas la ni bag chags kyi rnam pa med kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:265a-11: theg pa gnyis ka'i bag chags ma zad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:265a-13: dge slong rtag tu bldad pa zhes bya ba rtag par ba lang ltar bldad pa yang tshe rabs snga ma la tshe rabs du mar ba lang byed byed pa las mir skyes pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:265a-15: dge slong zhig zag pa zad kyang rtag tu me long la lta ba ni tshe rabs du mar bud med smad 'tshong ma las mir skyes pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:265a-18: gdang la 'dzeg par dga' ba yang tshe rabs du mar spre'u byed byed pa las mir skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:265a-19: de dag la ni bcom ldan 'das zhes byar mi rung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:265a-21: 'di skad bdag gi thos zhes bgyi ba sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:265a-22: bdag gis thos zhes gsungs sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:265b-0: sangs rgyas mya ngan @265b las 'das pa'i 'og tu thos zhes gsungs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:265b-1: chos kyi mdzod bsdus pa'i tshig las bdag gis thos zhes bya na sangs rgyas shing bstan pa yang bdag la ma lus par bstan cing bshad par gsol lo zhes ma smras sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:265b-3: lo nyi shu'i bar du chos kyi tshig ci bshad pa de ji ltar bstan par bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:265b-5: sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:265b-6: tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis kyang chos grangs med pa ston la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:265b-7: chos grangs med pa'i don yang tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis ston te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:265b-8: sangs rgyas kyis mdo tsam zhig bstan na yang kun dga' bos ma lus par shes pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:265b-9: rno ba'i shes rab kyis gzungs su 'dzin pa'i stobs che ba'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:265b-10: chos brgyad khri yod ces bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:265b-11: dper na; shing gi rtsa ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:265b-14: 'dab ma la spyir sdong po gcig ces bya ba ltar /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:265b-15: sangs rgyas kyis sems can gyi don du thog ma nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:265b-16: tha ma'i bar du chos bstan pa la sde snod gcig ces bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:265b-18: gzhan du na sangs rgyas gdan gcig las ma g-yos par lo nyi shu'i bar du chos bshad kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:265b-19: kun dga' bos ma thos na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:265b-20: ci'i slad du bdag gis thos zhes bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:265b-22: lha rnams kyis kun dga' bo la smras zhes kyang bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:266a-0: gzhan du ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan @266a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:266a-1: 'das kun rdzob 'jig rten pa'i thugs kyis kun dga' bos shes par byas zhes kyang bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:266a-2: gzhan du na dge slong rnams las thos zhes kyang bya'o; ;gzhan yang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:266a-3: kun dga' bos 'di skad ces sangs rgyas la gsol ba btab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:266a-4: sangs rgyas kyi na bza' rnying pa bdag la mi stsal cing yon bdag gi bsod snyoms bdag la mi stsal bar gsol lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:266a-5: bdag ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir sangs rgyas la phu dud dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:266a-9: zas kyi phyir ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:266a-10: dge slong gzhan rnams ni snga dro dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:266a-11: phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe sangs rgyas mthong gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:266a-12: bdag ni nam lta 'dod na mthong bar gsol lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:266a-14: lo nyi shu'i bar du chos gsungs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:266a-15: chos bstan pa la sde snod gcig ces bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:266a-17: yang gzhan du na yi ge'i tsheg bar bcu drug la tshigs su bcad pa phyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:266a-18: yi ge'i tsheg bar sum cu rtsa gnyis la tshigs su bcad pa gcig ces bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:266a-20: yang gzhan du na tshig bcad kyi rkang pa ring thung las yi ge'i tsheg bar bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis la tshigs su bcad pa gcig ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:266a-22: yang gzhan du na zla ba byed phyed cing tshul khrims bstan pa la sde snod gcig ces bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:266b-0: de ltar na brgyad @266b khri'o; ;yang gzhan du na sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa drug khri drug stong la sde snod gcig ces bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:266b-2: yang gzhan du na sangs rgyas kyis nyon mongs pa brgyad khri'i gnyen por /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:266b-3: chos kyi sman brgyad khrir gsungs bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:266b-4: chos kyi sgo mo brgyad khri zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:266b-8: chos mngon pa sangs rgyas kyis sngar ma smos la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:266b-9: 'dul ba sangs rgyas kyis sngar smos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:266b-12: sangs rgyas kyis bcas pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:266b-15: nye gnas rnams kyis chos bstan pa yang yod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:266b-17: brgya byin lha'i dbang po lta bu bdag ni sbyin pa byin pa'i nang na mchog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:266b-19: bdag gis sbyin pa byin pas lha'i dbang por gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:266b-20: bsam pa yid bzhin no zhes smras te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:266b-21: sangs rgyas kyis kyang de bzhin no zhes gsungs pa yang yod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:266b-22: dus kha cig tu sangs rgyas sprul pas sangs rgyas su sprul te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:266b-23: sprul pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos gsungs pa yang yod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:266b-24: 'dul ba ni de lta bu ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:266b-25: thams cad sangs rgyas kyi gsungs pas de bas na sangs rgyas kyis sngar smos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:266b-26: yang gzhan du na mdo sde ni gnas gang na bzhugs pa bzhin gsungs kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:266b-27: 'dul ba ni de lta bu ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:266b-28: gnas gang du nyes pa byung na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:267a-0: de nyid du khrims bca' ba ma @267a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:267a-2: mtshams kyi phyi rol tu bca' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:267a-3: khyim pa'i nang na nyes pa byung na /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:276b-12: de ltar chang 'thungs pas khrims bzhi char gcig car nyams par byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:276b-13: chang 'thungs na mtshams med pa bzhi yang byed par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:276b-14: dge 'dun gyi dbyen 'ba' zhig byed mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:276b-15: 'di yang sngon gyi las kyis gnyer ba ma yin mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:276b-16: 'on kyang spyod ba dang mi dran par smyo ba myong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:276b-17: chang 'thungs pas ban glang myos pa ltar myos shing 'khrug par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:276b-18: chang gis myos na yang dag pa'i las su bya ba bsam gtan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:276b-21: dge 'dun gyi las bya ba rnams shor bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:276b-22: rang bzhin gyi sdig pa ma yin mod kyi rang bzhin gyi sdig pa dang 'dra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:276b-23: de nas ma 'gags pas yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:277a-0: dge bsnyen gyi khrims lta bu sems can 'ba' zhig las khrims @277a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:277a-2: sems can ma yin pa las kyang thob par rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:277a-3: 'on te gsad du rung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:277a-5: mi tshangs par spyad du rung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:277a-6: rdzun smrar rung ba'i sems can las khrims thob par 'gyur ram /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:277a-7: 'on te gsad du mi rung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:277a-9: mi tshangs par spyad du mi rung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:277a-10: rdzun smrar mi rung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:277a-11: sems can las kyang khrims thob par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:277a-13: sems can las ni khrims bzhi thob par 'gyur gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:277a-14: sems can ma yin pa las chang mi 'thung ba'i khrims thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:277a-15: sems can du gtogs pa gsad du rung ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:277a-17: mi tshangs par spyad du rung ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:277a-19: brkur rung ba'am; mi rung ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:277a-21: mi rung ba thams cad las tshul khrims thob ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:277a-22: mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba yan chad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:277a-23: 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched man chad stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar du srog dang bcas pa thams cad las tshul khrims 'di bzhi thob par rung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:277a-24: de yang thog ma tshul khrims nod pa'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:277a-25: srog chags thams cad kyi srog mi gcod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:277a-26: thams cad ma byin par len pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:277b-0: thams cad la mi @277b tshangs par mi spyad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:277b-1: rdzun thams cad mi smra'o zhes bya ba'i mtha' dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:277b-3: de bas na sems can thams cad las tshul khrims mi thob par 'gyur ba med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:277b-4: tshul khrims 'bogs pa chog bzhin du byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:277b-5: sngar khong du chud cing yid ches par bya ba'i phyir chos bshad la sems can thams cad la byams pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:277b-6: snying rje'i sems bskyed du gzhug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:277b-7: de ltar lhag par mos pa'i sems skyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:277b-8: lhag pa'i tshul khrims thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:277b-9: yang tshul khrims thob pa ni sems can thams cad las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:277b-10: so so nas tshul khrims bzhi thob par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:277b-11: tshul khrims bzhi so sor dbye na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:277b-12: tshul khrims bcu gnyis su 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:277b-13: sems can las srog mi gcod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:277b-14: ma byin par mi len pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:277b-15: mi tshangs par mi spyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:277b-16: rdzun mi smra ba las bzlog pa'i nyes pa bzhi skye ba yang rgyu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:277b-17: rkyen gsum gyi phyir te de yang 'dod chags las skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:277b-18: zhe sdang las skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:277b-20: sems can thams cad la mi dge ba bcu gnyis po 'di yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:277b-21: mi dge ba 'di las bzlog na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:277b-22: dge ba'i tshul khrims kyi rnam par rig byed kyi gzugs bcu gnyis thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:277b-23: dpag tu med pa'i sems can thams cad las thob pa yang de dang 'dra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:277b-24: gal te dgra bcom pa khri phrag brgya'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:278a-1: phrag brgya mya ngan las 'das kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:278a-2: thog ma dgra bcom pa de dag las tshul khrims thob na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:278a-3: dgra bcom pa mya ngan las 'das kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:278a-4: tshul khrims ni nyams par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:278a-5: chang mi 'thung ba'i khrims ni lus 'di thog ma nas tha ma'i bar du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ji tsam tshad du gtogs pa thams cad la rdub re zhing khrims kyi rnam par rig byed kyi gzugs 'thob ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:278a-6: thog ma khrims nod pa'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:278a-7: chang thams cad mi 'thung ngo zhes bya bas gal te chang thams cad zad kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:278a-8: tshul khrims ni rtag tu yod pas mi nyams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:278a-10: thog ma khrims nod pa'i tshe bud med thams cad kyi sgo gsum nas 'dod pas log par mi g-yem pa'i khrims mnos la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:278a-16: thog ma byung med la 'dod pas log par mi g-yem pa'i khrims thob la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:278a-17: 'di ni bdag gi chud ma yin pas 'dod pas log par g-yem pa ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:278a-19: don 'di dang sbyar na thams cad mthun te khrims brgyad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:278a-20: khrims bcu dag sems can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:278b-0: sems can ma yin pa'i rnams las tshul khrims thob pa yang @278b de dang 'dra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:278b-1: tshul khrims nyis brgya lnga bcu yang sems can kun la so so nas tshul khrims bdun bdun zhig thob ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:278b-2: de yang rnam par dbye na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:278b-3: tshul khrims nyi shu rtsa gcig tu 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:278b-4: sems can thams cad la lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:278b-5: ngag gi sdig pa bdun 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:278b-6: sdig pa 'byung ba 'di yang rgyu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:278b-7: rkyen rnam pa gsum gyis skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:278b-8: de yang 'dod chags kyis skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:278b-9: zhe sdang gis skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:278b-10: gti mug gis skye ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:278b-12: rkyen gsum gyi sdig pa bdun bdun skye ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:278b-13: de ltar na mi dge ba'i sdig pa bdun gsum nyi shu gcig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:278b-14: sdig pa de las bzlog na tshul khrims su 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:278b-15: sems can gcig la tshul khrims kyi rnam par rig byed kyi gzugs nyi shu rtsa gcig yod pa bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:278b-16: sems can thams cad la yang de dang 'dra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:278b-17: don de dang sbyar na dus gcig tu tshul khrims grangs med pa thob par ni rung gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:278b-18: dus gcig tu gcig car nyams par 'gyur ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:278b-19: dus gcig tu med par 'gyur ba ni ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:278b-20: tshul khrims nyams zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:278b-21: gal te tshul khrims kyi rtsa ba nyams na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:278b-22: gong nas gong du 'phar bar mi 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:278b-23: ci ste tshul khrims phul la phyis nod na yang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:278b-24: tshul khrims thob par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:278b-26: nyin zhag gcig gi yan lag brgyad pa'i khrims kyi rtsa ba nyams na phyis khrims brgyad dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:279a-2: bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:279a-3: zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:279a-4: tshul khrims 'di dag gang yang nod du mi rung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:279a-5: gal te tshul khrims lnga'i rtsa ba nyams na yang khrims brgyad dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:279a-8: bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:279a-9: zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims mnos kyang thams cad thob par mi rung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:279a-10: gal te khrims lnga nyams pa'i 'og tu khrims lnga phul la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:279a-11: khrims bcu nod pa de ni gnas ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:279a-12: gal te khrims lnga phul ba'i 'og tu khrims lnga nod kyang rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:279a-16: bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:279a-17: zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims mnos kyang; khrims gang yang mi 'thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:279a-19: khrims rdzogs pa'i rtsa ba nyams na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:279a-20: gong nas gong du 'phar ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:279a-21: khrims phul te khrims nod pa ni ji ltar khrims lnga las bshad pa dang 'dra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:279a-23: bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:279a-24: zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:279a-25: so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:279a-26: tshul khrims 'di gsum las tshul khrims mchog ces bgyi ba gang lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:279a-28: bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims mchog ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:279b-0: gzhan du na so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims kyang @279b mchog yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:279b-2: gal te sangs rgyas 'jig rten du gshegs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:279b-4: bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:279b-5: zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims ni thams cad kyi dus su yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:279b-6: so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:279b-7: sems can ma yin pa las kyang thod par rung gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:279b-8: bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims dang; zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad las thob pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:279b-9: so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems kyis thob par 'gyur gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:279b-10: bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:279b-11: zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims ni byams pa'i sems kyi thob pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:279b-12: so so thar pa'i tshul khrims ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:279b-13: sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dzin pa 'khor rnam pa bdun 'jig rten na yod cing theg pa rnam gsum gyi 'bras bu rgyun mi tshad par byed pa'i gzhir 'gyur ba yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:279b-14: bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims dang; zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims ni de lta bu ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:279b-15: de bas na khams gsum na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:279b-16: mchog rab phul du gyur pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:279b-17: thog ma khrims nod pa'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:279b-19: zhu ba bzhi'i las byas ma thag tu tshul khrims rdzogs par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:279b-20: thog ma'i sems skad cig ma dang po'i tshul khrims kyi rnam par rig byed kyi gzugs ni las zhes kyang bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:280a-2: sems kyi skad cig ma phyi ma las khrims kyi rnam par rig byed kyi gzugs byung ba ni las zhes bya yi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:280a-3: las kyi lam ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:280a-4: de lta bas na sems kyi skad cig ma dang po las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:280a-5: tshul khrims kyi rnam par rig byed kyi gzugs bsam pa yongs su rdzogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:280a-6: bsam pa dang ldan pas bsam pa'i las kyi lam zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:280a-7: tshul khrims snga mas rgyu byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:280a-8: tshul khrims lhag ma'i rnam par rig byed kyi gzugs lhun gyis grub pas de bas na de la las zhes bya yi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:280a-9: las kyi lam ma yin no /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:280a-10: dang po'i sems skad cig ma gcig gi khrims ni cho ga dang yang bcas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:280a-11: cho ga med pa yang yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:280a-12: phyir rim gyis skye ba'i khrims ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:280a-13: cho ga med pa 'ba' zhig dang ldan gyi chog dang bcas pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:280a-14: thog ma'i sems skad cig ma gcig gi khrims ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:280a-16: dge bar spyod pa zhes kyang bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:280a-18: phyis rim gyis de ma thag tu skye ba'i tshul khrims kyang don de dang ldan no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:280a-19: de nas ma 'gags pas yang bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:280a-20: dus gsum du bkum pa'i nang na dus gang gis tshul khrims thob par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:280a-22: da ltar gyi dus kyi sems skad cig ma gcig gis khrims thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:280b-0: ma 'ongs pa @280b ni chos yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:280b-1: sems can ma yin pas khrims mi 'thob kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:280b-2: da ltar gyi sems skad cig ma gcig ni sems can yin pas na khrims 'thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:280b-4: dge ba'i sems kyis tshul khrims thob bam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:280b-5: mi dge ba'i sems kyis sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:280b-6: 'on te lung du ma bstan pa'i sems kyis sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:280b-7: sems med pas khrims thob par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:280b-9: thams cad kyis thob par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:280b-10: thog ma dge ba'i sems kyis dge 'dun gyi rkang pa la phyag byas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:280b-13: mkhan po gang yin pa la gsol ba gdab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:280b-14: de nas tsog tsog por 'dug la thal mo sbyar la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:280b-16: zhu ba bzhi'i las bar tshad med la dge ba'i sems kyis khrims rdzogs pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:280b-17: dge ba'i sems kyis tshul khrims thob pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:280b-18: gal te de ltar cho ga rim gyis byed pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:280b-19: rtag tu dge ba'i sems dang ldan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:280b-20: las byed pa las gsol ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:280b-21: zhu ba bzhi'i las byed pa'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:280b-22: 'dod chags dang; zhe sdang la sogs pa mi dge ba'i bsam pa byung na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:280b-23: sems can de nyid kyis tshul khrims kyi rnam par rig byed kyi gzugs dang ldan yang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:280b-24: de ni mi dge ba'i sems kyis khrims thob pa zhes bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:280b-25: de yang thog ma'i dge ba'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:280b-26: dge ba'i las kyis shugs kyis khrims thob pa yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:280b-27: mi dge ba'i sems kyis thob pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:281a-1: sems kyis cho ga'i las byas la gsol ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:281a-2: zhu ba bzhi'i las byed pa'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:281a-4: yur na log cing yur ba'i sems las khrims kyi rnam par rig byed kyi gzugs skye ba ni lung du ma bstan pa'i sems kyis khrims thob pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:281a-5: sngar dge ba'i sems kyis chog byas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:281a-7: zhu pa bzhi'i las byed pa'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:281a-8: 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:281a-9: de'i tshe khrims kyi rnam par rig byed kyi gzugs dang ldan pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:281a-10: sems med pa las khrims thob pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:281a-12: gal te khyim pa'i khrims lnga la mnos par thal byung khrims bcu mnos na /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:281a-21: gal te khrims rdzogs par mnos pas dus gcig tu khrims rnam pa gsum char thob par 'gyur na /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:281b-5: mos pa lhag par skyes nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:281b-6: de'i 'og tu khrims bcu mnod do /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:282a-11: zhes smras pas tshul khrims rdzogs pa med kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:282a-12: tshul khrims gnyis med pa ma yin te yod do; ;tshul khrims lnga dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:282a-13: tshul khrims bcu mnos pa las da phyin chad bdag dge bsnyen yin te dge sbyong ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:282a-14: zhes smras na khrims bcu med par zad kyi /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:282a-17: rab tu byung ba'i khrims thams cad dbul te bdag la skyabs su 'gro ba'i dge bsnyen du zungs shig ces smras na /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:282a-20: phyir dbul ba'i cho ga dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:282b-0: rim @282b pa ni ji ltar dus gcig tu khrims thob pa bstan pa dang 'dra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:282b-2: gal te sngon dge bsnyen las rab tu byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:282b-4: khrims lnga ma mchis par mi 'gyur ram /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:282b-8: go rims brjes par zad kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:282b-9: khrims med par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:282b-10: de yang dge bsnyen gyi ming stor te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:282b-11: dge sbyod gi ming thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:282b-12: khyim pa'i go rims ltor gyi rab tu byung ba'i go rims thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:282b-14: dge slong gi tshul khrims rdzogs pa mnos na khrims bcu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:282b-15: khrims lnga la mchis par mi 'gyur ram /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:282b-19: go rims stor bar zad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:282b-20: dge sbyong gi ming stor nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:282b-21: dge slong gi ming thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:282b-22: dge sbyong gi go rim stong nas; dge slong gi go rims thob ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:282b-24: tha ma'i bar du tshul khrims yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:282b-28: shing gi lo ma lta bur dpyid dang; dbyar ni sngo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:282b-31: de yang dus kyis bsgyur bas shing gi lo ma kha dog tha dad par zad kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:282b-32: thog ma nas tha ma'i bar du shing gi lo mar zad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:282b-33: tshul khrims kyang de dang 'dra bar rtag tu tshul khrims gcig tu zad na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:282b-34: dus kyis tha dad par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:283a-0: @283a *// rnam pa bzhir tha dad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:283a-1: de ltar dus kyis tha dad kyang gcig tu zad pa dang 'dra bar tshul khrims kyang de dang 'dra ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:283a-2: dus gsum gyis tha dad kyang tshul khrims la tha dad pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:283a-5: dge bsnyen gyi tshul khrims nod pa nyams kyis rdzogs par nod par mi nus pa tshul khrims gcig gam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:283a-8: tshul khrims mnos par chud dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:283a-12: gal te khrims mi thob na /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:283a-14: phyogs cha che ba'i dge bsnyen dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:283a-15: phyogs cha rdzogs pa'i dge bsnyen mchis par gsungs na de'i don ji lta bu lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:283a-17: de skad gsungs pa yang khrims bsrungs pa'i yon tan che chung yod pa las dgongs te gsungs kyi /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:283a-26: sangs rgyas kyis tshul khrims bcas pa yang so so nas dus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:283b-0: de yang tshul khrims @283b lnga nad pa ni gdon mi za bar nam 'tsho'i bar du mnod dgos so //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:283b-2: gdon mi za bar nyin zhag gcig pa mnod dgos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:283b-3: de lta bas na snga ma mi rung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:283b-5: zhu ba bzhi'i las byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:283b-6: khrims nod pa yang rab dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:283b-9: de la khrims lnga ni khrims tha ma'o //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:283b-15: sems 'bring gi tshul khrims mnos pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:283b-17: gal te sems rab kyis tshul khrims mnos pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:283b-19: tshul khrims rdzogs pa la rab 'bring gsum yod pa yang khrims lnga bstan pa bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:283b-20: gal te sngar sems tha mas khrims mnos pa'i 'og tu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:283b-21: sems rab 'bring gis khrims bcu mnos na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:283b-22: khrims lnga ni snga ma las skye zhing lhag pa med kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:283b-23: khrims lnga ma gtogs par kha zas dus ma yin par mi bza' ba'i bar du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:283b-24: khrims lhag ma lnga ni lhag pa'i khrims su bsgyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:283b-25: tshul khrims sngar mnos pa lnga ni tha mar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:283b-26: sems tha mas sngar khrims lnga mnos la /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:284a-3: khrims snga ma lnga ma gtogs par /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:284a-8: de bas na so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:284a-9: nyis rim du thob pa med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:284a-11: khrims lnga ni tha ma zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:284a-13: tshul khrims rdzogs pa ni rab ces bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:284a-14: don gyi sgo nas dbye na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:284a-15: sems rab kyis khrims lnga mnos na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:284a-16: khrims de ni rab ces bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:284a-17: sems 'bring gis khrims bcu mnos na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:284a-19: sems tha mas tshul khrims rdzogs par mnos na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:284a-20: tshul khrims tha ma zhes bya'o //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:284a-24: nges par gcig tu chad pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:284a-25: gal te mkhan po zhig la khrims bcu nod par gsol ba btab pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:284a-26: khrims bcu nod pa'i tshe mkhan po mngon sum du ma gyur kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:284a-28: gal te khrims bcu nod pa'i tshe mkhan po shi na shi bar shes sam /
