K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:284b-3: khrims mnod kyang khrims thob par mi 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:284b-4: dge 'dun gyi grangs ma tshangs pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:284b-5: gal te dge 'dun gyi grangs tshang na mkhan po med kyang khrims mnod du rung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:284b-8: dge bsnyen gyi khrims lnga pas tshong spogs bgyir rung ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:284b-11: las rnam pa 'di lnga ni mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:284b-12: rkang 'gros phyugs kyi tshong spogs kyi las mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:284b-13: bdag nyid kyi phyugs yod na 'tshong du gnang gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:284b-14: bshan pa la 'tshong du mi rung pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:284b-15: mda' gzhu mtshon cha'i bag tshong sogs bgyir mi rung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:284b-16: bdag la yod pa ni btsong du rung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:284b-17: chang gi tshong spogs kyi las byar mi rung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:284b-18: bdag nyid la yod na 'tshong du rung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:284b-19: srin bu mang du shi bas 'bru mar 'tshir du mi rung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:284b-20: rgya gar gyi chos kyis de bzhin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:284b-21: ga bu sha tshun chad ni 'bru mar 'tshir ba'i nang na srin bu med na nyes pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:284b-22: kha dog tshon chen po rnam pa lnga btso blag byed pa yang srin bu mang du mchi bas mi rung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:284b-23: yo ga sha la sogs pa yul gzhan dag na tshon gyi btso blag byed pa las srin bu mang du shi ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:284b-24: de bas na mi gnang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:284b-25: yul rgya yul yang kha dog mthing ga btso ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:285a-0: @285a *// srin bu mang du shi bas btso blag rnam pa lnga'i nang du gtogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:285a-3: nyin zhag gcig gi khrims brgyad ces bgyi ba dus ma lags pa phyem red kha zas mi 'tshal pa ma gtogs par dgur 'gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:285a-6: khrims zhes bya ba ni chos kyis phye ma red dus ma yin par kha zas mi bza' ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:285a-7: khrims brgyad kyi yan lag yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:285a-8: grogs su gyur pas yan lag gi khrims brgyad ces bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:285a-11: yan lag brgyad pa'i khrims mnos na gang zag de 'khor rnam pa bdun la 'khor gang gi nang du bsdu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:285a-13: nam 'tsho ba'i bar gyi khrims ma mnos kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:285a-14: nyin zhag gcig khrims yod pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:285a-15: de la yang dge bsnyen zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:285a-16: gzhan du na dge bsnyen zhes byar ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:285a-17: nam 'tsho ba'i bar du tshul khrims mnos pa med la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:285a-18: dge bsnyen ma yin zhes byar ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:285a-19: nyin zhag gcig gi khrims yod pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:285a-20: de ni gang zag bar ma do zhes mdo sde las kyang 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:285a-23: 'khor bdun ma gtogs par so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims mchis sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:285b-0: yan lag brgyad kyi khrims @285b nyid yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:285b-1: don de dang sbyar na yan lag brgyad kyi khrims nod pa 'khor rnam pa bdun gyi nang du ma gtogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:285b-2: yan lag brgyad pa'i khrims nod pa'i chos kyi ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:285b-3: nyin zhag gcig gi bar du srog mi gcod do zhes tshig de skad 'chad pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:285b-4: khrims gzhan nam 'tsho'i bar du mnos pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:285b-7: yan lag brgyad kyi khrims mnod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:285b-10: bcu'i bar du gcig car mnod du rung ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:285b-12: thog ma sangs rgyas kyis nyin zhag gcig gi khrims su bcas pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:285b-14: gal te nyams kyi mnod nus na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:285b-15: nyin zhag gcig cing lan re mnod dgos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:285b-16: nyin zhag du mnos kyang rung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:285b-17: nyin zhag gcig gi yan lag brgyad kyi khrims mnos pa'i thabs ni pha rol po gzhan las mnod dgos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:285b-18: de yang gang las mnod ce na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:285b-19: 'khor lnga po gang yang rung ba las mnod dgos so; ;yan lag brgyad kyi khrims mnos pa'i 'og tu gal te sems can la brdeg btsog byas na tshul khrims rnam par dag pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:285b-20: khrims mnos pa'i nyin par brdeg btsog ma byas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:285b-21: phyi de nyin brdeg btsog bya bar dam bcas na yang tshul khrims rnam par dag pa ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:286a-0: ngag gis ji tsam du tshul bzhin ma @286a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:286a-1: yin pa'i las byas na khrims ma nyams mod kyi rnam par dag pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:286a-4: sems kyi 'dod chags kyi rnam par rtog pa bskyed dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:286a-5: zhe sdang gi 'tshe ba'i rnam pa bskyed na yang rnam par dag pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:286a-8: yid kyi las gsum rnam par dag kyang; rjes su dran pa drug yid la ma byas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:286a-9: de yang tshul khrims rnam par dag ces mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:286a-10: yan lag brgyad kyi khrims mnos pa'i 'og tu rjes su dran pa drug yid la byas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:286a-11: tshul khrims rnam par dag ces bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:286a-12: mdo sde dag las 'dzam bu'i gling gi rgyal po 'dzam bu'i gling gi khams su gtogs pa'i mi thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:286a-13: de'i nang na yod pa'i gser dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:286a-15: nor dbyig thams cad la dbang ba'i bsod nams kyis yan lag brgyad kyi tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i bsod nams bcu drug char bgos pa'i cha gcig tsam yang mi phod do zhes 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:286a-16: su yang rung yan lag brgyad pa'i khrims nod par byas la bag med par rang nyam du rol mo'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:286a-17: gal te na kha zas zhim po la bag med par bza' ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:286a-18: rtsed mo rnam pa sna tshogs yid bzhin du bag med par byas pa'i 'og tu khrims mnod pa ni snga dro yang rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:286b-1: gal te snga nas khrims gnod pa'i sems med la bag med pa'i las rnam pa sna tshogs byas pa'i 'og tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:286b-2: khrims mnos na snga dro yang rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:286b-4: dus thams cad du khrims thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:286b-5: khrims mnos par chas pa las bgegs sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:286b-7: dbang med pa las phyis bgegs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:286b-8: bar chad med pa'i 'og tu khrims mnos na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:286b-11: dus thams cad du khrims thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:286b-13: gal te nyin par khrims bsrung la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:286b-14: mtshan mo mi srung ba'i khrims mnos na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:286b-15: yan lag brgyad kyi khrims thob bam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:286b-16: gal te mtshan mo khrims bsrung la nyin par mi srung ba'i khrims mnos na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:286b-17: yan lag brgyad kyi khrims thob par 'gyur ram /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:286b-19: gang yang khrims mi thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:286b-20: de bas na sangs rgyas kyis thog ma nas nyin zhag gcig pa'i khrims su bcas te nges pa'i tshad yin pas 'gal bar byar mi rung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:286b-23: 'o na de ltar khrims mi thob na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:286b-25: dge slong aig zhi zhig dgon pa zhig na; yi dvags kha cig sdug bsngal sna tshogs myos ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:286b-26: la la ni nyin par longs spyod bgyid la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:286b-27: mtshan mo sdug bsngal bgyid pa yang mchis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:287a-0: la la ni mtshan mo longs spyod @287a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:287a-2: nyin par sdug bsngal myong ba ngag mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:287a-3: de bas na de dag kyang sngon mi'i nang na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:287a-4: nyin par ni khrims bsrung la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:287a-5: mtshan mo ni sdig pa bgyid pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:287a-6: yang na mtshan mo khrims bsrung la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:287a-7: nyin par sdig pa'i las bgyid pa mi mthun pa'i don de dag ji lta bu lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:287a-9: skye ba snga ma'i rgyu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:287a-10: rkyen 'ba' zhig la rten du yang mi rung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:287a-11: 'di skad du bshad pa yang mdo sde'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:287a-12: 'dul ba las bshad pa ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:287a-13: de la bden pa'i don nges pa zhes bya yang mi rung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:287a-14: gzhan du na 'di skad bshad pa 'di ni 'phags pa ka ta ya nas aig zhi zhig gdul ba'i phyir sprul pa yin gyi yang dag pa ma yin no zhes 'byung ngo; ;yan lag brgyad pa'i khrims mnos pa las khrims phyir 'bul na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:287a-15: nges par 'khor rnam pa lnga la dbul mi dgos kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:287a-16: pha rol po gang zag gcig la khrims phyir dbul lo zhes tshig gcig smras pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:287a-18: so so thar pa'i khrims thob pa'i sgo nas dbye na lam rgyud lngar gtogs pa la mi'i rgyud du gtogs pa 'ba' zhig gis khrims thob kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:287a-19: rgyud lhag ma gzhan gyis khrims mi thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:287b-0: lha'i rgyud du gtogs pa ni bde ba'i longs spyod la chags shing zhen pas @287b khrims mi 'thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:287b-2: sngon 'phags pa mo'u dgal gyi nye gnas shig nad kyis btab pa las 'phags pa mo'u dgal sum cu rtsa gsum gnam du sman pa 'tsho byed la dpyad 'drir song ba las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:287b-3: de'i tshe lha'i bu rnams rab tu dga' ba'i skyed mos tshal du rtser 'dong ba'i khar bab nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:287b-4: 'phags pa mo'u dgal de dag 'gro ba'i lam kar sdod cing 'dug pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:287b-5: lha'i bu rnams 'phags pa mo'u dgal la mig gis lta tsam yang mi khom par song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:287b-6: 'tsho byed kyi thad kar phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:287b-7: rgyang ma nas mo'u dgal la lag pa bteg pa tsam zhig byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:287b-8: shing rta khrid de song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:287b-9: de nas 'phags pa mo'u dgal 'di snyam du sems so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:287b-10: 'tsho byed 'di sngon mi'i nang na 'dug pa'i tshe bdag gi slob ma yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:287b-11: da ni lha'i longs spyod la chags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:287b-12: sngon gyi dran pa nyams par gyur to snyam bsams nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:287b-13: rdzu 'phrul gyis 'tsho byed kyi shing rta 'gror med par byin gyis brlabs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:287b-14: de nas 'tsho byed shing rta las babs te 'phags pa mo'u dgal gyi rkang pa la phyag byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:287b-15: mo'u dgal gyis rgyu rkyen mang po rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gtams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:287b-16: 'tsho byed kyis mo'u dgal la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:287b-17: bdag mi'i nang na 'dug pa'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:287b-18: btsun pa'i slob ma yin pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:287b-19: lag pa tsam bteg ste bro dris kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:288a-0: lha'i bu gzhan dag de ltar byed pa @288a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:288a-2: lhar skyes pa ni bde ba'i longs spyod la zhen cing chags pas dbang med de de ltar gyur pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:288a-3: mo'u dgal gyis 'tsho byed la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:288a-4: slob ma zhig nad kyis btab ste na na de la ji ltar gso bar bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:288a-6: re zhig kha zas mi bza' bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:288a-7: de nas mo'u dgal gyis bus lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bskul to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:288a-8: sangs rgyas 'jig rten du gshegs pa yang shin tu phrad dka' na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:288a-9: ci'i phyir skabs skabs su drung du song ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:288a-11: de nas brgya byin lha'i dbang pos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:288a-12: 'phags pa mo'u dgal gyi bsam pa sems kyis shes nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:288a-14: lha'i bu zhig 'bod du btang ba las lan gsum gyi bar du bos na ma 'ongs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:288a-15: lha'i bu de la lha'i bu mo gcig dang rol mo byed pa gcig las med kyang 'dod pa la chags shing zhen pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:288a-16: lha'i dbang po tshig btsan mod kyi gtong ma phod de phyis gdod 'ongs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:288a-17: de nas brgya byin gyis ci'i phyir de ltar gyur ces dris na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:288a-18: ji ltar gyur pa drang por gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:288a-19: brgya byin gyis mo'u dgal la gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:288a-20: lha'i bu 'di la lha'i bu mo gcig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:288a-21: rol mo byed pa gcig las med kyang gtong mi phod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:288a-22: rtse dga' ni lha'i dbang por gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:288b-0: gzhal med khang @288b sna tshogs mang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:288b-1: lha'i bu mo grangs med pas bskor /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:288b-2: lha'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa sna tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:288b-3: lha'i rol mo brgya stong snyed la longs spyod cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:288b-4: rtse dga' bas shar phyogs su bltas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:288b-5: nub phyogs kyang brjed pa de lta ci smos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:288b-6: sangs rgyas 'jig rten du gshegs pa dang phrad pa yang dka'/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:288b-7: dam pa'i chos thos pa yang shin tu dka' bar shes mod kyi 'dod pa'i bde bas bcings glags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:288b-8: rang dbang med pas shes kyang byar med par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:288b-9: tshul khrims mnos pa'i chos ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:288b-10: dpa' zhing rtul phod pa'i sems kyis chad par dam bcas pas khrims thob par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:288b-11: lha'i bu lta bu ni 'dod pa'i bde ba la chags pas mi dge ba'i sems kyi shas che ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:288b-12: dge ba'i sems kyi mthu chung na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:288b-13: ci'i dbang gis khrims thob par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:288b-14: yi dvags lta bu ni bkres pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:288b-17: sems 'bar zhing tshig pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:288b-18: sems can dmyal ba pa ni tsha grang gi sdug bsngal grangs med pas gzir te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:288b-19: mi bzod pa sna tshogs myong zhing lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:288b-20: sems gdungs par gyur pas khrims thob pa'i rgyu med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:288b-21: dud 'gro lta bu ni las kyis bsgribs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:288b-22: shes pa med pas khrims gnod pa'i cho ga med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:289a-0: mdo sde kha cig las skabs kha cig tu klus tshul khrims mnos par byung ba dge ba'i sems kyis yan @289a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:289a-1: lag brgyad pa'i khrims mnos pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:289a-2: nyin zhag gcig gi bar du dge ba'i sems kyis bsod nams ni thob kyi las kyis bsgribs pas tshul khrims ni thob pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:289a-3: gling bzhis dbye na lho'i 'dzam bu'i gling dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:289a-4: nub kyi pa lang spyod dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:289a-6: gling gsum po 'dir gtogs pa'i rgya mtsho'i gling phran na 'khod pa'i mi rnams kyis khrims thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:289a-9: 'phags pa phin 'du la gnas par sangs rgyas kyis lung bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:289a-10: da ltar sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa chen po rgyas par byed pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:289a-12: shar gyi lus 'phags gling na yang dge slong yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:289a-13: de na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos byed pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:289a-15: byang gi sgra mi snyan 'ba' zhig na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:289a-16: sangs rgyas kyi chos med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:289a-18: de yang bsod nams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pas bsgribs shing; gti mug gis bsgribs pa'i phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:289a-19: 'phags pa'i chos kyi snod du ma gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:289a-20: gang zag la rnam pa bzhi ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:289a-26: rnam pa 'di bzhi la skyes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:289a-27: bud med gnyis kyis ni khrims thob par rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:289a-29: mtshan ma gnyis gnyis kyis ni khrims mi 'thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:289b-1: bud med la yang gang pha ma bsad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:289b-2: dgra bcom pa bsad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:289b-3: sangs rgyas kyi sku la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:289b-4: dge 'dun gyi dbyen byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:289b-5: dge slong ma la mi tshangs par spyad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:289b-8: dge ba'i rtsa ba bcad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:289b-9: gang zag 'di dag ni gang yang tshul khrims mi thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:289b-10: de la don chen po'i sgo nas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:289b-11: sangs rgyas kyi chos la shin tu dad cing mos pa ni 'dir ma gtogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:289b-16: byang gi sgra mi snyan nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:289b-19: sdig pa mi dge ba sna tshogs byas kyang skyabs su 'gro ba gsum mnod du rung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:289b-21: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams tshul khrims brnyes pa mnyam mam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:289b-24: tshul khrims thob ces bya ba ni sems can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:289b-25: sems can ma yin pa'i ris las khrims thob [?] par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:289b-26: sangs rgyas gcig 'jig rten du gshegs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:289b-27: sems can grangs med pa ji snyed kyi don mdzad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:289b-28: lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pas phyis sangs rgyas 'jig rten du gshegs pa dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:289b-29: sems can de dag gang las kyang tshul khrims brnyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:289b-30: de ltar na sangs rgyas rnams snga phyir tshul khrims brnyes pa mi mnyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:290a-1: rgyas 'od srung gis sems can grangs med pa zhig btul te lhag ma ma lus par mya ngan las 'das kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:290a-2: sangs rgyas 'od srung gis ni sems can de dag kun las tshul khrims brnyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:290a-3: sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pas ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:290a-4: sems can de dag gang las kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:290a-6: sangs rgyas thams cad 'dra bar dngos po 'di gsum ni mnyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:290a-8: spyod pa'i tshogs mnyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:290a-9: chos kyi sku mnyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:290a-10: sems can gyi don mdzad pa mnyam pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:290a-11: sangs rgyas thams cad 'dra bar bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyi bar du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:290a-12: yan lag lnga'i chos kyi sku yongs su rdzogs shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:290a-15: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:290a-16: thams cad kyis sems can grangs med pa ji snyed mya ngan las 'das so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:290a-18: mdo sde dag las sangs rgyas gcig 'jig rten du gshegs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:290a-19: sems can bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu snyed mya ngan las 'da' ba'i don mdzad do zhes 'byung na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:290a-20: ci'i slad du sems can grangs med pa'i don mdzad ces gsungs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:290a-22: mdo sde dag las sangs rgyas gcig 'jig rten du gshegs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:290b-0: sems can bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu snyed kyi don @290b mdzad ces smos pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:290b-1: sangs rgyas de las grol bar gyur pa la bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:290b-2: grol ba'i sems can de dag kyang la la ni sangs rgyas nyid kyis don mdzad pa yang yod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:290b-3: kha cig ni slob mas don mdzad pa yang yod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:290b-4: kha cig ni bzhag pa'i chos kyis grol ba yang yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:290b-5: sems can bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu zhes smos pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:290b-6: sangs rgyas nyid kyis don mdzad pa la bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:290b-7: sems can grangs med pa lhag ma ma lus pa mya ngan las 'das zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:290b-8: spyir don mdzad pa la bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:290b-9: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam pa ni gsum mnyam gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:290b-10: tshul khrims brnyes pa ni mi mnyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:290b-12: sdom pa ma yin pa'i khrims zhes bgyi ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:290b-14: sems can ma yin pa las thob par 'gyur ram /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:290b-16: ma zin pa kun gyis khrims thob par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:290b-18: sems can las sdom pa ma yin pa'i khrims thob par 'gyur gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:290b-19: sems can ma yin pa las sdom pa ma yin pa'i khrims mi thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:290b-20: gzhan du na gsod du rung ba'i sems can las sdom pa ma yin pa'i khrims thob kyi gsod du mi rung ba'i sems can las khrims mi thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:290b-21: yang gzhan du na gsod du rung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:290b-22: gsod du mi rung ba'i sems can gnyi ga las sdom pa ma yin pa'i khrims thob ces bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:291a-0: shan pa lug gsod pa ni rtag tu gsod pa'i @291a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:291a-2: lug gsod pa 'ba' zhig yid la byed pas de'i tshad gzung du med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:291a-4: mir skyes na 'phral du gsod pa'i las mi byed kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:291a-5: skye ba gcig nas gcig tu 'khor bas phyir lug tu skye ba'i chos yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:291a-6: de bas na sems can thams cad las sdom pa ma yin pa'i khrims thob par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:291a-7: sdom pa ma yin pa'i khrims bcu gnyis kyang de dang 'dra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:291a-8: sdom pa ma yin pa'i khrims bcu gnyis zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:291a-12: phag gso ba dang; bya gso ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:291a-20: rkun po 'dzin pa dang bcu gnyis so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:291a-21: dar gyi srin bu gso ba yang sdom pa ma yin pa'i khrims kyi nang du 'dus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:291a-22: sdom pa ma yin pa'i khrims nyams pa'i dus gsum yod yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:291a-24: chags shing zhen pa zad pa'i dus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:291a-25: sdom pa'i tshul khrims mnod pa'i dus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:291a-27: skyabs su 'gro ba gsum mnod pa'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:291a-28: thog ma'i tshig dang po gcig smras pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:291a-29: sdom pa ma yin pa'i khrims nyams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:291a-30: de'i 'og tu tshig gnyis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:291a-31: gsum pa smras pa'i tshe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:291b-0: dge ba'i tshul khrims thob par @291b 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:291b-2: gang zag gis sdom pa ma yin pa'i las byed pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:291b-3: dus tshod gang gi tshe dge ba'i tshul khrims nyams shing mi dge ba'i khrims thob par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:291b-4: bka' stsal pa; shan pa'o zhes tshig gcig dang por smra ba'i tshe dge ba'i khrims nyams par 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:291b-5: shan pa'o zhes lan gnyis lan gsum smras pas mi dge ba'i khrims thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:291b-6: yang gzhan du na gang gi tshe dge ba'i khrims btang ba de nyid kyi tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:291b-7: mi dge ba'i khrims thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:291b-8: ci ste dge ba'i khrims srung ba'i gang zag gcig bdag shan pa'o /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:291b-11: rnyed pa tsam la chags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:291b-12: phag phrug gso zhing gsod pa'i las byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:291b-13: de'i tshe dge ba'i khrims nyams pa zhes bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:291b-14: de ni dge ba'i khrims btang ba mi dge ba'i khrims thob pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:291b-15: gal te bdag shan pa'o zhes nges par dam bcas na yang mi dge ba'i khrims thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:291b-16: mi dge ba'i khrims nod pa ni bdag gis dam bcas pa tsam gyis thob par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:291b-17: pha rol po gzhan las gnod mi dgos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:291b-18: gal te mi dge ba'i khrims nyin zhag gcig gam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:291b-22: lo gnyis kyi bar du mnos par dam bcas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:291b-23: dam bcas pa'i dus ring thung las de bzhin thob par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:292a-0: de bas na sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ni skye shi @292a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:292a-1: 'khor ba la gzhol bar byed kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:292a-2: gong nas gong du 'phar ba'i don med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:292a-3: de ltar na mi dge ba'i khrims ni dngos po de nyid kyis thob pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:292a-4: dge ba'i tshul khrims dang mi 'dra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:292a-5: thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa'i mdo las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:292a-6: ma 'gags pa'i le'u zhes bya ste brgyad pa'o ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:292a-7: bam po bdun pa ste tha ma /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:292a-9: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po drin lan shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:292a-11: thabs mkhas pa chen pos sems can rnams la phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:292a-12: bde ba'i don byed pa dag dus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:292a-13: skabs shes na bstan cing bcos pa la gnod par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:292a-15: sangs rgyas mngon par 'jig rten du 'byung ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:292a-16: 'jigs pa med pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:292a-19: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:292a-24: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:292a-26: ston pa rgyal ba 'jig rten du gshegs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:292a-27: skal ba dang ldan pa'i don mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:292a-28: skal ba dang ldan pa rnams kyi don mdzad nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:292a-29: yongs su mya ngan las 'das so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:292a-30: mya ngan las 'das nas dam pa'i chos la spyod pa'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:292b-0: bram ze'i bu yid gzhungs shing rno ba'i shes rab dang ldan pa @292b gtan khrims lnga srung ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:292b-1: dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa zhig byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:292b-2: dus gzhan zhig na bram ze'i bu de yul gzhan zhig tu don gnyer du song song ba las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:292b-3: mgron du 'gro ba'i lam de 'jigs sa che bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:292b-4: lam grogs lnga brgya dang 'grogs te song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:292b-5: lam grogs de dag dang 'jigs sar phyin nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:292b-6: 'jigs sa de na mi rgod lnga brgya zhig gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:292b-7: rtag tu mgron po rgyu ba rnams 'joms so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:292b-8: de'i tshe na mi rgod de dag gis mgron po de dag gzhom par byas nas mi rgod kyi dpon po des /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:292b-9: mi gcig sngar mgron po de dag ji ltar 'gro ba lta zhing rtog tu btang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:292b-10: de'i tshe mi rgod de dag gi nang nas mi gcig cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:292b-11: sngon bram ze'i bu da dang mdza' zhing bshes pas sngar mi de dag gi nang du 'ongs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:292b-12: bram ze'u bu de la 'di skad ces bsgo'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:292b-14: khyod 'di ltar rig par byos shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:292b-15: do nub nam gyi cha stod la dgra 'ongs gis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:292b-16: ci nas kyang khyod nyid la gnod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:292b-17: rmas par ma gyur par khyod nyid kyis byol ba'i thabs byos shig par bsgo'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:292b-18: de'i tshe bram ze'i bu des tshig de dag thos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:292b-20: mi brnangs pa ltar mid du yang med la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:292b-21: skyug tu yang med pa bzhin mi bde bar gyur nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:292b-22: grogs po rnams la gtam byar ni grogs po rnams kyis mi de bsad kyis dogs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:293a-0: ci ste grogs po rnams kyis mi de bsad @293a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:293a-1: na; grogs po rnams ngan 'gro gsum du sdug bsngal grangs med pa myong bar 'gyur ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:293a-2: gal te grogs po rnams la ma la ma smras na ni dgras bsad par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:293a-3: gal te grogs po rnams bsad na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:293a-4: dgra rnams ngan 'gro gsum du ltung zhing sdug bsngal grangs med pa myong ngo snyam bsams nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:293a-5: bdag gis sems can la phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:293a-7: bdag nyid ngan 'gro gsum du ltung zhing sdug bsngal myong yang bla'o snyam bsams nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:293a-9: sgron pa'i mi de bsad nas grogs po rnams bde bar byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:293a-10: de'i tshe na grogs po rnams kyis de ltar gyur pa mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:293a-11: bram ze'i bu de la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:293a-13: khyod ni mi'i nang nas mchog tu gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:293a-14: shin tu dge ba yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:293a-15: ci'i phyir deng 'di lta bu'i sdig pa chen po byed ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:293a-16: de'i tshe bram ze'i bu des pus mo sa la btsugs nas thal mo sbyar te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:293a-17: ngo mtshar dang ldan pa'i sems kyis grogs po dag la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:293a-18: bdag de ring bya bar mi rigs pa'i sdig pa chen po byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:293a-19: de yang sems can rnams la phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:293a-20: grogs po rnams la bde bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:293a-21: grogs po rnams kyis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:293a-22: khyod nyid kyis mi bsad pa la nged bde bar byas so zhes brjod du yang ci yod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:293b-0: @293b yang; bram ze'i bus smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:293b-1: bdag gis bsad pa'i mi 'di ni dgra ma rungs pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:293b-2: dgra 'dis grogs po khyed gsod du 'ongs pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:293b-3: bdag ni grogs po khyed kyi phyir mi 'di'i srog bcad pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:293b-4: khyed rnams ni bde bar yul du phyin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:293b-5: bdag ni sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong yang bla'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:293b-6: de nas grogs po lnga brgya rnams kyis skad phyung ste dus nas; 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:293b-7: gnam mtha' 'og na phangs par bya ba ni srog las 'da' ba med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:293b-8: 'jigs pa'i nang na 'chi ba las 'da' ba med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:293b-9: de bas na sems can thams cad ni lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:293b-18: gos kyang yongs su gtong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:293b-19: bdag cag ni deng du phyir lan gcig 'tsho ba'i srog thob bo zhes smras nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:293b-21: khyod sems can gyi phyir ngan 'gro gsum gyi sdug bsngal khyad du bsad pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:293b-22: bdag cag ni khyod kyi drin shin tu lci bar dran par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:293b-23: drin lci ba dran pas na deng bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do zhes smras nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:293b-24: thams cad byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:293b-25: de'i tshe na mi rgod lnga brgya rnams kyis kyang 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:293b-26: khyod ni kun gyi mchog shin tu dge ba yin no zhes zer na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:294a-0: ci'i phyir 'di lta bu'i sdig pa @294a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:294a-3: bdag bya bar mi rigs pa'i sdig pa chen po byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:294a-4: de yang sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:294a-6: srog gi skyabs bya ba'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:294a-7: de nas mi rgod de dag gis bram ze'i bu la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:294a-8: khyod nyid kyis mi bsad pa la bdag cag la phan pa yang ci zhig yod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:294a-10: mi rgod khyed rnams 'di na 'dug par snga nas shes kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:294a-13: bdag gis grogs po rnams la yang ma smras /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:294a-14: gtam ma byas pas khyed kyi lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:294a-15: srog bde bar gyur pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:294a-16: de'i tshe mi rgod de dag gis de skad ces smras pa thos nas 'di snyam du gyur to; ;bdag cag gi lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:294a-17: srog kyang gzod gson no snyam bsams nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:294a-18: bram ze'i bu la thal mo sbyar te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:294a-21: snying rje chen po dang ldan pa bdag cag gis deng phyin chad ci dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:294a-22: ci bya ba bstan du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:294a-24: khyed rnams myur du bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:294a-25: de nas mi rgod rnams kyang drin bsab pa'i phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:294a-26: de ma thag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:294b-0: bcom ldan 'das @294b kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:294b-1: byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus la gnas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:294b-2: byang chub yongs su brgyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:294b-3: sangs rgyas kyi bka' drin gyi lan bsab par 'dod pa dag rtag tu sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa dang 'dra bar 'du shes bskyed cing dran par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:294b-6: de'i dus de'i tshe na bram ze'i bu de gzhan zhig yin par ma sems shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:294b-8: de'i tshe bram ze'i bur gyur pa de ni da ltar nga nyid yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:294b-9: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis bskal pa dgu bcu snyed kyi 'khor ba las 'das nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:294b-11: byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa chen po spyod cing drin lan shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:294b-14: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od ma'i tshal na bzhugs pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:294b-15: dge slong gcig lus la 'brum pa'i nang kyis btab nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:294b-16: lus la kun nas rnag khrag rgyun du zag pas thams cad kyis mi 'dod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:294b-17: gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol gnas khang zhig par gyur pa tha ma zhig gi nang du bzhag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:294b-18: de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pas rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus 'khor mang pos gcig gis kyang mi shes par byin gyis brlabs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:295a-1: pa nyag gcig dge slong nad pa'i thad du gshegs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:295a-2: chus bkru bar dgongs nas 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha rnams shes par bya ba'i phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:295a-3: brgya byin lha'i dbang po lha'i 'khor tshad med pa brgya stong gis bskor te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:295a-4: lha rdzas kyi me tog char bzhin du phab /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:295a-5: lha rdzas kyi rol mo rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:295a-6: steng gi nam mkha' la 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:295a-7: de'i tshe na sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi lha'i dbang po bsod nams brgya las grub pa'i bum pa dam pa'i nang na snying rje chen po'i chu gtsang mas bkang nas lag na thogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:295a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:295a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa la mdun nas bsu ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:295a-11: de'i tshe na de bzhin gshegs pas bsod nams brgya dang ldan pa'i phyag brkyang nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:295a-12: phyag sor mnyen zhing ring ba lnga las 'od zer chen po bkye nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:295a-14: 'khor mang po de dag rnams snang bar byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:295a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dge slong nad pa'i drung du gshegs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:295a-17: dbu'i spyi gtsug nas 'od zer bkye nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:295a-18: dge slong nad pa snang bar byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:295a-19: dge slong nad pa de la reg ma thag tu na ba'i sdug bsngal byang bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:295b-0: rma'i rnag khrag dang bcas pa'i lus kyi skyabs su gsol nas lus kyis de @295b bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal ma nus pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:295b-1: de bzhin gshegs pas phyag g-yas pas brgya byin lha'i dbang po las rin po che'i bum pa blangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:295b-2: dge slong nad pa'i spyi bo nas chu blugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:295b-3: phyag g-yon pas dge slong nad pa'i lus kyi rma bkrus shing byugs pas dge slong nad pa'i rma thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gis rjes su sos par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:295b-4: de ltar rma kun sos nas dge slong de dga' mgu rangs par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:295b-5: sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:295b-6: thugs rje chen po'i yab la phyag 'tshal lo //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:300a-8: mi brnangs pa bzhin mid du yang med la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:300a-9: skyug tu yang med pa ltar mi bde bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:300a-10: blon po chen po thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:300a-14: khyed rnams shes par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:300a-15: ngas sngon mkhas pa shes rab can dag las 'di skad ces thos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:300a-16: dud 'gro'i khams su skyes pa'i nang na lus kyi spu mdog gser lta bur 'dug na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:300a-17: gdon mi za bar byang chub sems dpa' yin no zhes zer te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:300a-18: gal te so so'i skye bo las gcig tsam bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:300a-19: sems cad thams cad la phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:300a-20: bde ba'i don chen po byed pa yin no /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:300a-21: ci'i phyir rngon pa sdig can 'dis de 'dra ba'i thabs byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:300a-22: byang chub sems dpa' bsad pa 'di gal te bdag gis blon thabs sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:300a-26: rin po che sna bdun nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:300a-31: nor ltar byin par gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:300b-0: sdig can de dang mthun par @300b 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:300b-1: de'i grogs su 'gyur ro snyam bsams nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:300b-2: rngon pa de'i srog gi dbang po bcad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:300b-3: de ltar rngon pa de srog gi dbang po bcad nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:300b-4: seng ge'i pags pa thogs te ri de la song nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:300b-5: shing glang mgo'i tsandan spungs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:300b-8: de ltar seng ge'i ro bsregs nas rus pa bsdus te mchod rten brtsigs nas mchod pa byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:300b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:300b-11: de'i tshe de'i dus na seng ge yi dam brtan zhes bya ba de ni da ltar sh'akya thub pa nga nyid yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:300b-12: de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bsten pa'i phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:300b-14: srog phyir yal yang bla yi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:300b-18: drin lan bsab pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:300b-19: de yang ci lta zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:300b-20: byang chub sems dpa' ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bsten pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:300b-21: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub myur du thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:300b-23: byang chub sems dpa' ni rgyun du brtson 'grus su dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:300b-24: khams gsum gyi nyon mongs pa gzhom zhing rgud par bya ba'i phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:300b-25: sangs rgyas kyi chos tshig gcig tsam mam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:300b-26: tshigs su bcad pa gcig gam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:301a-0: don gcig tsam gyi bar du nyan pa la rab @301a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:301a-2: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni sems rtse gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab tshol ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:301a-4: shin tu ldan pas lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:301a-5: srog kyang mi phangs par me ma mur gyi lcags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:301a-6: sa gzhi las kyang 'bog cing 'gro ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:301a-8: byang chub sems dpa' ni tshigs su bcad pa 'ga' tsam gyi phyir yang lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:301a-10: mdo sde bcu gnyis lta ci smos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:301a-11: tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam gyi phyir yang lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:301a-13: de ma yin pa'i phyi'i zang zing lta ci smos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:301a-14: chos thos pa'i don gyis lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:301a-15: sems shin tu bde bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:301a-16: shin tu dad pa'i sems skyes pas yang dag pa'i lta ba'i sems thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:301a-17: chos ston pa mthong na pha ma mthong ba ltar nga rgyal gyi sems mi skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:301a-18: sems can gyi don du chos nyan gyi rnyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:301a-20: sems can la phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:301a-22: bdag la phan pa'i don gyi phyir ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:301a-23: dam pa'i chos kyi phyir rgyal po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:301a-25: grang ba dang; tsha ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:301a-27: spyang ki la sogs te gcan gzan khro bo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:301a-29: dgra la sogs pas 'jigs pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:301b-0: sngar dbang po rnams kyi nyon mongs pa btul @301b nas; de'i 'og tu chos nyan par byed kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:301b-1: dus ma yin par nyan pa ni ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:301b-2: sems rtse gcig tu nyan par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:301b-3: chos la bkur sti bya ba'i phyir chos ston pa la rim gro gus par byed pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:301b-4: byang chub sems dpa' drin shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:301b-5: drin lan bsab pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:301b-7: byang chub sems dpa' sems rtse gcig tu chos nyan pa zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:301b-8: chos nyan pa la rnam pa bzhi ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:301b-11: thams cad du thams cad kyi sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:301b-12: dge ba'i sems dang bzhi ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:301b-13: de ni byang chub sems dpa' mdo sde bcu gnyis tshol ba la brtson pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:301b-15: sangs rgyas kyi bka' drin lci ba dran pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:301b-16: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos kun tu rgyas par bya ba'i phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:301b-17: sangs rgyas kun gyi dam pa'i chos skye zhing 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:301b-18: 'jig rten pa dag sangs rgyas kyi chos la dad par bya ba'i phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:301b-19: sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i byang chub par bya ba'i phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:301b-20: de bas na byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu'i sems can grangs med pa dran par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:301b-21: sangs rgyas kun gyi bka' drin lci ba bsab pa'i phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:301b-22: byang chub sems dpa' ni mdo sde bcu gnyis tshol ba la brtsod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:301b-23: byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus su sangs rgyas kyi chos tshol ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:302a-1: thams cad dad pa'i sems bskyed pa'i phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:302a-2: rgyu'i rig pa'i bstan bcos slob par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:302a-4: nyes pa'i skyon thams cad shes par bya ba dang; mu steg can gyi ngan par lta ba'i gtsug lag gzhig par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:302a-5: sems can gdul ba'i thabs mkhas pa shes par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:302a-6: de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i don dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:302a-7: 'jig rten pa'i tshig gi don rnam par dbye bar bya ba'i phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:302a-8: byang chub sems dpa' rgyu'i rig pa'i bstan bcos slob par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:302a-9: byang chub sems dpa' ci'i phyir sgra'i rig pa'i bstan bcos slob par byed ce na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:302a-10: sgra'i tshig yongs su dag par brgyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:302a-11: yongs su ma dag pa'i tshig gis don gsal bar ston mi nus pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:302a-12: don thams cad shes shing khong du chud par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:302a-13: yang dag pa'i tshig mi nyams pas nga rgyal gyis mi shigs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:302a-14: ngan par lta ba las bzlog cing sems can gdul ba'i thabs mkhas par shes par bya ba'i phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:302a-15: byang chub sems dpa' sgra'i rig pa'i bstan bcos slob par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:302a-16: byang chub sems dpa' ci'i phyir sman dpyad kyi rig pa'i bstan bcos slob ce na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:302a-17: sems can rnams mi dge ba'i nad brgya rtsa bzhi dang dbral bar bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:302b-0: sems can thams cad la byams shing snying brtse pa'i phyir sems can rnams dad pa'i sems bskyed @302b bar bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:302b-1: de ltar nad dang bral bas dga' ba'i sems skye bar bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:302b-2: de ltar dga' ba'i sems skyes pas rtag tu sangs rgyas dran par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:302b-3: snying rje chen pos sems can rnams pha rol tu phyin par bya ba'i phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:302b-4: byang chub sems dpa' sman dpyad kyi rig pa'i bstan bcos slob par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:302b-5: byang chub sems dpa' ni ci'i phyir 'jig rten gyi bzo'i rig pa slob par byed ce na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:302b-6: sems can la phan par bya ba'i phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:302b-7: nor zang zing rnyed sla bas sems can rnams dad pa bskyed par bya ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:302b-8: 'jig rten gyi bya ba'i dngos po kun shes pas nga rgyal gzhom pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:302b-9: sems can gdul bar bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:302b-10: srid pa'i chos thams cad kyis bsgribs pa kun bsal ba'i phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:302b-11: byang chub sems dpa' bzo'i rig pa slob par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:302b-12: gal te byang chub sems dpa' rig pa'i dngos po lnga sngar ma bslabs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:302b-13: nam du yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:302b-14: de bas na bla na med pa'i byang chub thob pa'i phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:302b-15: rig pa'i dngos po lnga bslab par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:302b-16: byang chub sems dpa' ni drin shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:302b-17: drin lan bsab pa ni sems can la bshad pa'i dngos po bshad cing bstan par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:303a-0: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub @303a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:303a-2: rig pa lnga dang ldan par bshad par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:303a-3: bshad pa la rnam gnyis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:303a-5: yongs su dag par bshad pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:303a-6: de la ji ltar na rim gyis bshad pa gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:303a-7: sngar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bshad la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:303a-8: de'i 'og tu tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:303a-9: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du bshad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:303a-12: don yid la byed cing chos bzhin du gnas pa ni rim gyis bshad pa zhes bya'o; ;de la yongs su dag par bshad pa zhes bya ba ni gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:303a-13: nyan pa 'dug la bshad pa 'greng na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:303a-14: de la bshad par mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:303a-15: gal te nyan pa chos la skyon tshol lam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:303a-16: bshad pa la skyon tshol na de la bshad par mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:303a-17: gal te nyan pa gang zag la rten gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:303a-19: chos la mi rten pas de la bshad par mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:303a-20: gal te nyan pa yi ge la rten la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:303a-21: don la mi rten na bshad par mi bya ba nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:303a-22: bkri ba'i don la rten gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:303a-23: nges pa'i don gyi bar la mi rten na bshad par mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:303a-25: gang zag de ni sangs rgyas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:303a-26: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su dag pa'i chos la ma gus pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:303b-0: gal te bshad cing ston pa yang chos la bkur sti @303b byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:303b-1: chos nyan pa gang gus pa'i sems kyis rtse gcig tu nyan cing nga rgyal gyi sems med pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:303b-2: yongs su dag par bshad pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:303b-4: rim gyis bshad pa zhes bya ba ni thams cad bshad pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:303b-5: thams cad bshad pa zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:303b-6: mdo sde bcu gnyis nas tshig gcig gam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:303b-7: tshigs su bcad pa gcig gam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:303b-8: tshigs su bcad pa phyed kyi bar du bshad pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:303b-9: de yang tshig gi sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:303b-13: don bstan pa yang spro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:303b-15: dga' bar bya ba'i phyir dus su bstan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:303b-16: dus kha cig tu gshe zhing spyo ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:303b-17: dus kha cig tu drang por thad kar bstan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:303b-18: dus kha cig tu dpe rnams bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:303b-19: ci dang 'phrod pa bzhin du bstan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:303b-20: dus kha cig tu de bas nye zhing slab par bstan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:303b-21: dus kha cig tu ci ltar mos pa bzhin du 'jug sla ba bstan pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:303b-22: byang chub sems dpa'i drin shes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:303b-23: drin bsab pa la mkhas pa'i mchog chos rim gyis bshad pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:303b-25: yongs su dag par bshad pa zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:303b-26: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dgra sdang pa la byams pa'i sems bsgom ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:303b-27: byams pa'i sems kyis sems can sdig pa dang bcas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:303b-28: gang zag bag med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:304a-1: nas chos bstan nas rgyags shing dregs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:304a-2: gang zag dbul phongs pa'i bar du thabs rnam pa mang pos chos ston par byed kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:304a-8: grags pa'i phyir ma yin pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:304a-9: byang chub sems dpa' drin shes shing drin bsab pa la mkhas pa'i chos yongs su dag par bshad pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:304a-10: de la ji ltar na chos bzhin du gnas pa yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:304a-13: yid kyi las dge ba'i chos sgom zhing yongs su dag pa dang ldan te drin shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:304a-14: drin bsab pa yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su bstan pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:304a-16: byang chub sems dpa' chen po drin shes shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:304a-17: drin bsab pa ni don yid la byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:304a-18: mang du thos pas gzungs thob par byed cing chos kyi sgron ma 'bar bar bya ba'i phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:304a-19: sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:304a-20: bde ba'i don du sbyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:304a-22: mang du thos pa la brtson par bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:304a-23: chos ston cing 'chad pa la mchod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:304a-24: rim gro bya yi chos la skyon mi gdags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:304a-25: ston cing 'chad pa la skyon mi gdags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:304a-27: 'tshe ba med pa'i sems kyis sems can la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:304b-2: mi'i longs spyod myong zhing mya ngan las 'da' ba'i lam thob pa ni drin shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:304b-6: dngos po bzhis bzod pa bsgom zhing mi bzod pa yongs su spangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:304b-7: byang chub brgyan pa'i phyir sems can mang po bsdus nas bzod pa bsgom pa la bkod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:304b-8: bdag kyang bzod pa byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:304b-9: gzhan yang bzod pa byed pa la 'god cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:304b-10: 'jigs pa dang bral ba ni drin shes pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:304b-11: de ltar bzod pa byas pa'i rkyen gyis zhe sdang gi sems mi 'byung bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:304b-12: 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:304b-14: nyon mongs pa mi 'byung bas 'gyod pa'i sems med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:304b-15: lus 'di dang bral nas kyang lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:304b-16: mi'i longs spyod mya ngan las 'da' ba thob pa ni drin bsab pa zhes bya'o //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:304b-20: sems can yongs su sdud do //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:304b-24: lus kyi bde ba'i longs spyod myong ba ni bdag la phan pa'i don byed pa zhes bya'o //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:305a-7: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i dngos po bzhi zhes bya'o; ;byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgoms pas 'khrug pa'i sems yongs su spangs te /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:305a-13: sems dben zhing zhi pas sems can la mi 'tshe ba ni drin bsab pa zhes bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:305a-14: byang chub sems dpa' lus 'di dang bral nas /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:305b-1: byang chub kyi phyir shes rab bsgoms pas chos kyi dbyings shes shing rtog pa'i phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:305b-2: lus kyis bde ba'i longs spyod myong ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:305b-3: bdag la phan pa'i don zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:305b-4: sems can rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi don dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:305b-5: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i don bskyed pa ni gzhan la phan pa'i don zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:305b-7: shes bya'i sgrib pa rnam pa gnyis yongs su spangs pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:305b-8: 'bras bu chen po zhes bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:305b-10: drin bsab pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyis dngos po bsam gyis mi khyab pa bzhi zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:305b-12: byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi gnas dran pa'i mngon par shes pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:305b-13: sngon 'das pa'i dngos po shes rab kyis rtogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:305b-14: sems can rnams kyi dge ba dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:305b-18: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pas dga' ldan gnam du tshe phun sum tshogs par skyes so //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:305b-20: tshe mchog tu gyur pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:305b-22: thog ma gnas de nas babs pa'i tshe 'od zer chen po bkye nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:305b-23: phyogs bcu snang bar byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:305b-24: yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:306a-2: lhums nas bltams pa'i dus mkhyen to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:306a-3: phyogs bcur phyogs re rer yang mis ma brten par gom pa bdun bdun por te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:306a-5: bdag gi da ltar gyi lus 'di ni lus nang gi tha ma ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:306a-13: lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis me tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:306a-18: gdugs dam pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas so; ;skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pas /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:306a-20: byams pa'i shugs kyis bdud kyi dpung rnams bcom mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:306a-21: lhu tshigs re re la yang gyad mthu bo che'i stobs re re dang ldan no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:306a-22: gzhon nu bus pa'i tshe 'jig rten gyi dngos po ma bslabs par thams cad kun rtogs shing shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:306a-23: ston pa med par rang btsal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:306a-24: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lhun gyis grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:306a-25: tshangs pa'i lha'i dbang bos bskul nas sems can rnams la chos kyis 'khor lo bskor to //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:306b-1: byol song gi bsod snyoms phul ba yang sangs rgyas kyis de'i bsams pa mkhyen to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:306b-5: shing ljon pa'i yal ga yang de'i phyogs su btud de grib ma'i skyabs byas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:306b-6: mngon par sangs rgyas nas kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:306b-7: lo drug gi bar du bdud ma rungs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:306b-8: rgyun du glags btsal kyang glags ma rnyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:306b-9: rgyun du ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:306b-10: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i sems yongs su rdzogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:306b-11: rnam par rtog pa 'byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:306b-12: 'gag pa la shin tu mkhas pas /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:306b-18: dmus long gis mthong bar 'gyur ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:306b-19: mngal mgo log tu gyur pa legs par btsas pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:306b-20: 'on pa rna bas thos par gyur pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:306b-23: gti mug can dug gsum byang bar gyur pa de lta bu ni skye ba thun mong ma yin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:306b-25: skye ba thun mong zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:307a-0: rtag tu glo g-yas pa phab nas gzim @307a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:307a-2: seng ge'i rgyal po lta bur rtsva 'jag ma ltar mi 'grug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:307a-3: rlung gi rgyal po bhee ram pas kyang na bza'i mtha' tsam mi g-yo ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:307a-4: gshegs pa'i gom stabs ri dvags kyi rgyal po seng ge'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:307a-5: ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar gshegs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:307a-6: gshegs su 'cha' ba na zhabs g-yas pa sngar 'dor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:307a-8: gang du gshegs kyang sa gzhi mthon dma' mnyam pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:307a-11: skye ba thun mong ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:307a-13: zhabs kyi mthil mnyam zhing gang ba yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:307a-14: zhabs kyi mthil na 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa yod pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:307a-15: phyag sor phra la ring ba yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:307a-16: zhabs kyi rting pa zlum la gang ba yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:307a-17: phyag sor gyi bar dra bas 'brel ba yin /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:307a-23: rta'i rgyal po ltar mtshan spubs kyi nang du mi snang ba yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:307a-24: shing n+ya gro dha ltar sku'i yan lag yongs su rdzogs pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:307a-25: sku'i ba sbu gyen du nyal ba yin /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:307b-1: sku mdog gser btso ma ltar 'dug pa yin /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:307b-3: lpags pa mnyen zhing 'jam la rdul dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:307b-4: dri mas mi gos pa yin; gnas bdun yongs su gang ba yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:307b-5: sku'i stod seng ge ltar 'dug pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:307b-6: phyag gi lag ngar zlum la shugs kyis gzhol ba yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:307b-7: sgrog rus mnyam par gang ba yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:307b-8: sku'i stod smad 'byes pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:307b-9: zhal gyi tshems bzhi bcu dang ldan pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:307b-10: tshems kyi thags bzang zhing mnyam pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:307b-12: 'gram pa ri dvags kyi rgyal po seng ge ltar gang ba yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:307b-13: ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:307b-14: sha'i do ker gyi mtshan dang ldan pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:307b-15: ljags ring la yangs pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:307b-16: tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs dang ldan pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:307b-17: spyan gyi mdog mthon mthing ltar 'dug pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:307b-18: spyan khyu mchog gi rgyal po ltar 'dug pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:307b-19: smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu dkar po dang ldan pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:307b-20: de bzhin du bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang ldan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:307b-21: dpe byad bzang po re re la yang dpe byad bzang po'i mchog dam pa brgya stong snyed yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:307b-22: dpe byad bzang po de dag re re la yang byang chub sems dpa' thog ma byang chub tu sems bskyed nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:307b-23: byang chub la ni shin tu brtan pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:307b-24: drin shes shing drin bsab pa'i phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:308a-0: spyod pa dam pa de dag spyad de de bas na bla na med @308a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:308a-1: pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:308a-2: sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:308a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa ni sngon yun ring po bskal pa grangs med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:308a-5: tshul khrims yongs su dag par bsrungs pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:308a-6: zhabs kyi mthil mnyam par gang ba'i mtshan dang ldan par gyur pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:308a-10: gang zag yon tan dang ldan pa la mchod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:308a-11: bkur stir byas pa'i rkyen gyis zhabs kyi mthil 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan par gyur pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:308a-12: sems can rnams la mi 'tshe zhing 'phrog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:308a-17: yon tan dang ldan pa'i gang zag la rgyang ma nas bsu bskyel byas shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:308a-18: khri stan bting la nga rgyal spangs te rim gro dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:308a-21: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis sor mo phra zhing ring bar gyur pa'i mtshan dang ldan par gyur pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:308a-22: gong du smos pa'i bya ba gsum dang ldan pas /
