K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:308a-24: bsdu ba'i chos rnam pa bzhis 'gro ba mang po yongs su bsdus pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:308a-25: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis sor mo'i bar dra bas 'brel ba'i mtshan dang ldan par gyur ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:308b-0: yon tan dang ldan pa'i gang zag gi lus la @308b bskus shing mnyes pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:308b-1: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis rkang lag mnyan zhing ring la 'jam pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:308b-2: dge ba'i chos bsgom pa la mi skyo bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:308b-3: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis thal gong mnyam la lag par zlum zhing shugs kyis gzhol ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:308b-4: chos thos par dga' zhing gzhan la chos ston par yang mos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:308b-5: chos kyi phyir mngag gzhug gi las byas pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:308b-6: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis long bu'i rus pa mi snang ba'i mtshan dang ldan pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:308b-7: sgo gsum yongs su dag cing nad g-yog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:308b-8: sman gyi sbyin pa byin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:308b-9: nga rgyal med la bza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:308b-10: btung ba la chog shes pa'i rgyu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:308b-11: rkyen gyis lus drang por 'greng na lag pas bus mor slebs pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:308b-12: 'khon gcugs su gyur pa la tshig 'jam pos bsdums te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:308b-13: bdag kyang ngo tsha ba dang ldan pa'i chos spyad de; gzhan yang spyod du bcug na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:308b-14: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis rta'i rgyal po ltar mtshan sbubs kyi nang du nub pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:308b-15: bdag gi sgo gsum yongs su dag la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:308b-16: gzhan yang yongs su dag par byed cing sems can dag 'byung ba chen po bzhi 'khrugs te nad du gyur pa'i sman dpyad kyis gsos pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:308b-17: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis lus kyi mtshan yongs su rdzogs pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:308b-18: chos thos par dga' zhing gzhan la chos ston par mos pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:308b-19: lus kyi ba spu gyen [?] du nyal ba'i mtshan dang ldan pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:308b-20: chos kyi don zab mo yid la bgyid cing dge ba'i chos sgom par mos la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:309a-4: yon tan dang ldan pas gang zag la mchod pa byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:309a-5: sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:309a-7: lam srang na 'dug pa'i bong ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:309a-10: mi gtsang ba med par byas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:309a-11: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis spu re re nas g-yas phyogs su 'khyil ba'i mtshan dang ldan par gyur pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:309a-12: pha rol po gzhan dag la zas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:309a-15: de la sogs pa byin zhing zhe sdang gi sems med pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:309a-16: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis gser btso ma'i mdog dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:309a-17: 'od rtag pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:309a-18: ci'i las kyis ba spu'i khung bu re re nas spu re re skyes pa'i mtshan dang ldan zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:309a-19: las de nyid kyi rgyu las gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:309a-20: las kyi rgyu de nyid kyis lus mnyan zhing 'jam la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:309a-22: dri mas mi gos pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:309a-23: sems can dag la dgos pa'i zang zing rgyun du gtong bas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:309a-24: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis gnas bdun mnyam par gang ba'i mtshan dang ldan pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:309a-27: rang bzhin gyis mnyen zhing des pa'i sems kyis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:309a-28: sems can gyi yid dang sbyor te chos bzhin du spyod la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:309a-29: mi dge ba'i chos spangs pa'i phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:309b-0: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis ro stod ri dvags kyi rgyal po seng ge lta bu'i @309b mtshan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:309b-2: sgrog rus mnyam par gang ba'i mtshan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:309b-3: sor mo ring ba'i mtshan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:309b-4: lus kyi mtha' yang zhing 'jam pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:309b-5: phra ma yongs su spangs te rtsod cing 'khon pa'i bsdums byas pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:309b-6: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis so bzhi bcu dang ldan pa'i mtshan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:309b-7: so'i thags bzang ba'i mtshan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:309b-8: so mnyam pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:309b-9: 'dod pa'i khams kyi byams pa bsgoms pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:309b-10: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis so dkar ba'i mtshan dang ldan pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:309b-11: slong ba mthong na dga' ba'i sems kyis bsu bskyal byas pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:309b-12: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu'i mtshan dang ldan par gyur pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:309b-13: sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa bzhin du 'dra bar lta bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:309b-14: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis ro bro ba'i mchog gi mtshan dang ldan pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:309b-15: sems can la bla na med pa'i chos kyi ro rtag tu gtong zhing brjed cing mi dran pa la yang dran par byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:309b-16: bdag kyang tshul khrims lnga srung la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:309b-17: gzhan yang bsrung bar bskul zhing byams pa'i sems kyis chos kyi sbyin pa chen po byas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:309b-18: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis sha'i gtsug tor gyi mtshan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:309b-19: lce ring zhing yangs pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:309b-21: chos kyi dga' ba'i tshig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:309b-22: mnyen des pa'i tshig smra yi dus ma yin pa'i tshig mi smra bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:310a-0: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis tshangs pa'i sgrangs dbyangs dang ldan pa yin @310a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:310a-1: no; ;snying rje'i sems bsgoms pas sems can rnams la pha ma lta bur lta bas de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis mig mthon mthing ltar 'dug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:310a-2: mig khyu mchog gi rgyal po lta bu'i mtshan dang ldan pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:310a-3: yon tan dang ldan pa'i legs pa ma bcabs shing bstod cing bsngags pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:310a-4: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis mdzod spu dkar po'i mtshan dang ldan pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:310a-5: mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis 'di dag gi rgyu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:310a-6: rkyen so sor bshad mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:310a-7: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen yang dag pa ni tshul khrims dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:310a-10: gal te tshul khrims ma bsrungs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:310a-12: mi'i lus kyang thob par mi nus na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:310a-13: mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis thob pa lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:310a-14: spyi gtsug bltar mi snang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:310a-15: sha'i gtsug tor gyi mtshan gnyis la tha dad pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:310a-16: gzhan yang ci byed do cog la gcig tu ma nges te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:310a-18: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis rkang mthil mnyam par gang ba'i mtshan 'thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:310a-19: de yang sems rtse gcig tu byas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:310a-20: de'i rgyus 'khor lo'i rtsibs stong dang ldan pa'i mtshan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:310a-24: gnas bdun mnyam par gang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:310b-0: lce @310b ring zhing yangs pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:310b-1: de yang bya ba rtag tu byas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:310b-2: de'i rgyus sor mo ring ba'i mtshan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:310b-3: lag pas pus mor slebs pa'i mtshan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:310b-4: 'od nag pa 'dom gang gi mtshan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:310b-5: so thags bzang zhing ya yo med pa'i mtshan thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:310b-6: bya ba yongs su dag par byas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:310b-7: de'i rgyus mtshan lhag ma gzhan rnams thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:310b-9: sems can dag la dge ba 'ba' zhig gi sems bskyed pas de'i rgyus rkang lag mnyen zhing 'jam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:310b-10: lpags pa mnyen zhing 'jam la rdul dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:310b-11: dri mas mi gos pa'i mtshan thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:310b-12: rim gyis bsgom zhing spyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:310b-13: dus bzhin du bsgom shing spyod pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:310b-17: dge ba'i chos bsgom pa la mos shing 'gyod pa'i sems med pas de'i rgyus lus kyi mdog gser lta bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:310b-20: smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu'i mtshan thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:310b-21: bstod cing bsngags na yang nga rgyal mi skye la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:310b-22: bdag gi legs pa bcabs te rlom sems med na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:310b-23: de'i rgyus rta lta bur mtshan spubs su nub pa'i mtshan thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:310b-24: dge ba'i las ci byas pa byang chub tu bsngos na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:310b-25: de'i rgyus ba spu khung re re nas spu re re skye pa'i mtshan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:310b-26: ba spu gyen du nyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:310b-27: so bzhi bcu dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:311a-2: rtag tu brtson 'grus byas na de'i rgyus 'gram pa'i lha nga zlum pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:311a-3: lus kyi stod seng ge lta bu'i mtshan thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:311a-4: sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa dang 'dra bar sdug par bsams pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:311a-5: de'i rgyus so thags bzang zhing mnyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:311a-6: mig mthon mthing du 'dug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:311a-7: mig khyu mchog gi rgyal po lta bu'i mtshan thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:311a-8: dge ba'i chos sgrub pa la skyo zhing ngal ba'i sems med pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:311a-9: mtshan lhag ma gzhan rnams thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:311a-10: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan nyid la spyod cing gnas pa'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:311a-11: mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi las byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:311a-12: rnam par dag pa'i spyod pa la gnas pa'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:311a-13: mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yod mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:311a-16: spyod pa bcu gsum pa la gnas pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:311a-18: gsal bar yongs su rdzogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:311a-19: sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis mtshan grangs med mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:311a-20: sems can rnams la mi mthun te rab dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:311a-22: tha ma yod pas bsam gyis mi khyab pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:311a-23: de bas na sangs rgyas kyis mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis gsungs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:311a-24: sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams ji tsam yod pa phyogs gcig tu bsdus te spungs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:311b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ba spu gcig gi mtshan @311b dang mnyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:311b-1: ba spu'i khung bu thams cad kyi bsod nams ji snyed gcig yod pa gcig tu bsdus te spungs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:311b-2: dpe byad bzang po gcig dang mnyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:311b-3: dpe byad bzang po ji tsam yod pa'i bsod nams ji snyed yod pa de las brgya 'gyur du byas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:311b-5: smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu dkar po'i mtshan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:311b-6: spyi gtsug mtshan bltar mi snang ba'i mtshan ni ma gtogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:311b-7: de ma yin pa mtshan gzhan thams cad gcig tu bsdus te stong 'gyur du byas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:311b-8: mtshan gong ma gnyis su 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:311b-9: mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang; dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu po'i bsod nams ji snyed yod pa gcig tu bsdus spungs te khri phrag stong 'gyur du byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:311b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'brug sgra lta bu'i dbyangs zab cing rgyang ring por grags pa'i mtshan dang mnyam ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:311b-11: gsung sgra de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med mtha' yas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rdul phra rab snyed du grags shing sems can gyi don du byams pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:311b-12: snying rje chen po spyod pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:311b-14: drin bsab pa 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:311b-16: dpe byad bzang po de dag re res kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:311b-17: so so'i skye bo tshad med grangs med pa bya ba brgya stong gis chen po'i rdul phra rab snyed la phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:311b-18: bde ba'i don byas nas byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:312a-3: dpe byad bzang po rnam pa gnyis thob ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:312a-5: dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs nas byang chub kyi shing drung du song ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:312a-6: bdud kyi dpung rnams btul te mngon par sangs rgyas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:312a-7: yang dag par chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:312a-8: so so'i skye bo la phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:312a-9: bde ba'i don du 'dod pa'i chu klung las bsgral nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:312a-10: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'gram du bkod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:312a-11: sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:312a-12: bde ba'i don yongs su rdzogs par byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:312a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:312a-14: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la sogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:312a-15: 'khor mang po thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:312a-17: khyed rnams la su zhig sangs rgyas kyi bka' drin rtag tu gzo zhing dam pa'i chos bsrung ba'i phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:312a-18: thabs mkhas pa chen po drin lan bsab pa'i mdo sde shin tu zab mo 'di /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:312a-19: glegs bam du bri ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:312a-22: su zhig gis phyi ma'i dus ngan pa'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:312a-24: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i pa'i byang chub 'di srung zhing gzungs su 'dzin par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:312a-25: su zhig gis chos bsrung ba'i phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:312a-26: mdo sde 'di rgyas par sbel zhing sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:312b-0: bde ba'i @312b don byed par nus zhes bka' stsal pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:312b-1: de'i tshe 'khor de nyid na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khri brgya stong snyed 'dug pa las langs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:312b-2: gos tshags bcos nas bla gos phyogs gcig tu gzar te pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:312b-3: thal mo sbyar ba btud nas sangs rgyas la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:312b-5: bdag cag gis slad ma'i dus ngan pa'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:312b-6: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di bsrung zhing dam pa'i chos gzungs su bzung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:312b-7: sems can mang po la phan pa'i don byed par spro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:312b-8: de nas byang chub sems dpa' seng ges 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:312b-10: bdag kyang thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams yongs su bsdu bar spro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:312b-11: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rjes gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:312b-12: sems can gang ngan 'gro gsum du ltung bar gyur pa dag bdag gis ci nas kyang mi ltung bar bgyi bar spro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:312b-13: byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa; sems can rnams ci dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:312b-14: ci 'dod pa bdag gis thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar spro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:312b-15: byang chub sems dpa' ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:312b-16: bdag gis ni sems can rnams la ye shes chen po'i chos kyi rgyal mtshan sbyin par bgyi bar spro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:312b-17: byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:313a-1: gis ni sems can rnams la chos yongs su sbyin par spro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:313a-2: byang chub sems dpa' nyi 'od kyis gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:313a-4: bdag gis ni sems can rnams la bde ba sbyin par spro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:313a-5: byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od kyis gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:313a-7: bdag gis ni sems can rnams la bsod nams kyi las byed du gzhug par bskul bar spro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:313a-8: byang chub sems dpa' dge sbyong gis gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:313a-10: bdag ni sems can rnams la thams cad bag med pa la mi gnas par bskul bar spro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:313a-11: byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pas gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:313a-13: bdag ni sems can thams cad la zad mi shes pa'i dbyings kyi don mthong bar bstan par spro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:313a-14: byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od dbus gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:313a-16: bdag ni sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i bde ba'i sbyin pa bgyi bar spro'o zhes byang chub sems dpa' de dag so so nas dam bcas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:313a-17: byang chub yongs su brgyan cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:313a-18: sems can thams cad la phan zhing bde ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:313a-19: sangs rgyas kyi bka' drin dran zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:313a-20: sangs rgyas kyi bka' drin bsab pa'i phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:313a-21: stan las langs nas thal mo sbyar ba btud de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:313a-22: sangs rgyas kyi mdo sde 'di bdag cag la gtad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:313b-0: de'i tshe @313b tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:313b-3: mdo sde 'di'i mtshan ci zhes bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:313b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:313b-6: mdo sde 'di'i ming dge ba'i dngos po kun bsdu ba zhes kyang bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:313b-7: thabs mkhas pa chen po zhes kyang bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:313b-8: dgongs pa dam pa'i spyod pa zhes kyang bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:313b-9: sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa zhes kyang bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:313b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:313b-11: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:313b-12: khyed rnams ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du nan tan du spyod cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:313b-13: sangs rgyas kyis yongs su gdams pa'i le'u 'di bstan pa'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:313b-14: nyan thos bdun khri nyis stong gis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:313b-15: bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:313b-25: de la sogs pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa la rjes su yi rangs bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:313b-26: thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa'i mdo las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:313b-27: nye bar bsnyen pa'i le'u zhes bya ste dgu pa'o ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:313b-28: thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-076-007:313b-29: rgya nag la sa bod du 'gyur ba la 'gyur gsar bcad ma byas pa'o ////
